name: Rental unit in Rotterdam · ★4.95 · 1 bedroom · 1 bed · 1.5 baths
description:
This bright comfortable one bedroom apartment with a architectural thouch has a true cosy feeling! It comfortably fits two and is centrally located on a quiet street, near everything you need! Shops, musea, transport, dining, bars and supermarket!
Take a look at the floorplan to save money.

The space
This 60m² apartment is uniquely located around the corner of Rotterdam's famous cultural street 'Witte de Withstraat' with restaurants, arts and little shops. It's a 5 min. walk to the shopping center, the musea, the park and a 5 min. walk to the river Maas. There is a small supermarket around the corner.
The apartment is nicely renewed in 2021. There is a balcony on the street side and one on the back side. The apartment is nicely furnished and has a warm cosy appeal. Wifi available (the most comprehensive internet package).
max 2 persons.
Non smoking

Checking in and out can be flexible, it depends on if there are new guests arriving
neighborhood_overview: The apartment is in a quiet side street of the Witte de With. So you are near the restaurants, bars and pubs but you don't have the noise!
host_about:
Hi I'm Kim and I'm an architect. 
I studied at the TU in Delft. The apartment is renewed by myself. I wanted to created a place where you feel at home. It is a combined style of wood some color and comfortable warm furniture.  You are very welcome to find out yourself :)

Take a look at the floor plan between the pictures. The whole apartment is yours! To save money contact me directly via contact info at the floor plan.

name: Rental unit in Rotterdam · ★4.78 · 1 bedroom · 2 beds · 1 bath
description:
The space
Welcome to Rotterdam!

This appartment is excellently located on the Mathensserlaan in the city center. Within 10 minutes walking distance you can find the musea park, the Erasmus University and Rotterdam Central Station. The shopping center is located around the corner and many pubs and restaurants are present in this area too.

The apparmtent is fully equiped for long and short stay included Free WIFI. The appartment suits 2 persons. There is a living room with a fireplace, a kitchen,a conservatory, a bedroom and a small bathroom. The appartment is on the second floor so please note that you have to walk up 2 steep stairs. Have a look at the pictures if you would like to see more.

The total space is 90 square meters. It's possible to have breakfast (for extra charge) in the hotel next to the appartment. There is also a private car park available (for extra charge). The rental price includes cleaning 1 time per week!

name: Condo in Rotterdam · ★4.83 · 1 bedroom · 1 bed · 1.5 baths
description:
The space
The apartment was renovated in 2008 by the architect Lex Aarts and converted into a luxurious and trendy two-room apartment (70m2).

This spacious accommodation is bigger than a hotel room of most of the hostels, is fully furnished, has a fully equipped kitchen and has its own entrance.

The nespresso, tea and WI-FI are for free.

This apartment for short and long stay, or honeymoon suite aswell, is situated in the lively cultural centre of Rotterdam, which one calls Dijkzigt, centre or Hoboken. Many excellent restaurants and a great number of trendy cafe's and cosy bars, you will find arround the corner.

The Erasmus MC is at the other site of the street and at a mere 5 minutes walking distance there are a number of world-famous museums, such as the Boijmans-van Beuningen and NAI. The entrance to the underground station is almost at the front door as well as tram (4) and bus (49) connections. If you likeshopping you wi
neighborhood_overview: Levendige jonge buurt. Bistro op de hoek, Veel leuke winkels, Musea op loopafstand, Bioscoop, openbaar vervoer allemaal in de buurt.
host_about:
I am a mimeplayer as a professional, play theatre acts on festivals, busines parties, weddings, conferences, etc. On the picture is shown me and my husband as "Henk en Ien",  our cotton candy act. www.suikerspinmachien.nl.
My initiative to start renting an apartment was inspired by my colleague, who did it already in The Hague, Maff apartment.
now it is, next to my work, my pasion to entertain people and make sure that my guests feel at home.
The apartment is renovated is 2008 with help from an architect, my husband and a few great workers to make it a little palace in Rotterdam. Sometimes, when it is not rented, me and my husband stay there to be on holliday for a night. We always ejoy staying.

name: Condo in Rotterdam · ★4.92 · 1 bedroom · 1 bed · 1 bath
description:
The space
Fully furnished light filled 3 rooms with balcony and garden (with sun!) in Kralingen Oost (east), Rotterdam's most desirable neighborhood. Excellent access to metro, tram & bus, shops & restaurants. Only 8 - 10 minute walk to Erasmus University and ONLY 1km from the center of Rotterdam (3 stops on the metro -about 4 minutes) to metro & train station "Blaak" . The Blaak is where the main public library is and where there is also the best fruit and vegetable market (Tuesdays and Saturdays) just about anywhere!. Kralingen was a village until 1895 and still feels like a village, very green with lots of trees, free standing homes and stately townhouses. The apartment has a nice entrance hall with space for bicycles. The living area that formerly was two rooms (dining & living room) is now one large room with a large desk and French doors that open onto balcony and garden. Bathroom has full bath/shower combination. The bright eat-in kitchen is parallel to t
host_about:
This apartment is my "pied a terre" in Rotterdam acquired many years ago.  Kralingen, where the apartment is located, was a village until 1895(?) and still feels like a village even though it is only 1 kilometer from the heart of Rotterdam...such as the main public library,  the main fruit and vegetable market and the Hoogstraat (Highstreet or Main St.).

The nearby streets and houses are really lovely, lovely, lovely and very quaint...  Just thinking about taking a walk within a block or two from my apartment lifts my spirits even when I am not at home in Rotterdam.    Rotterdam  is constantly changing and is a great modern city.

It would be my pleasure to give you more info on Rotterdam and the Netherlands ... just let me know what your interests are!

name: Bed and breakfast in Rotterdam · ★4.81 · 1 bedroom · 1 private bath
description:
A lovely, comfortable stay in the city centre of Rotterdam. The appartment is very spacious, has it's own kitchen and a nice garden-view. At night it is very quiet. The Central Station, as well as the town center and restaurants are on walking distance.

The space
Bed and breakfast Walenburg is located in a stately mansion from 1917 at the Walenburgerweg in the center of Rotterdam, a 5 minutes walk from the Central Station.

The town center, with shops, cafes, restaurants and entertainment venues, as well as cultural attractions, are nearby.

The bed and breakfast is on the ground floor, where a very spacious room with a separate bathroom is at your disposal. Acces to the bathroom and toilet is through the hallway.

The apartment has its own kitchen (induction, oven, microwave, refrigerator) and French doors to a large, peaceful garden. After a busy day in the city, here you can completely relax.

The owners live above the
neighborhood_overview: The northern side of Rotterdam Centre is an up-coming area. Here you will find authentic old pre-war houses. The atmosphere is pleasant. There are lots of nice little restaurants.
host_about: I'm an event organiser in creative industry, based in Rotterdam, the Netherlands. I live in the city center of Rotterdam for almost 25 years and I can tell you: I love my city. I also like to travel, to take pictures, to watch movies (our Rotterdam Filmfestival is awesome!), read books and to cook. Saturdays I watch my sons football match and I do some groceries on the Rotterdam Market.

name: Boat in Rotterdam · ★4.87 · 1 bedroom · 3 beds · 1 bath
description:
Enjoy Rotterdam the Rotterdam way. On a classic Amsterdam ferry (1911) in a comfortable apartment with sunny deck terrace, a view on the New Meuse and the Rotterdam skyline. Sleep tightly in the bow of the ship on the rhythm of the tide.

The space
Loftboat Rotterdam Kralingen is a former Amsterdam IJ-ferry dating from 1911. The boat was converted into a comfortable 55 m2 guest apartment (1-5 persons). There is a large, sunny private deck terrace with a view on the New Meuse and the Rotterdam skyline. The apartment has its own entrance and offers a great deal of privacy.

The salon is flooded with natural light. The kitchen is ready for cooking, and coffee and tea are present. The apartment has a work space, a wood-burning stove, TV, tuner/amplifier, CD/DVD player, an IPod connection and WiFi. All rooms have central heating.

There is bathroom with shower, a separate bedroom with a double bed and sleeping options for 3 in the salon.
neighborhood_overview: The ship is moored in the small harbour of the former Rotterdam water company, right next to its monumental watertower. De Esch is now a residential area, a mix of modern architecture and the old water company buildings.  At walking distance (2 minutes) there is a shopping centre with a supermarket, cafe Tomtom and restaurant De Watertoren (in the watertower).  Also in the area nearby are Erasmus University, business centre Rivium, Arboretum Trompenburg and a nature walking/jogging path along the New Meuse.
host_about:
I'm an entrepreneur in the leisure field in Rotterdam.
I like meeting people from all parts of the world.
I  enjoy travelling and checking out other B&B's abroad.
I can give my guests a lot of information about Rotterdam and its attractions.
I enjoy rebuilding classic boats in an authentic nautical style.

name: Boat in Rotterdam · ★4.70 · 1 bedroom · 1 bed · 1 bath
description:
Romantic overnight in the deckhouse of a historic ship.
This skipper's house is 4x5 m2 and 182 cm high.
With a seat on the roof of the deckhouse and a beautiful view.

This special and bright space is located in a quiet spot in the heart of Rotterdam in the former skipper's house of the historic ship "Veinard", which means "Bofkont".

Spending the night here will complete your Rotterdam experience, whether you came for relaxation and fun or as a business traveler.

welcome!

The space
The location of the Veinard is unique, in the middle of the city, but still in a quiet place on a lawn with trees.

From this place, Rotterdam is at your feet. Most sights such as various museums, including the Maritime Museum, Het Blaakse Bos, De Markthal, The Erasmus Bridge, are within walking distance.

The Oudehaven and De Witte de Withstraat, where you can eat delicious, are only a few minutes away. Witte de Withstraat
neighborhood_overview:
Trendy and dynamic neighbourhood 'Witte de Wihtstraat' is just around the corner.
Supermarket SPAR 5 minutes walking.
there are lots of things to do here close by.
host_about:
Dear Guests,

From the first of July 2021 Im the new owner of the ship MS Veinard in Rotterdam. 
Because for my work as fine artist and Polar expedition photographer I'm not always around. Michiel from rhBnB (Rotterdam Host BnB) is the host. If you plan to stay on the MS Veinard he will be your contact person,  receive you and can answer all your questions.

This kind of ship is called a Spits. She is build in Belgium in 1913 and 38.40 meter long and 5.04 meter wide.
From 1948 the ships name is Veinarrd, what ‘Lucky one’ means (bofkont in Dutch).

You are very welcome on the MS VEINARD surrounded by the vibrant city of Rotterdam. 

Esther

name: Hostel in Rotterdam · ★4.78 · 1 bedroom · 8 beds · 3 shared baths
description:
Cosy & Artsy! In hostel Ani&Haakien you find the real oldschool backpackers vibe, its definitly a place where you can meetup with like minded travelbuddy’s! You might even find yourself rubbing elbows with locals during dinners and the free tours! Located just 600m away from Rotterdam Central Station, Ani & Haakien is a short walk from Rotterdam’s most popular attractions such as Markthal and the famous Cube Houses! Check out the Hostel TOURS

The space
Cosy & Artsy! In hostel Ani&Haakien you find the real oldschool backpackers vibe, its definitly a place where you can meetup with like minded travelbuddy’s!

Guest access
There is no cerfew, you can enter the hostel any time with your keycard. The livingroom/kitchen is closed between 1am till 7am. The bedrooms, showers and restrooms are upstairs and open 24 hours.

Other things to note
Please let us know if you arrive later then 9pm

Registration number<
neighborhood_overview: You won’t find us on a busy bar street — at Ani&Haakien you’ll get a good night’s sleep - but no worries, the young and bustling Central District area of Rotterdam with good coffee places, awesome design shops, rooftop bars, jazz and the electronic night life is just a dance away! So, forget about walking around with your heavy bag… drop it at the hostel, and let us tell you all about the cool stuff to do in Rotterdam. Hostel Ani & Haakien is the perfect hub for day trips! Just 10min to Delft / 40min to Amsterdam / 40min to Utrecht and 20min to The Hague!
host_about: We are Joyce & Danielle who run this cute small hostel in the centre of rotterdam already for 9 years :))) Both born and raised in Rotterdam and together with our superteam we love to welcome all travellers who like to get to know this awesome city!

Just 10min to Delft / 40min to Amsterdam / 40min to Utrecht and 20min to The Hague!
host_about: We are Joyce & Danielle who run this cute small hostel in the centre of rotterdam already for 9 years :))) Both born and raised in Rotterdam and together with our superteam we love to welcome all travellers who like to get to know this awesome city!

name: Barn in Rotterdam · ★4.90 · 2 bedrooms · 4 beds · 1.5 baths
description:
Slapen in Rotterdam, maar liever niet in een hotel?
Ons luxe Guest House is gevestigd in de voormalige hooimijt van de oudste veenboerderij die Rotterdam nog rijk is. Het Guest House is heerlijk ruim en met eigen entrée, tuin en gratis parkeren op eigen erf van alle gemakken voorzien.

The space
De comfortabel ingerichte hooimijt is met grote huis- kamer en woonkeuken en 2 slaapkamers geschikt voor 5 personen. Ideaal voor gezinnen dus! De huiskamer met ruime zithoek en gezellige houtkachel ademt een bijzondere sfeer. De keuken is een ruime gezellige woonkeuken en is goed uitgerust met 5-pits gasfornuis, vaatwasser, oven en magnetron en een fijne espresso machine.

Guest access
De tuin is een groene oase van rust in de grote stad. In de zomer is het buiten volop genieten op uw priveterras met picknicktafel en relaxstoelen.

0599 5DEA B875 55B2 AA00
neighborhood_overview: Het Guesthouse is gelegen aan de rand van het Schiebroekse park waar je heerlijk kunt wandelen, hardlopen en fietsen. Families met kleine kinderen vinden op loopafstand van Guesthouse familiepark Plaswijckpark! In Rotterdam Hillegersberg zijn tal van leuke winkels en restaurantjes te vinden.
host_about: Sinds 2011 zijn wij samen met onze twee jongens de bewoners van dit bijzondere stukje in Rotterdam. Wij hebben tijdens de verbouwing van de oude veenboerderij een kleine twee jaar met heel veel plezier in onze hooimijt gewoond. Deze hooimijt hebben wij verbouwd tot een heerlijk luxe Guesthouse. Graag willen wij reizigers laten genieten van dit bijzondere stukje Rotterdam! Wij hopen jullie in ons Guesthouse te mogen ontvangen!

name: Houseboat in Rotterdam · ★4.74 · 1 bedroom · 1 bed · 1 bath
description:
Cozy and romantic sleeping in the authentic forecastle of a ship with its own kitchenette, bathroom and private access.

This special and spacious room can be found in a quiet spot in the heart of Rotterdam on the bow of the historic ship `Veinard`, which means `the lucky one`.

Spending the night here will complete your Rotterdam experience, whether you came for relaxation and fun or as a business traveler.

Welcome !

The space
The location of the Veinard is unique, in the middle of the city, but still in a quiet place on a lawn with trees.

From this place, Rotterdam is at your feet. Most sights such as various museums, including the Maritime Museum, Het Blaakse Bos, De Markthal, The Erasmus Bridge, are within walking distance.

The Oudehaven and De Witte de Withstraat, where you can eat delicious, are only a few minutes away. Witte de Withstraat has been named one of the ten coolest streets in the world by Time
neighborhood_overview:
Trendy and dynamic neighbourhood 'Witte de Withstraat' is just around the corner.
Supermarket SPAR 5 minutes walking.
there are lots of things to do in this area..
host_about:
Dear Guests,

From the first of July 2021 Im the new owner of the ship MS Veinard in Rotterdam. 
Because for my work as fine artist and Polar expedition photographer I'm not always around. Michiel from rhBnB (Rotterdam Host BnB) is the host. If you plan to stay on the MS Veinard he will be your contact person,  receive you and can answer all your questions.

This kind of ship is called a Spits. She is build in Belgium in 1913 and 38.40 meter long and 5.04 meter wide.
From 1948 the ships name is Veinarrd, what ‘Lucky one’ means (bofkont in Dutch).

You are very welcome on the MS VEINARD surrounded by the vibrant city of Rotterdam. 

Esther

description:
Cozy private room with main use of living room and private WC, located on the lower floor of a spacious apartment. It's in a calm, leafy neighborhood only a short bike ride away from Central Station and downtown. This is a really multicultural part of the city so there are plenty of shops and restaurants to explore nearby. Yoga studio downstairs.

I mostly live and work abroad. Sharing of the living room+kitchen+shower is for 10%-20% of the days, but minimal as I stay/work on the upper floor.

The space
The bedroom (9 sqm) is small but functional. It has a single bed, a chair, a built-in wardrobe and plenty of (empty) bookshelf space. The living and dining rooms (35 sqm) are homely, fully furnished, have fantastic light, and make for a quiet work- and living space. The large windows let in lots of natural light, which in the late afternoons is beautifully filtered through the stained glass upper window panes.

neighborhood_overview: I'm located in Rotterdam West, at about a 5-minute bike ride away from the Central Station and about 10 minutes from downtown Rotterdam. It's a great neighborhood with an excellent mix of residential and commercial areas,  lots of young families, creatives, and people from all over. There's plenty of green space around, as well as nice restaurants and bars all within walking and biking distance.

name: Boat in Rotterdam · ★4.86 · 8 bedrooms · 22 beds · 3 baths
description:
Met max 22 slaapplaatsen per schip aan de rivier in hartje Rotterdam!
Dus niet max. 16 pers.
Aan het gezellig rustiek scheepvaartkwartier liggen onze boten in het zicht van een super skyline, nl. het "Manhattan aan de maas".
Inkoopcentrum en uitgaansgebieden zijn op loopafstand.
De snelle watertaxi komt voor de deur.
Rond oudejaarsavond geldt tenminste 4 nachten huur.
Let op! beide schepen staan op EEN agenda.
Dus ook al lijkt bv. een weekend bezet is het 2e schip nog vrij, altijd doorvragen!

The space
Beweegt omdat zij drijft.
Voorbij varende rijnschepen geven een wisselend uitzicht.
De ruime dekken zijn vrij toegankelijk en laten u ronddwalen.
Een grote BBQ staat tot jullie beschikking

Guest access
Per schip is plaats voor een gezelschap met max. 22 personen.
Alleen aan dek mag men roken.
U kan ook met een klein gezelschap boeken.
De huurprijs blijft echter gelijk.
Al
neighborhood_overview:
Het historisch scheepvaartkwartier is een mooi dorp in Rotterdam centrum.
Prachtige uitzichten, veel groen, fijn wandelen en uitgaan.
host_about:
Uw gastheer is familievader en voert als kapitein samen met vrouw en zonen de zeilrederij Vof Europe Sailing.
Ik woon met familie nabij de te verhuren zeilschepen 'Luciana', 'Catherina' en 'Marie Galant' in de Veerhaven op ons woon/vergaderschip de 'Schoneveld'.
Mijn favoriete reisbestemmingen zijn de te bezeilen landen als Noorwegen, Deense eilanden, Oost en Noordzeekusten en Gomera, La Palma en El Hierro.
Ik heb weinig tijd voor boeken, maar lees graag reisverhalen en (maritieme)geschiedenis.
Mijn vrouw en ik gaan graag met het hele gezin naar de bioscoop.
Ik ben graag gastheer en stel het op prijs vooraf met de klant overleg te voeren, kennis te maken en te peilen wat verlangd wordt.
Bij een verblijf op een schip gaat veiligheid voor alles en dus ben ik dag en nacht mobiel bereikbaar.
Mijn levensmotto is dat wat ik in werktijd mag doen mijn hobby is!

description:
Casa la Rosa is a fully equipped classical Bed and Breakfast / Short Stay facility located close to the inner-city of Rotterdam and good connected with public transport. Casa la Rosa has a private bathroom and separated kitchen and its own balcony.

The space
LAYOUT
Casa La Rosa is a 35 m2 apartment located on the first level of an historic building and is facing the street. It is accessed via a shared staircase and has a private lockable front door that gives access to a small entrance hall. This hall, where you can hang your jackets, connects living room, kitchen and bathroom.
The living/bedroom is equipped with two single beds, that are covered standard as one double bed, and a TV with DVD. A black perforated wall unit hosts behind a "bedstee": sleeping-sofa in the centre, closet and washing machine on the sides. The bathroom has a shower, toilet and sink. The kitchen is equipped with stove, hood, refrigerator and cooking accessories. This ensures ma
neighborhood_overview:
ACTIVITIES
Rotterdam knows lots of summer festivals and other outings. Especially the smaller festivals are a good occasion to come to Rotterdam and stay at our B & B. In the mini apartment you will find all kinds of brochures, a map of Rotterdam and a calendar with lots of activities. In the park Heemraadsingel, around the corner from Casa La Rosa, the Singelding is located, a cozy place to drink a cup of coffee or to take part to the activities it organizes. In addition, keep yourself up to date with the workshops on healthy cooking that Fabiana organizes through her blog byebyesalsiccia.

name: Rental unit in Rotterdam · ★4.88 · 1 bedroom · 1 bed · 1.5 baths
description:
The literary haven: where hearts and bookshelves collide.
This urban oasis is as vibrant as the city itself.
From the exposed brick wall to the bookfilled nooks, every corner has been curated to embody the essence of Rotterdam's creative energy.
You have the entire apartment AND the coveted roof garden all to yourselves.
Imagine waking up in a chic, thoughtfully designed living space adorned with an eclectic mix of vintage finds, contemporary art and many, many books.

The space
The apartment is spacious and has a layout where all the spaces are connected. From the dining table, you have a view of the kitchen, allowing you to maintain contact with the chef while eating or simply enjoy the view of the kitchen interior. The open door of the bedroom provides a direct view of the rooftop terrace, creating a sense of space and connection with the outdoors. This layout creates a bright and airy atmosphere in the apartment, making it easy to move bet
neighborhood_overview:
Welcome to Rubroek, the hidden gem of Rotterdam that's just waiting for you to explore its delights. Get ready to immerse yourself in my neighbourhood where creativity, vintage charm and urban energy converge into a symphony of awesomeness.
As you stroll through the streets, you'll find artisinal coffee shops that rival the coolest cafes in the world. Grab a cup of meticulously brewed coffee or a unique herbal tea blend, and take a seat at a wooden table that's practically begging for your indie novel or sketchbook.
Vitage affecionados, this neighbourhood has your name written all over it. Explore thrift stores and boutiques that are filled with retro treasures waiting to be discovered.
And when the sun sets, the energy of Rubroek transforms yet again.
Imagine trendy eateries illuminated by fairy lights, bustling with laughter and conversation. Try unique fusion cuisine or savor artsanal pizza.
( list included in house manual).

neighborhood_overview:
Kralingen is a chic gem set in the east of Rotterdam. With an expansive backyard, where the rest of the city is always welcome for a barbecue: the Kralingse Bos.

The east of Rotterdam boasts the city’s biggest park: the Kralingse Bos. This green oasis is a major attraction for everyone seeking to flee the busy urban streets for some fresh air and peace and quiet. Not that it’s always quiet; the Kralingse Bos is often humming with pleasant activity on sunny weekend afternoons. Nature lovers enjoy a stroll through the forest. Sun-worshipers bask on the lake’s small beach. Toddlers splash around in the wading pool or play at the petting zoo. Bigger children will love exploring the climbing park. People rollerblade, jog and cycle to their heart’s content around the lake and go sailing on the lake, while snacks are served at tables on the waterfront terraces.

name: Townhouse in Rotterdam · ★4.64 · 2 bedrooms · 3 beds · 1 bath
description:
Our spacious (175m2) light and recently renovated house (2020) offers you best of both worlds: in the middle of nature, with the river 'de Rotte' right in front of our door, with a huge garden to enjoy the sun, but still close enough to reach the city centre by bicycle (12 min) or by foot (only 25 min). Even our Rotterdam friends envy us for this perfect spot! We rent out the house when we are out traveling ourselves, so it's fully equipped with everything you need!

The space
The full house is about 175 square meters and has four rooms upstairs: one bathroom, a kids room with a double kids bed, one ‘in between room’ and an attic with a kingsize bed. The attic is open with the ‘in between room’ and bathroom.

Our living room is open with the kitchen, has a fire place in the middle and a front door and a back door that leads to the balcony which is open to the garden. At the end of our garden you will enter our ‘landje’ (little land) where we have a play
neighborhood_overview: Nature and water. You'll see a lot of sports practiced here: running, biking, rowing, horse back riding. The people living here are a mix of young families and older friendly people.
host_about:
Together with my two boys, I live in one of the most beautiful parts of Rotterdam, at the river the Rotte. It always feels like holiday at home, surrounded by nature, and only 15 minutes (by bike!) from the citycentre.

We all love to travel, and meet new people. And next to traveling, photography is my passion and (lucky me!) profession. 
To combine both of these beautiful things in life makes me a real lucky and happy women! 

Before we bought this house we went traveling for 15 months all over the world, so we know that to really get to know a place, you have to meet and stay with the locals.
That is why we think AirBnB is a perfect medium, both as a guest ánd as a host!

name: Rental unit in Rotterdam · ★4.94 · 2 bedrooms · 5 beds · 1 bath
description:
The best apartment... on the coolest street... in the greatest city... of the Netherlands!

The space
This very spacious apartment is located right in the middle of the Witte de Withstraat. A great street full of arty outdoor cafés, bars, restaurants and shops. Take a look at any guidebook; this is the place you definitely won’t want to miss. So, what could be better than booking an apartment on this very street! Within walking distance of everything, with public transport and parking just around the corner, and a supermarket across the street. You’ll have an instant good time!

Living room:
Very large and full of light. Fully equipped.

The stylishly furnished living room is very large, with windows stretching the full width. It's wonderful to sit in the windowsill and look outside. No matter how busy and lively the street gets down there, up here it’s remarkably quiet. It’s all here: super-fast internet, a brand-new TV, a record player w
neighborhood_overview:
The Witte de Withstraat is a very lively street in the city center, with cultural institutions, restaurants, galleries, cool shops, and bars.
The apartment is right in the middle, across from a former school building, which is now a museum/gallery space for modern art (Tent/Witte de With).

The street is on the so-called Art Axis (Kunst-as) between the museums on the Leuvehaven and the Museum Park (Boijmans Van Beuningen, Het Nieuwe Instituut, the Natural History Museum, and the Kunsthal). The park is a short walk from the apartment. Festivals and markets are held here all year round (including the Parade, Open Air Cinema, Swan Market, Museum Night, etc.).

New in town? There's no better place from which to discover Rotterdam than from this apartment. A must see.

neighborhood_overview:
History
In the past, members of the more wealthy middle class took up residence in our neighboring houses. Later, the monumental buildings were mainly used as offices or institutions. In the last 20 years the neighborhood is pleasently inhibited by an artistic and entrepeneurial crowd.

name: Condo in Rotterdam · 2 bedrooms · 1 bed · 1.5 baths

Our spacious apartment is close to historical Delfshaven and only 3 km from city centre. The comfortable guest room, luxurious bathroom, kitchen and spacious livingroom and garden will guarantee a home away from home!

host_about:
We love travelling and exploring. Our biggest trip so far is spending 15 months in South East Asia and Australia. Most of it in Australia (Darwin) actually since we worked there as well.

Airbnb for us is getting to know other travellers and enjoy each others company. We love to listen to your stories and share ours. Off course we can give you great tips on Rotterdam and the surroundings. 
We're very relaxed but tidy people and like our guests to be as well. Please feel at home at our house and have fun while you're here. Welcome!

name: Rental unit in Rotterdam · ★4.75 · 1 bedroom · 1 bed · 1 private bath
description:
Excellent starting point for trips in and outside the city.
Basically a one room apartment, with private bathroom (shower) and basic cooking facilities.
Located in a relatively quiet street with mostly enough (paid 9 a.m. - 11 p.m.) parking space.
A 10 minute walk from Rotterdam CS public transport hub, concerthall De Doelen, Theater De Schouwburg and the Blijdorp ZOO.
There is a roof terrace exclusively for our guests, with a 360° view of the city skyline.

The space
The room is about 26m2 and has an adjacent private bathroom with shower cabin and washing machine. The toilet is in the hallway, and might also be used by the guests in the adjacent Studio.

There are facilities to make your own thee, coffee, or simple meal.

Guest access
Guests get a key of the front door which gives acces to the communal staircases. The room is located on the fourth floor.
Some guests find the stairs steep and/or narrow.
neighborhood_overview:
The neighbourhood was developed in the twenties and thirties of the 20th century. The street is very atmospheric with large trees and broad sidewalks, and most of the time enough parking space. On one end of the street there is a free accessable sports ground. On the other side it runs into the Heemraadssingel, a spacious area with a canal and a childrens playgroutd.
Two blocks away, the lively Middellandstraat has a multicultural atmosphere and wide range of shops, supermarkets, espressobars and lunchrooms.
host_about:
A freelance graphic and online designer, living and working In Rotterdam with Hennie and our son. 
I like the cultural offerings of the city, such as the museums, theater and cinema's.
In our holidays we like to combine culture with nature, and love to hike and bike.

name: Condo in Rotterdam · ★4.95 · 1 bedroom · 2 beds · 1.5 baths
description:
In this cozy, sparkling part in the middle of the city centre of Rotterdam, the Laurenskwartier, this lovely top floor apartment is for rent for for short stay or for a longer period of time.
The whole apartment contains 60m2 and is located near the outside market, "The Markthal", the "Meent" and the Cube houses.

The space
My apartment is located in the middle of the city centre in a part that is not too noisy at night. This is also due to the top floor (6th floor) where the apartment is located on.

Everything interesting that is happening in Rotterdam, you'll find on walking distance.
The Markthal, The Cube Houses, The Meent (famous shoppingstreet), the outside market, Het Kralingse bos, De Oude Haven (for foods and drinks), The Erasmus Bridge, multiple musea. You name it!

Guest access
You will have access to the whole apartment.
There is a bedroom with a Queensize bed and a living room with a Kingsize bed - you
neighborhood_overview:
The apartment is located in a very nice, hip and interesting area of Rotterdam.

- The apartment is on the top floor
- There are two elevators
- You will have a nice view of the skyline of Rotterdam
- You will find "The Markthal", the "Cube Houses", the outside market and the whole city centre literally around the corner or while standing on the balcony / gallery.
host_about:
Mijn naam is Ditha, 35 jaar en geboren en woonachtig in Rotterdam.
Sinds 2015 ben ik trotse eigenares van dit stadsappartement op de perfecte locatie!
Met mijn partner en baby samen ga ik binnenkort verhuizen naar een buitenwijk van Rotterdam omdat dit mooie stadsappartement gewoonweg te klein is om met z'n 3en in te blijven wonen.
Omdat ik in het verleden jarenlang dit appartement heb verhuurd via o.a. Airbnb, wil ik dat nu opnieuw doen voor een tijdje.
Dit keer is mijn gehele appartement beschikbaar via Airbnb, voorheen woonde ik er zelf ook en tegelijkertijd verhuurde ik een kamer voor 2 personen.

Ik woon, werk en studeer(de) in Rotterdam.
Sinds 2015 werk ik als zelfstandig Recruiter, Relatiemanager en Sollicitatiecoach.
Wat ik erg leuk vind aan mijn werk is het dagelijks schakelen met een diversiteit aan mensen en nationaliteiten op verschillende niveaus.

Naast dat er veel tijd gaat naar mijn lieve baby (dreumes alweer), besteed ik graag tijd aan surfen, mijn familie en vrienden, muziek volleybal, hardlopen en nieuwe plekken ontdekken.
Mijn favoriete muziek is Reggae; ik kan geen dag zonder!

Voor mij is deze plek de ideale plek van wonen; midden in het centrum, alles op loop- en fietsafstand. Ik ervaar hier het ultieme stadsgevoel met nog een beetje groen om mij heen!
Mijn appartement bevindt zich op de topetage waardoor je de hele dag kunt genieten van een mooi uitzicht.
Ik hoop dat mijn gasten zich, net als wij, ultiem thuis voelen op deze plek. Hier doen wij in ieder geval ons uiterste best voor!

neighborhood_overview:

name: Home in Rotterdam · ★4.74 · 1 bedroom · 2 beds · 1.5 shared baths
description:
Modern, spacious double bedroom with lots of windows, sunny mornings in a beautiful, renovated building.
Just a 7 min. metro ride to Rotterdam centre.
Public transport,taxi,supermarkets,nightshop,drugstores,market etc are right at your doorstep.

The space
I can offer you a comfy stay in a large, beautiful, double bedroom with marble floor and 3 large windows, with a view on a lovely, lively, little square.
Our house is situated only just a two minute walk from Historical Delfshaven and close to Rotterdam Centre.
The room has a small safe, refrigerator, tv, WiFi, large table/desk, two comfortable seats with coffee table and two wardrobes .
The room is accessable by glass sliding, lockable doors (privacy guaranteed by large curtains).
You share:
- a light a light, cozy kitchen with dishwasher, microwave oven, waterboiler, Nespresso Coffee machine and a dining table for four
- a beautiful, marble bathroom with shower and toil
neighborhood_overview:
Visit the district of Delfshaven, located close to vibrant Rotterdam centre. In multicultural Delfshaven no one is an outsider. The people are relaxed and friendly.
Our house is situated on a lovely, little, lively square with benches, an organic shop and McDonalds next door. Around the corner left and right you will find drugstores, money exchange, teller machine, restaurants, pubs, hairdressers,internetcafe, nailstudio, fresh fishstore, butcher, a landromat and a large variety of other small stores.
In romantic, 16th century Historical Delfshaven, close to our house, you will find a small beerfactory, art studio's , a large poolcafé and various nice restaurants.
Across the street is a large supermarket (Jumbo, open from 08:00 - 21:00 seven days a week). On Thursday and Saturday there is a large market at a 5 minute walking distance from the apartment, where you can buy a variety of products. Across from the building there is an evening supermarket, open till midnight.
host_about:
In my free time i enjoy beeing with friends, going out and going to festivals. 
In the summer i love to travel with my old-timer camper and visit festivals in Europe.

The building is situated on a lovely, little, lively square with benches, an organic shop and McDonalds next door. Around the corner left and right you will find drugstores, money exchange, teller machine, restaurants, pubs, hairdressers,internetcafe, nailstudio, fresh fishstore, boutcher, a landromat and a large variety of other small stores.
In romantic16th century Historical Delfshaven, close to the building, you will find a small beerfactory, art studio's , a large poolcafé and various nice restaurants.
Across the street is a large supermarket (Jumbo, open from 08:00 to 21:00 seven days a week). On Thursday and Saturday there is a large market at a 5 minute walking distance from the apartment, where you can buy a variety of products. name: Cottage in Oostvoorne · ★4.41 · 1 bedroom · 1 bed · 1 bath
description:
Ons vakantiehuisje staat op een heel rustig plekje met veel privacy en mooie natuur. Er zijn 2 grote terassen met tuinsets waarbij je heerlijk uit de wind kunt relaxen.
Het huisje is compleet ingericht en geschikt voor 4 personen. Er staat een schuurtje met 2 grote fietsen een 3 kleine kinderfietsen en driewieler voor de allerkleinste.
Het huisje staat op het vakantiepark " Kruiningengors " onderdeel van de molencaten vakantieparken en ligt langs het Brielse meer.

The space
Het houten vakantiehuisje is rond 30m2 groot en compleet gemoderniseerd en voorzien van alle gemakken. Er is 1 slaapkamer en een grote slaapbank in de woonkamer. Een Keuken en badkamer met toilet. De Keuken is zeer compleet ingericht en van alle gemakken voorzien zoals een grote koelvriescombinatie, nespresso cups koffiemachine, combimagnetron en 4-pits kookstel.
Recent is er een 80 liter boiler geplaatst zodat iedereen rustig kan douche. In het huisje is een kinderbedje aanwe
neighborhood_overview:
The house is situated at a holiday park 'Kruiningen Gors'. It's situated at the lake of Brielle with great outdoor options. take the bikes and njoy the historic town of Brielle with it's historic museum And harbour.
The beautifull beaches of the 'Maasvlakte' are 10 min by car with a lot of Free parkingplace or with a bike ( 7 KM).
Visit one of the most beautifull Dunes 'Voorse Duinen' by bike and go have a drink at the beaches of Rockanje, there are several Beachclubs.

The house has 2 mountainbikes, 2 citybikes and small childeren bikes You can use.
host_about:

Uiteraard  gaan we zelf ook graag op vakantie!

name: Home in Rotterdam · ★4.58 · 4 bedrooms · 5 beds · 1.5 baths
description:
Our special&spacious house with garden is situated in Rotterdam-West. We transformed the former 3 apartments into one spacious and modern house with special features like an industrial staircase, a monochrome blue bathroom and a ‘floating' kitchen.

The space
Our special and spacious house with garden is situated in the vibrant neighborhood of Rotterdam-West. The house is originally from the 1930’s but we recently completely renovated it ourselves. We transformed these former 3 apartments into one spacious (200 square meters) and modern family house with special features like an open industrial staircase, a monochrome blue epoxy bathroom and a ‘floating’ kitchen.
The house has four floors, a private garden and a communal garden. It consist out of a cozy kitchen (with oven, dishwasher and espresso-machine) and dining room with a table which suites 8 people, a separate toilet, a spacious living room, a master bedroom with a double bed and balcony, two children
neighborhood_overview:
Our house is part of a very special renovation project. Together with our 25 neighbors we got the houses for free from the local government and renovated them to everyones own wishes. There are a lot of creative people in our block; artists, designers and architects. The inner area of the block is a huge communal garden, making the place a green and quit oasis within the busy city.
The house is situated in the nice, vibrant neighborhood of Rotterdam-West. There are lots of shops, restaurants and coffee places in the direct area. It’s a 5-minute walk from the Van Nelle Fabriek (Unesco world heritage), which offers several events and art fairs during the year. For children there are playgrounds, a petting zoo, a park, the Blijdorp zoo and a very nice and unique ‘wild nature playground’ nearby. The stadium of the Sparta football club leis within the neighborhood; you can hear them cheer on Sunday afternoon.
The historic Delfshaven harbor is on a 5-minute walk, featuring centuri

name: Houseboat in Rotterdam · ★4.75 · 1 bedroom · 2 beds · 1 shared bath
description:
Welcome to Avontuur - the Ark for Healing, Wellbeing and Inner Growth. A historic clipper located in the heart of the city center of Rotterdam, one of the most exciting cities in the world for travelers! Avontuur is more then just a lodging space, it is an experience. An open ashramic space that offers yoga, meditation, workshops and concerts, as well as massage, coaching and an amazing spa experience. We have three beautiful spaces available, the Cute Room, the Cozy Room, and the Captains Hut.

The space
A truly unique and rejuvenating experience. Your own private room on an ark in the middle of the city centre. Flowing with the tides with the soothing sounds of the waves and the crackling of the fire place. Romantic, special and with all the amenities and comforts you are used to. If you prefer to upgrade, there is also a fully furnished Captains Hut available as well. Check the listing for more info: https://abnb.me/EVmg/Ciwy5Z5ilI

Guest access
neighborhood_overview:
You're right in the city centre. So all Rotterdam's highlights are within a 15 mins walk! Markthall, Erasmusbridge, Witte de Wittstraat, Tent, Meent, Coolsingel, Kunsthal, Lijnbaan, Booijman van Beuningen Museum, and the list goes on and on...

There is a restaurant right next door, a big super market, and other small shops in the neighbourhood.
host_about:
I am an architect, urban planner and self development trainer.

Born on the East African equator at sunrise on the first day of spring, I was raised throughout Africa, Asia and the Caribbean and have travelled to the far reaches of the world exploring different natures, cultures and spiritual teachings. 

Since 1991 I am based in the Netherlands and have taken my students of architecture and city planning to slums and natural disaster areas across the globe researching and implementing sustainable development. 

I also offer self development workshops and sessions, and run holistic retreats in the Caribbean.

My life is devoted to the betterment of the planet and its peoples. I use my mind, body and soul to support the individual and collective consciousness.

Together with the refrigerator, a TV (including netflix) and wireless internet it gives you j

The area is pleasantly vibrant with many options for a drink, quick meal or dinner just around the corner, on the Nieuwe Binnenweg street. Supermarkets and other shops are also located here. Our street is quite and calm, giving you a good rest at night!
host_about:

We like the idea to have nice people over here and support them with tips and tricks so they can get the best out of their stay. 

We speak English

Acces to all! Please keep in mind ; the livingroom is closed between 1am till 7am. The bedrooms, showers and restrooms are upstairs and open 24 hours.

We rent out bikes and longboards!

Spacious and bright 55m2 apartment with a modern fully equiped kitchen (dish washer, oven, microwave, refrigerator, electrical device). Enjoy the comfort of a gas fire place in winter or cool breeze of the airconditioning in summer.

neighborhood_overview:
Rotterdam’s Central District is the gateway to the city and home to many international companies and multinationals. The area buzzes with a constant stream of people coming and going, which can make you think of New York. A hive of activity. Rotterdam Central railway station is the Central District’s new landmark.

Central railway station, Concert hall De Doelen, Theatre Stadsschouwburg and Cinema Pathé are literally around the corner on a 3 minutes walking distance.

West-Kruiskade is a long shopping street with shops representing every corner of the world, from Chinese to Surinamese shops selling everything under the sun and from Dutch butcher’s to Turkish baker’s shops. Its many multicultural restaurants and snack bars make it the ideal place to find an exotic bite to eat. The West-Kruiskade is often compared similar to the famous Zeedijk in Amsterdam.

The Museumkwartier is a dynamic area where lots of museums, art institutions and galleries are based

The house is centrally located in a beautiful, quiet street in the city centre of Rotterdam. It's an ideal location to explore the local neighborhood and to discover downtown Rotterdam and the rest of the city. Close to subway, bus and tram.

The space
Souterrain (basement, half below street level)
The souterrain is half below street level and includes 2 bedrooms.
The 1st bedroom is the master bedroom with a double bed and a small desk. You can directly access the garden from the master bedroom.
The 2nd bedroom is a small but cosy single bedroom.
–
The souterrain also features a bathroom with an rainshower, sink and oak wood details. There is a separate toilet on this floor. In the hallway you can use the washing machine and dryer. We have a baby cot available.
neighborhood_overview:
The house is centrally located in a beautiful, quiet street in the city centre of Rotterdam. It's a ideal location to explore the local neighborhood and to discover downtown Rotterdam and the rest of the city. The Nieuwe Binnenweg, the longest and most vibrant alternative shopping street of Rotterdam, runs parallel (one block north) to our street. The street is a perfect example of Rotterdam’s diversity. It features a surprising mix of original and authentic stores, local bakeries and coffee places, as well as many bar/restaurants with food from all over the world. Just around our corner are two well-stacked supermarkets (one of which organic). Also around the corner you’ll find one of the best and most relaxed coffee bars in town (Urban Espresso Bar West) and grand cafe (Westerpaviljoen), various great restaurants (Italians, Gourmet Burger, French, Surinam) and a jazz club just around the corner.

Within five minutes walking distance you’ll find the excellent Rotterdam museu

You have your own private floor with a cosy sleeping room, toilet and bathroom on the absolute ideal location tin the centre of Rotterdam. You are in the middle of the culture hart and very close to all the hotspots of R'dam, cafe's, bars, terrases, restaurants, musea, shoppingcenter, festival activities etcetera.

The space
The room is nice, cosy and the vibe is good, warm and homely. The room has everything you need and it is in a nice neighbourhood. It is a great location to discover Rotterdam. The subwaystation Dijkzigt and tram are a few minutes walking.

There are lots of restaurants, shops, take-aways very nearby. I can give you lots of tips.

You are 5 minutes walking from the Witte the With street, with lots of bars, terrasses and restaurants.

In the summer there are lots of festivals in Rotterdam going on...

Vervoersmogelijkheden

The subway (Dijkzigt) is across the street. You can find the tram or bus
neighborhood_overview: You'll find everything specific to Rotterdam within a 10 - 20 minutes walk from my house. New buildings like the Markthal and the Central station, famous old buildings, the harbour, our famous skyline, the bridges, the musea, shoppingcenter etcetera
host_about:
When I travel, I use airbnb locations myself. It is more comfortable  and personal and is makes you feel more at home during your stay. You can find the house and neigbourhood that fits your personal style and needs. 
I can give you personal tips to see and where to go and how to get there. I know Rotterdam, the neighbourhood and what is going on here. So if you need personal advice, just ask me. 

I think airbnb is a very good development and that is why I decided to open my house too for travelers who want to discover Rotterdam. So mi casa es tu casa :)

Best located hostel in Rotterdam! Hostel Ani&Haakien is a true paradise for backpackers and adventurous who want to discover Rotterdam in an unique way only 600m away from Rotterdam Central station.

The space
If you travel alone and you are hunting for a social vibe, this is absolute the place to find it!

name: Rental unit in Hoek van Holland · ★4.97 · 2 bedrooms · 4 beds · 2 baths
description:
Op één van de mooiste plekjes van Hoek van Holland, aan de monding van de Nieuwe Waterweg treft u Villa Eb en Vloed. Alleen al het adembenemend uitzicht op het scheepvaartverkeer en het vergezicht op de Europoorthavens maken een bezoek aan dit vakantie-appartement tot een ware belevenis. Dit luxe vrijstaande, mediterraanse villa ligt in een rustige buurt, en op loopafstand van het strand en duinen. Als u Villa Eb en Vloed ziet, komt u al meteen in vakantiestemming.

The space
De etage bevat een grote woonkamer met open haard en keuken. Het balkon aan de voorkant van het huis geeft een ruim uitzicht over het fort van Hoek van Holland en het scheepvaartverkeer van de Nieuwe Waterweg.
Er zijn twee slaapkamer met ieder een badkamer, Op de gang is een extra toilet.

Guest access
U heeft een apart opgang naar de verdieping en er is vrij toegang naar het dakterras.

name: Loft in Rotterdam · ★4.89 · 2 bedrooms · 2 beds · 2 baths
description:
Our spacious penthouse apartement is in the middle of the center, close to the market hall, cubic houses and the bar street Witte de Withstraat...

You will really enjoy the amazing views, the lovely roof terrace, the wonderful kitchen, the luxurious interior of the living room and the comfortable beds.

Our place is perfectly suitable for couples, solo travelers and business travelers. If there are more than four travelers, we have a comfortable air bed.

Other things to note
Since we are located in the center of the city, there are always some city noises. But since we are so high up, we hardly hear anything.

host_about:
We like to travel and discover the world, both close by and very far away.

We love to cook and bake, but when we're traveling we prefer to try local restaurants.

We are into arts, theatre, literature and film and we also like to go clubbing.

name: Rental unit in Rotterdam · ★4.81 · 1 bedroom · 2 beds · 1.5 baths
description:
This apartment contains all modern conveniences and is centrally located, within view of the Erasmus bridge and close to both metro & tram.
The price includes Breakfast.

The Witte de With quarter is the cultural and gastronomical heart of Rotterdam and is only a 4 min walk away, and close to many Points Of Interest such as the Markthal, Schouwburgplein, Euromast, Spido, museums & shops.

The apartment is suitable for solo's, couples and business travellers, and has 24hr access via a key-safe.

The space
The apartment is compact at 30 sq. m but has a separate lounge, bedroom, kitchen, douche/wc and rear balcony. It has been completely refurbished this year and is fully contained with all modern conveniences.

It will accommodate 2 people comfortably. There is an extra sofa that transforms into a bed and can sleep an extra guest.

Guest access
Guests can access and use all the space and facilities within the
neighborhood_overview:
Known as the StadsDrieHoek (City Triangle), you are right in the centre of the city with a view of the Erasmus Bridge.
A colourful and busy neighbourhood, more suited to singles, couples and trios or a couple with 1 child.

name: Barn in Rotterdam · ★4.81 · 1 bedroom · 1 bed · 1 bath
description:
The guesthouse is situated in an old barn. The farm itself is situated in the out-back of Rotterdam in a smal hamlet, the hamle is called 'De Kandelaar'. In this hamlet live only arround 30 people! It is the perfect spot between the (big) cities Rottedam, Schiedam and Delft!

A perfect option to combine the city with the nature!

Our farm is only 5km from the centre of Schiedam, 8km of the centre of Delft and 12km of the centre of Rotterdam! And only 30 minutes (by car) from the nearest beach!

The space
The guesthouse is suiteble for 2 (adult) persons.

Below you will find the entrance, te bathroom/toilet and the modern kitchen with breakfast table.

On the first floor you will find our large livingroom with woodstoove for cosy nigths during the winter and next to the livingroom you will find our nice bedroom!

Nice to know; in the guesthouse we have airconditioning to heat up and cool down the place. You will f
neighborhood_overview:
The old farm is situated in a beautiful piece of nature, between the big cities! There are only about 20 houses and a couple of months ago a new restaurant opened it's doors! It is only a 5 minute walk from the guesthouse!

It is a lovely area for walking and/or cycling! Also the old city centres of Schiedam, Delft and Rotterdam are pretty nearby and can be reached by bike easily!

Also the beach is pretty nearby! You can drive to Hoekv an Holland in 25 minutes or to the boulevard of Scheveningen in 40 minutes! In 2023 Rotterdam realized a new subway line and from now on you can take the subway all the way from Schiedam to the beach of Hoek van Holland! For more information visit the RET website of 9292ov (website or app on your phone)
host_about: A young couple living on a former farm in the outback of Rotterdam! Nature next to city! Together with our 2 little daughters and our family dog Izzi.

Ground floor apartment, with a garden on the south, Living room with piano, kitchen (dishwasher, oven, blender, watercooker, fridge, refridgerator and you can use everything in there), bathroom with washingmachine and dryer.
2 double bedroom
There is WIFI.

name: Townhouse in Rotterdam · ★4.50 · 1 bedroom · 1 bed · 1 private bath
description:
The room has a great view over the canal and Historical Delfshaven. A very picturesque area in Rotterdam. On the same floor there's a big bathroom with bath & a separate toilet. The area has very nice places to have breakfast, lunch and dinner. The centrum of Rotterdam is very nearby, only 15 min. walk. Tram and metro are 2 min. walk. Or you can easily rent a bike at several companies. You can also use the yogaroom. You can make your own coffee and tea. Feel at home!

The space
Historisch Delfshaven is een prachtig authentiek stukje Rotterdam, met pittoreske woonboten en huizen. Omgeven door gezellige restaurantjes aan het water voel je je er direct thuis. De kamer heeft een magnifiek uitzicht op het haventje met badkamer en toilet. Badkamer en toilet zitten op de tweede verdieping.( Zelf verblijf ik op de eerste verdieping, met eigen sanitaire voorzieningen.) De kamer is licht en ingericht in een eenvoudige stijl. Het huis dateert uit 1600 en was 1 van de eerst
neighborhood_overview:
Historisch Delfshaven bevindt zich op 15 minuten loopafstand via de langste winkelstraat van heel Nederland.
Historisch Delfshaven is een uniek stukje oud Rotterdam Met prachtige en bijzondere gevelhuizen waan je je even in de tijd terug. En met alle fijne restaurantjes in de buurt, kun je heerlijk ontbijten, lunchen en dineren. Of met je picknickmand aan het water. Of zelfs een bootje huren. De supermarkten en biologisch winkels zijn op geringe loopafstand. Ook ben je dichtbij het Euromastpark en kun je per watertaxi bijv. naar Hotel Newyork.
host_about:
We like to share this house wich others, in this beautiful neighbourhoud , with great vieuw and nice people. 

I'm a yoga teacher ( you can practise with me if you like) or use my yogaroom. I love the sea, i love animals, i love nature & i love to dance. Dimitri is a sporty man with great passion for kitesurf & Tai Chi.

name: Rental unit in Rotterdam · ★4.78 · 1 bedroom · 1 bed · 1.5 baths
description:
My apartment has a view on the beautiful Vroesenpark in the monumental Blijdorp district. Metro station is close by (3 min walk) and central station as well as city centre are easily reachable by bike (10 minutes).
Grocery store, restaurants and cafe's close by.
The apartment has a fully equipped kitchen, sleeping room, living room, bathroom, separate toilet and a balcony.
You’ll love my place because of the coziness, the high ceilings, the location and the views.

Registration number
0599 8710 5E89 CF54 B64E
neighborhood_overview:
Blijdorp is a neighbourhood in northern Rotterdam and is part of the borough Noord. The up-town neighbourhood has around 9500 inhabitants.

The construction was between 1931 and 1940 and this part of town was not affected by the bombing of Rotterdam of May 14. This is why it has been nominated bij the municipality Rotterdam for the status of conservation area.

Blijdorp is closely associated with the Rotterdam Zoo in the same district.
host_about: Young professional, likes sports, traveling and meeting new cultures.

name: Houseboat in Rotterdam · ★4.76 · 2 beds · 1 bath
description:
Welcome to Avontuur - the Ark for Healing, Wellbeing and Inner Growth. A historic clipper located in the heart of the city center of Rotterdam, one of the most exciting cities in the world for travelers! Avontuur is more then just a lodging space, it is an experience. An open ashramic space that offers yoga, meditation, workshops and concerts, as well as massage, coaching and an amazing spa experience. We have three beautiful spaces available, the Cute Room, the Cozy Room, and the Captains Hut.

The space
A truly unique and rejuvenating experience. Your own private ark in the middle of the city centre. Flowing with the tides with the soothing sounds of the waves and the crackling of the fire place. Romantic, special and with all the amenities and comforts you are used to.

Guest access
You have your own entrance through the steer hut, where you can also lounge in the hammock, or enjoy the sunset on your own private roof terrace. Hammocks, cus
neighborhood_overview:
You're right in the city centre. So all Rotterdam's highlights are within a 15 mins walk! Markthall, Erasmusbridge, Witte de Wittstraat, Tent, Meent, Coolsingel, Kunsthal, Lijnbaan, Booijman van Beuningen Museum, and the list goes on and on...

There is a restaurant right next door, a big super market, and other small shops in the neighbourhood.
host_about:
I am an architect, urban planner and self development trainer.

Born on the East African equator at sunrise on the first day of spring, I was raised throughout Africa, Asia and the Caribbean and have travelled to the far reaches of the world exploring different natures, cultures and spiritual teachings. 

Since 1991 I am based in the Netherlands and have taken my students of architecture and city planning to slums and natural disaster areas across the globe researching and implementing sustainable development. 

I also offer self development workshops and sessions, and run holistic retreats in the Caribbean.

My life is devoted to the betterment of the planet and its peoples. I use my mind, body and soul to support the individual and collective consciousness.

name: Guest suite in Rotterdam · ★4.83 · 1 bedroom · 1 bed · 1.5 baths
description:
Private room in Kralingen, near forest, lake, shopping and EUR. Own shower and washbasin. Air conditioning. Room adjacent to studio by toilet which is shared only during workshops and lessons, mostly in the afternoon. Pantry in studio with coffee/tea, microwave, refrigerator, stove, pans and cutlery. Pantry is in the first instance for a workshop and, therefore, not always squeaky clean (paint etc). Own access. Metro 50 meters. 10 minutes to city centre. Brought bicycles can be stored indoors.

The space
A small room (6 x 2, 5 m) but with private shower. Toilet shared with workshop space only during workshops, rest of time private. Wi-Fi Internet access. Air conditioning! Private access by door 78. Use patio. In the studio is a pantry which can be used, (not always very clean, paint etc) with all the amenities such as coffee and tea, where also fridge, microwave and cooking stuff. No washing machine. In the studio during workshops and lessons (mostly in the afte
neighborhood_overview: Shopping street around the corner, town is very close (10 min with metro). Near the Kralingse plas and wood. Metro and tram 100 meters. Quiet. Near EUR. Centre of Kralingen. Historic district. A lot of restaurants are found here.
host_about:
Ik ben docent beeldende vorming en geef workshops en cursussen aan kinderen en volwassenen in eigen atelier. Ik maak zelf schilderijen in gemengde technieken.
Het atelier ligt achter het huis. Ik fiets, zwem en schaats graag, en bezoek vaak theater, film en concerten in Rotterdam e.o. Ik heb 3 dochters, die het huis uit zijn (vandaar de airbnb activiteiten). Sinds 2020 heb ik een geweldig leuke kleinzoon. 
Het huis waarin ik woon is uit 1903,wat enorm leuk is maar ook niet erg onderhoudsvriendelijk ;). En er zijn veel op en afstapjes. 
Verder heb ik sinds 2017 de ziekte van Parkinson maar daar ben ik nog niet erg door beperkt gelukkig. Veel bewegen (sport) helpt! Daarom af en toe tremor.

name: Serviced apartment in Rotterdam · ★4.75 · 1 bedroom · 1 bed · 1 bath
description:
Our studio is located in the famous and most vibrant street in the heart of Rotterdam, de Witte de Withstraat. Near the studio are various bars and restaurants, public transport, shopping area, supermarket,museum and much more. You’ll love my place because of the elegant and trendy interior, the city view, the location and the ambiance. My place is excellent for couples, solo adventurers and business travelers.

The studio will make you feel home away from home <3

The space
This 35 sqm. studio loft is situated on the third floor in a historical building which has survived the WW II bombings and is suitable for longer stays. It recently has been renovated and gives you a nice view on the hotspot of Rotterdam.

The location on the third floor gives you a private and cosey feeling. Looking out the window gives you a nice cit view. The loft studio is spacious and light. You have private use of bathroom, washing machine, sofa, king-size bed and
neighborhood_overview:
Witte de Withstraat is the place to be when visiting Rotterdam. It has many restaurants that are open till late and amazing bars with seating outside. It is a two minute walk to the nearest tube station and three minute walk to the shopping district.

Furthermore it is nearby the Coolsingel which houses the Rotterdam City hall, and it's nearby the shopping boulevard of the city. If you don't like the big shops you can also visite the small boutiques on the Van Oldenbarneveldstraat, Karel Doormanstraat or de Meent.
If you have a panache for art, local products or like to buy things from local artists, entrepreneurs, hobbyist/amateurs, the Witte de Withstraat is dotted with (vintage and pop-up) shops/boutiques & galleries that sell these.

It's a 10 minute walk from:
- the newly constructed Markthal, which you really should visite to buy some local products or eat something at the venues.
- the Cubic houses
- the Eramusburg where you can explor

description:

name: Condo in Rotterdam · ★4.88 · 3 bedrooms · 4 beds · 1.5 baths
description:
Cosy apartment with three bedrooms, bathroom, seperate restroom, open plan kitchen and woodburner in the spacious livingroom.
The city center is 5-10 minutes away on bike or public transport, groceries at walking distance.
Situated in a stately lane near impressive Heemraadsingel, ample parking space available.

The space
Dutch+English.
Het apartement biedt een uitstekende uitvalsbasis om Rotterdam te verkennen, op minder dan tien minuten fietsen van Rotterdam Centraal. De verbinding met het OV is meer dan prima, met drie trams en een buslijn die om de hoek halteren. Het is een ruim apartement van in totaal 135m2, waarvan het grootste deel toegankelijk is voor gasten.
De twee ruime slaapkamers boven beschikken beide over een tweepersoons bed. Beneden is een derde slaapkamer met een een persoonsbed. Er zijn ook nog twee kinderbedden. De keuken is van alle gemakken voorzien en volledig toegerust. Gasten krijgen de beschikking over de vaatwasse
neighborhood_overview:
Dutch+English
Ons deel van het Nieuwe Westen is rustig, met een grote kinderspeeltuin om de hoek. De buurt stamt uit het begin van de vorige eeuw en de straat staat vol met monumentale kastanjes.

Our part of the neighbourhood is quiet, with a large children's playground around the corner. The neighbourhood originates at the start of the 20th century and the lane is planted with stately chestnut trees.
host_about:
Enjoying life, married, working in a heritage organisation. Love to have dinner with friends or just hang out. I'm a foodie who loves the cinema - but then who isn'nt?

We're both outgoing people interested in art, politics, the world. We spend a lot of time visiting theatre, music and bars.

description:

Enjoy the spacious, light bathroom with a big shower and bath, lovely view in the morning looking to the grass covered dike watching the sunrise, lots of space in the kitchen to cook and linger in the soft, leather chairs. Large lounge couches to relax after a long, active day. Suitable for couples or business travelers

The space
Our house is perfect for a couple who loves active relaxation and nature, foodies will love the wood-fired pizza oven, the well-stocked modern, spacious kitchen with all the tools you need to cook a nice meal. With love and dedication we have built a huge glass-covered terrace of oak structure and the cast iron patio stove ensures warm feet morning or evening, whenever you want. There is also a 100% private sauna overlooking the green garden. The lake nearby is ide
neighborhood_overview:
Europes largest rowing course surrounded by vast nature, a lot of waterfowl and songbirds.
There's a wide beach and the waterski track at 7 minutes cycling distance at the lake which has many small islands where you can chillout in the sun or watch birds.
Beautiful cycling routes are at your doorstep, as our house is located along one.
We are a 10 minute drive away from boat and kayak rental in a recreation area, 'De Rottermeren'.
host_about:
To experience places of the world is what makes my world bigger. 
When I travel: Bringing home the best local food and habits of a country and share this with my friends and family is what I love to do, and I'm happy to return the favor to you. Discover this region while I'm away and share your experience with your friends!
Using Airbnb on my trips and travels is a great way to get to know the local people..
When I don't travel i live in Rotterdam Netherlands: Often I enjoy a walk around the lake and spot some beautiful birds. Every now and then I can't resist the best raw 'Haring' at the local shop. My garden is a place I feel happy to work in, love active relaxing : ) I work at our company that is specialized in installing luxury bathrooms. Tiling, wiring and administration are my share. And besides that I'm privileged to help people in my practice to get their vitality back by treating them with bioresponse. Very different activities but I like them both very much.

neighborhood_overview: Stately canals, quiet streets and the beloved Vroesenpark: the Blijdorp district is not just a protected cityscape. The green parks are popular with residents, who sunbathe and barbecue in the summer. The pre-war houses are very suitable for families and the neighborhood offers something for everyone, Diergaarde Blijdorp for the little ones (actually for everyone, of course), dog playground Bello for the four-legged friend and the Roel Langerakpark for the athletes among us. Both train and RandstadRail make the district very accessible.

Een gezellige overnachting locatie met bar voor uw gezelschap.
Rondom bruist het scheepvaartkwartier.
Uitgaan/centrum, musea, en rondvaartboten zijn op loopafstand.
Een fantastisch vrij uitzicht op de rivier en "de kop van zuid", het "Manhattan aan de Maas"
NB: Slaapzak mee, matrassen en kussens zijn door ons fris overtrokken.

The space
Matrassen en kussens zijn door ons fris betrokken. U neemt alleen uw slaapzak of eigen dekbed mee of huurt bij ons a € 15,- het "linnenpakket" bestaande uit een dekbed, overtrek plus badhanddoek.
Bier van de tap kan bij ons besteld worden a € 3,50- per Ltr.
Dekbedhuur en/of Bierverbruik worden aan boord contant afgerekend.
7 van de 10 hutten hebben een eigen wasbak.
Er zijn twee Toiletten (Alleen toiletpapier meespoelen!) ook m
neighborhood_overview:
Men kan plezierig rond de haven naar het Euromast(park) wandelen, uit varen gaan met de Spido havenrondvaart of (snelle) watertaxi gaan lunchen in "Hotel New York" of dwalen over de SS "Rotterdam" !
Musea en Euromast(park) op loopafstand.
Het monumentale scheepvaartkwartier herbergt vele cafe's en restaurants.
Fietsenhuur op loopafstand. (Schiedamsedijk; "Centrum bikes")
Het is goed stappen in de Witte de Withstraat! (400 meter wandelen), Witte Aap, NRC,dan los in de Maassilo, Skihut, BAR, Tofler, Beurs, Beurt, Rotown, Get Back, Villa Thalia, Zimmermann, Stadscafe, etc
host_about:
Uw gastheer is familievader en voert als kapitein samen met vrouw en zonen de zeilrederij Vof Europe Sailing.
Ik woon met familie nabij de te verhuren zeilschepen 'Luciana', 'Catherina' en 'Marie Galant' in de Veerhaven op ons woon/vergaderschip de 'Schoneveld'.
Mijn favoriete reisbestemmingen zijn de te bezeilen landen als Noorwegen, Deense eilanden, Oost en Noordzeekusten en Gomera, La Palma en El Hierro.
Ik heb weinig tijd voor boeken, maar lees graag reisverhalen en (maritieme)geschiedenis.
Mijn vrouw en ik gaan graag met het hele gezin naar de bioscoop.
Ik ben graag gastheer en stel het op prijs vooraf met de klant overleg te voeren, kennis te maken en te peilen wat verlangd wordt.
Bij een verblijf op een schip gaat veiligheid voor alles en dus ben ik dag en nacht mobiel bereikbaar.
Mijn levensmotto is dat wat ik in werktijd mag doen mijn hobby is!

name: Townhouse in Rotterdam · ★4.79 · 1 bedroom · 1 bed · 1.5 baths
description:
Our Garden Room apartment is in the center of the city with great places to meet, shop, dine out or have breakfast within a hundred meters. Out the front door you will be in the bustling atmosphere of the city and at the back the doors opens to a garden with birds, trees and flowers. The garden is NO smoking.
The apartment was renovated in November 2022 with a great bathroom and a shower that no longer opens to the kitchen.

The space
Our house is in the old part of the city center. It was built in 1888 and is five stories high with wooden floors. You have a whole floor available in the raised basement which is a few steps down from street level and almost flush with the garden level. You have windows at front and back, so there’s plenty of light. You enter through the left front door. You share the hall immediately behind the door with the first floor, which is a few steps up. This floor is available as an apartment on Airbnb as well.

host_about:
Ik zal mezelf kort voorstellen. Mijn naam is Mark, een jonge ondernemer met een grote diversiteit in interesses. In de afgelopen zeven jaar heb ik drie bedrijven opgericht, van enkele webshops tot een innovatieve betaaloplossing. Het geeft mij veel energie om mij bezig te houden met nieuwe oplossingen en ideeën en deze ook daadwerkelijk handen en voeten te geven.

Mijn voornaamste hobby is muziek. Zo speel ik vanaf mijn 7e intensief klassiek piano. Momenteel geef ik ook pianoles en masterclasses. Daarnaast ga ik graag naar muziekfestivals. 

Tot slot ben ik dol op sporten. Squash, fitness, skieën en golf zijn mijn favorieten. 

Op het moment woon ik in het prachtige scheepsvaartskwartier, een van de mooiste plekjes in Rotterdam. Aangezien ik een kamer over heb wil ik deze graag beschikbaar stellen om anderen het gemak en plezier van deze locatie te laten ervaren. 

Inmiddels woon ik al bijna tien jaar in Rotterdam, en ken ik de stad op mijn duimpje. Als verhuurder deel ik deze ervaring dan ook graag  om het optimale uit je verblijf te halen!

neighborhood_overview:
The apartment is situated in the area called Provenierswijk and is a haven of tranquillity, in spite of being within close proximity of the city centre. The public park 'Vroesenpark' is located near the complex and is a very vibrant place in the summer with locals getting together.

The area hides different excuisite restaurants like Dunya Locanta, Le Nord and for the pizza lovers there's La Pizza, the best pizza place in Rotterdam. For a coffee there are different great places in and around Central Station. Two supermarkets are on 4 minutes walking distance from the apartment.

Just on the other side of the Central Station is where the vibrant day- and nightlife starts. Different areas for a great night out like Central District, Stadhuisplein, Witte de Withstraat and Oude Binnenweg are within walking distance or easily reachable by public transport.
host_about:
Hi there!

Thanks for looking into my profile! :)
I am a 31 year old Dutch guy, living in the heart of Rotterdam. As I'm writing this (February 2017), I have used Airbnb only for my own travels. In March that will change. I will visit Peru for a month and I'd be happy to let my apartment be of use for you! I am quite thrilled about this trip, as I've never been to South America before and heard great stories about it.

When I am not travelling, I work as a coach for people who depend on a social benefit for their income and have a very long distance to the labour market. I try to help them to work on their problems by coaching them and by connecting them to the right professionals, projects and organizations. Besides work, I like to hang out with friends, travel, run, cycle, go to the gym and play football.

It's purely Dutch design and you definitely will fall in love! Wikkelboat's smart interior offers you great comfort with airco & heating & is perfectly isolated. It has a luxurious jacuzzi on front terrace which is included. Public transport is nextdoor and we offer cycling, breakfast & boating as optional services.

The space
"Wikkelen" is the Dutch word for wrapping; this boathouse (30m2) is mainly made of wrapped cardboard and it's loaded with luxury facilities. At both sides of the Wikkelboat a terrace of 6x2.5m2 is located, with a lounge set, seats to enjoy the view on the White House or to just jump into the water. You'll definitely enjoy the tranquillity at the water while being in the city heart of Rotterdam..and you won't notice it from the noise...the house is also well isolated
neighborhood_overview: The Maritime District is the most beautiful area of Rotterdam; it has it all: musea (Maritiem Museum, Mariniersmuseum & Comics Museum), loads of ho(s)tels, many highraise buildings and great restaurants. The area is very safe, peaceful and quiet at streetlevel.

description:
Charming two-story apartment (120 square metres) in a lovely neighborhood. It's nice and quiet, next to a lake, a park and a playground. And downtown is only a 5-minute train ride away.

The apartment has a large rooftop deck (40 square metres) overlooking the surroundings, including the playground.

Also, it has an Apple TV and 3 HomePod Minis in the living room and 1 in the master bedroom. You can use voice control to turn the lights on and off, or to play music.

The space
The apartment was built in 1930, and has lots of charming little details from that era. It's spacious, bright and has a fireplace (and lots of wood included for free) to keep you warm on chilly nights.

The rooftop deck has a view on the playground and you'll also catch a glimpse of the lake. It also includes a Weber Kettle Grill, and there are lots of BBQ books to give you inspiration.

name: Loft in Rotterdam · ★4.84 · 1 bedroom · 1 bed · 1.5 baths
description:
Light studio appartement with sunny garden. The neighbourhood is known for it's many artists and has a very old (1800's) centre. The Maastunnel will take you 10 minutes on bicycle to historic Delfshaven and 15 minutes to the city centre of Rotterdam. Take the Ferry to Katendrecht (6 minutes) and you will find yourself in the urban industrial part of the city with many restaurants & bars.
The ‘Zuiderpark’ is at walking distance and grocery shops are around the corner.
Beach at 40min drive by car

The space
Spacious studio apartment with very high ceiling. Nice and cool in the summer, cosy in the winter. Flatscreen with USB connection. Wireless connection (Chromecast) between your phone/ iPad and television to watch Netflix or YouTube for example. Rain-shower, separate toilet.

Guest access
The groundfloor studio has it’s own entrance. You can also enter the garden and have a nice Bbq If you like (bbq available) or Enjoy your espresso
neighborhood_overview:
Close to Ahoy, the Classic cruise ship ‘SS Rotterdam’, University Hospital Erasmus, Katendrecht (visit Fenix Food hall and try the craft beers of our city brewery ‘Kaapse Brouwers’), historic Delfshaven, Euromast.

The ‘Kralingse plas en bos’ (large lake and forest in the city) is 35minutes on bike and great to rent a boat or SUP.

If you like nature, visit the Biesbosch. A ferry takes you along the Maas river to Dordrecht. A quicker option is by bike and train. You can hire a boat or kayak to experience this beautiful area.
I can provide you all the info you need when you are here.
