name: Rental unit in Rotterdam · ★4.89 · 2 bedrooms · 1 bed · 1 bath
description:
A charming furnished house with attached sunny jungle garden. Perfect for a 2 persons. It is located in a calm yet hip and upcoming north part of the city. In just a 1 minute walk and 5 minutes tram ride you are in the buzz of Rotterdam's city center and central train station. Lovely restaurants, shops and supermarkets in the area.

The space
The house itself is an ideal stay for two people. It's 60m2, modern & bright and has a 65m2 garden with sun in the afternoon from 13pm until 5pm in summer.

The kitchen has all needed cooking equipment and is situated together with a cosy livingroom with direct access to the garden. There is a seperate spacious bedroom with a comfy bed for two and a bathroom with shower and bath. And a seperate toilet.

The apartment is great for remote working as well, with fast wifi (240Mbps), a seperate desk and the possibility to create 2 work spacing thanks to the doors between the living room and diner table room.
neighborhood_overview: You're staying in the neighborhood: Blijdorp. Being right next to central station, the neighborhood has quick access to almost any area of the city and it is close to the highways A20 and A13. It’s also one of the places to live in Rotterdam that benefits from a lovely parks: the Vroesenpark and Roel Langerakpark. The district is up and coming, with plenty of lovely shops and restaurants to visit.
host_about: My name is Evie Janssen, 29 years old and I live with my boyfriend in a charming house in Rotterdam. I have a fulltime job as an IT consultant within the FMCG business. I love to cycle, go out and travel around the world.

name: Condo in Rotterdam · ★4.90 · 1 bedroom · 1 bed · 1 shared bath
description:
We are Nico and Pan, a couple of a Dutch, born in Rotterdam and a Chinese housewife. Our home is clean, tidy, stylish and safe with a million dollars view over the skyline of Rotterdam. As it is located about 100 meters away from the metro station "Maashaven" (line D and E), you can easily go to the city center or to the train station. Come and explore this part of the world!
PS: We offer one bedroom to our guests, so it means we also live in our apartment.

The space
Our apartment is to the harbour side. A four-star hotel is occupied a few floors below in the same building, so it means you can get a much better view by paying much less. It is all about the harbours and the Architectural arts in Rotterdam. If you could enjoy the breathtaking sunset with a glass of wine in your hand, you would agree with us.

Guest access
We would like to share our bathroom, toilet, refrigerator with our guests.

As

name: Home in Rotterdam · ★4.66 · 1 bedroom · 1 bed · 2 shared baths
description:
Welcome to the Cube House, the most special housing experience in Rotterdam! The Cube is located in the center, a few steps from the Markthal, the Old Harbor, and restaurants. It can be reached via public transport. Your private room, with its queen size beds and additional air mattress, is suitable for 2 people. Shared kitchen and big living room are available to enjoy a relaxing moment. Because of the many stairs, the house might not suitable for very young children and the elderly.

The space
The house has two shared bathrooms with bathtub/shower and toilet. Also a washer/dryer, hairdryer and iron are available. The kitchen is fully equipped, with all usual equipment like pots, pans and cutlery that you will need so you don't have to buy these essentials yourself. In the living room we created a small library with a selection of books about the city, architecture and harbor so you don't need to bring your own guidebook.

Supermarket 3 min

Great apartment to explore the city of Rotterdam and relax afterwards in your private Jacuzzi/Sauna! Corona ready

name: Rental unit in Rotterdam · ★4.85 · 2 bedrooms · 3 beds · 1 bath
description:
Op 6 minuten lopen is mooi en rustig, historisch Delfshaven.
Leuk om te eten en drinken.
Looproutes naar centrum kan ik aanbevelen en goed bereikbaar met het openbaar vervoer.
Mijn appartement is, gerenoveerd, vintage ingericht met uitzicht op het Schie-kanaal.
Indeling: woonkamer, eetkamer, 2 slaapkamers, 1 slaapkamer met zeer goed twee persoons- (M-line matras) bed, 1 slaapkamer met stapelbed, volledig uitgeruste keuken, wasmachine, badkamer/toilet televisie en een balkon.

The space
Mijn ruime, lichte en sfeervol ingerichte appartement is voorzien van alle moderne gemakken.
Het uitzicht op de Schie, een druk bevaard kanaal tussen de Rotterdamse haven en Delft geeft u het gevoel echt in havenstad Rotterdam te zijn.
Het is heerlijk om naar buiten te kijken. En het is zeer eenvoudig om bv. s'avonds nog even een wandelingetje te maken en een drankje te drinken.

Zie ook CHEZ ALET inst gram.

Guest access
neighborhood_overview:
In de omgeving zijn meerder gezellige winkels, restaurantjes, cafés en bezienswaardigheden.
Op 500 meter ligt historisch Delfshaven, een authentiek stukje Rotterdam, met o.a. de Pelgrimskerk, waar de "Pilgrims fathers" in 1620 naar de "nieuwe wereld' zijn vertrokken. In de U.S. nog steeds een begrip.
De bekende zeeheld Piet Hein heeft zijn sporen achtergelaten in deze omgeving.
In Delfshaven liggen bewoonde platbodems en het staat bekend om de pittoreske gevels. Verder is hier stadsbrouwerij de Pelgrim gevestigd.
De Euromast en "Het park" liggen op 1,5 km afstand van het appartement. Dit is een leuke wandeling langs de Schie en brengt u naar de Nieuwe Maas. Waar de Haven van Rotterdam zichtbaar wordt.
In deze omgeving zijn er veel toeristische attracties te vinden. Onder andere de Veerhaven, het Wereld museum, de Kunsthal, het Depot van Boijmans etc..
U kunt met de waterbus naar Dordrecht en Kinderdijk varen, een rondvaart door de Rotterdamse hav
host_about:
Hallo,
Als ik thuis ben en mijn koffie drink kijk ik graag naar de vrachtschepen die voorbij varen. Dit geeft mij het gevoel in een havenstad te wonen.
Ik maak graag wandelingen door de stad en drink mijn biertje in toeristisch Delfshaven wat 5 min lopen van mijn huis ligt. 
Hier ligt veel geschiedenis van de stad. Vanuit deze plek is Rotterdam min of meer uitgebouwd. Het is daar rustig en mooi. Het lijkt een beetje op Amsterdam met zijn grachten en pakhuiswoningen.

Ik ben een creatief persoon en ben graag fysiek bezig.
In mijn B&B zul je de sfeer van creativiteit kunnen proeven.
De inrichting van heel mijn huis heb ik in de stijl van het huis wat in 1924 gebouwd is. Bovendien is het een bewuste keuze om te recycelen.

Naast mijn benb vind ik het heerlijk om in mijn tuin te tuinieren.  Ik schilder graag en maak tassen. 
Ik help anderen hun huis te reorganiseren en opknappen.
Dus u zou mij in kluskleding aan kunnen treffen ;-)

Sinds kort bezit ik een camperbusje. Ik ben daar erg blij mee en ga graag naar natuulijke campings waar het vaak mooi, rustig en vriendelijk is. Bovendien is daar qua natuur veel te beleven.

name: Townhouse in Rotterdam · ★4.92 · 1 bedroom · 1 bed · 1.5 shared baths
description:
This over 1 century old, restored quay house is located on the edge of the Noordereiland.
The center is within walking distance, there is a good bus connection and bicycles are for rent in the street. The stylishly furnished room is located on the top floor. Adjacent is a spacious roof terrace, with beautiful views over the roof of Rotterdam.
Optionally, the front room can be rented, with two extra beds.

The space
Two sliding doors in the bedroom provide direct access to the roof terrace. At night you can enjoy the starry sky and lights of the city.
The box spring bed of 1.60 consists of two separate mattresses. The beds are linked. You can indicate in advance if you prefer two separate duvets.
Next to the bedroom you also have a small, cozy sitting room. There is a comfortable sitting area, a large table with four chairs, a cupboard with books, games and crockery. In this room you can have breakfast or read a book. There is also a coffee make
neighborhood_overview: The historic Noordereiland is located in the Maas on a unique location between the modern Kop van Zuid and the city center.

name: Place to stay in Rotterdam · ★4.67 · 1 bedroom · 1 bed · 1.5 baths
description:
Comfortable & very spacious appartement at the Old red light district: 'Katendrecht', part of Rotterdam with great history!
No breakfasts.

Katendrecht recommended in 'The New York Times and the 'Rough Guide'. Close to the city center of Rotterdam, great to explore The Netherlands for the weekend, a couple of days or a whole week.
Easy public transport to City centre or trains to Amsterdam, The Hague, Delft, Breda, Gouda. Beautiful nature and parcs nearby for walking, biking and chilling.

The space
Spacious appartment at historical and renovated 'Katendrecht', the old red light district of Rotterdam. Katendrecht is recommended in 'The New York Times and the 'Rough Guide'. We offer our appartment all for yoursel(s), build in 1898 and close to the heart of Rotterdam. Renting a whole place with all luxery was never so close!

Guest access
Free use of livingroom with open kitchen, masterbedroom and bathroom.
Very comf
neighborhood_overview: Around the corner of the 'White House building' you will find lovely bars and restaurants. The famous Food Factory, Foodhallen, the SS Rotterdam and Hotel New York, Maasilo and Las Palmas Foto Museum are in walking distance. The city centre is on 10 minutes distance by underground/ Metro. Katendrecht is the old Red light district, has become very trendy and has also a small parc. You can easily travel by waterbus or watertaxi. We love to tell our guests more about the history of Katendrecht and all that Rotterdam has to offer. Ofcourse you'll find Amsterdam and The Hague in short travel time with Metro or Intercity direct.
host_about:

name: Townhouse in Rotterdam · ★4.95 · 1 bedroom · 1 bed · 2 baths
description:
This unique, modern and luxurious apartment has everything you need and more… much more! Everything in this high-end apartment is designed to fit your every need while enjoying Rotterdam. A lot of comfort can be enjoyed in the house during your stay because of the comfortable bed and living spaces as well as the balcony. The amount of windows provide beautiful light throughout the whole house.

You will find shops, eatery's and cozy restaurants all within walking distance.

The space
Wake up with an amazing view of the Dutch lane or enjoy your morning coffee on this sunny balcony before leaving for some sightseeing.

The fully equipped kitchen has everything you need to cook yourself a chef-worthy dinner, lunch or breakfast. Don't feel like cooking? Treat yourself on a nice bite to eat or drink in one of the local restaurants or bars.

We've got 1 Kingsize bed for you to get your well earned rest, after a long day in our magnificent c
neighborhood_overview:
Kralingen is traditionally known as the chiquer side of Rotterdam. Romantic villa neighbourhoods and elegant lanes dominate the cityscape here. Erasmus University Rotterdam is also located here, however, so the area is home to lots of students – and they keep Kralingen lively! Oostzeedijk boasts lots of popular pubs and restaurants where you can pick up a meal for a reasonable price. One of the oldest attractions in Kralingen is Arboretum Trompenburg. In addition to the lovely old trees here, these botanic gardens offer beautiful plants and flowers and a charming teahouse.

The biggest park in Rotterdam is nearby: the Kralingse Bos, a green oasis for everyone hoping to escape the city for a breath of fresh air and some peace and quiet. Visitors rollerblade, jog and cycle around the lake to their heart’s content. Sailboats skim across the lake, while tasty snacks are served at sidewalk cafés along the waterfront.
host_about:
Hi! My name is Renee, an energetic and positive woman, and I want to welcome you in my urban meets industry house in one of the most vibrant cities of the world. Rotterdam is my hometown and I love to tell you about my favorites local spots and the culture of Rotterdam.
I was born and raised in Rotterdam and I working in the sales department of our shipyard in Rotterdam, so I can tell you all about it!

The space

neighborhood_overview: The studio is located 200m from central station. Walking out the north side of CS you directly enter the beautiful historical Spoorsingel at which the main house is located. Our studio is located in the famous and most vibrant street in the heart of Rotterdam, de Witte de Withstraat. Near the studio are various bars and restaurants, public transport, shopping area, supermarket,museum and much more. You’ll love my place because of the elegant and trendy interior, the city view, the location and the ambiance. My place is excellent for couples, solo adventurers, business travelers and even parents with a kid.

The studio will make you feel home away from home <3

The space
This modern 35 sqm. studio is located in a historical building which has survived the WW II bombings. It recently has been renovated and gives you a city view on the hotspot of Rotterdam.

The windows from the top till the floor give makes the place look even more spacious and light. You have private use of bathroom, washing machine, sofa, king-size bed and air conditioning. The kitchen is fully equipped with a dishwasher, Quooker, Nespresso machi
neighborhood_overview:
Witte de Withstraat is the place to be when visiting Rotterdam. It has many restaurants that are open till late and amazing bars with seating outside. It is a two minute walk to the nearest tube station and three minute walk to the shopping district.

Furthermore it is nearby the Coolsingel which houses the Rotterdam City hall, and it's nearby the shopping boulevard of the city. If you don't like the big shops you can also visite the small boutiques on the Van Oldenbarneveldstraat, Karel Doormanstraat or de Meent.
If you have a panache for art, local products or like to buy things from local artists, entrepreneurs, hobbyist/amateurs, the Witte de Withstraat is dotted with (vintage and pop-up) shops/boutiques & galleries that sell these.

It's a 10 minute walk from:
- the newly constructed Markthal, which you really should visite to buy some local products or eat something at the venues.
- the Cubic houses
- the Eramusburg where you can explor

description:
A quiet room in a green oasis in the center of the city. The central station is a 10 minute walk. Schiphol airport is 20 minutes by train.
Metro to AHOY festival hall in 15 minutes.
Within walking distance of museums and architectural highlights. Restaurants and shops are close. You have a view on a lovely park,
use of kitchen, balcony and wifi. Plus a safe place indoor for your bikes.

The space
The room is in an apartment building, which is a protected monument from 1956. It was build as part of the "Lijnbaan-complex", in the context of the reconstruction of the city center after the Second World War. The supervising architect was Hugh Maaskant.

During your stay
If you like I will give tips on places to visit and where to eat or drink.

Blijdorp is een gemoedelijke jarendertigwijk in de verder bruisende buurt in Noord

In Noord, daar moet je wezen. Deze uitgestrekte lappendeken van een stadsdeel barst van de wijken en buurten met ieder een eigen verrukkelijk karakter. De wijk is de afgelopen jaren in een stroomversnelling geraakt, zoals dat in zoveel steden gebeurt, maar zonder zijn ouderwetse glans te verliezen. description:
In our backyard we have a charming guest house. You have your own place for a maximum of two people. The only thing we share is the garden. It offers an unique stay close to the river Rotte and two large parks, the Kralingse Bos and the Lage Bergse Bos. There are two bikes you can use for free. When you come by car, in this part of the city you can park for free as well.

The space
A gate next to the main house offers access to the backyard with the guesthouse. It is situated in a former barn with a charming look.

At the ground floor there is a sitting area with tv, a dining area, a kitchenette (small breakfast kitchen: there is no stove or cooking plate) with fridge, Dolce Gusto coffee machine, water cooker, egg cooker and tableware and a bathroom with shower and toilet.

At the open attic is the bedroom with a double bed (1,8m x 2,1m).

There is air conditioning, so the temperature can be adjusted to your liking.

name: Rental unit in Rotterdam · ★4.93 · 1 bedroom · 1 bed · 1 bath
description:
The spacious apartment (ca. 100 m2) has a unique ambience, located in a historic building right at the promenade in the heart of Rotterdam: on the famous Noordereiland, between both the iconic Erasmus bridge and the Willemsbrug. Hot spots such as the center, inlcuding the Markthal, Meent, Koopgoot and the Oude Haven, are a walking distance away or accessible by bus. South from the island, are the Kop van Zuid, Hotel New York, the Luxor theater, the Fenix ​​food Factory and many other highlights.

The space
This monumental house is one of the few original buildings that survived WW II. The large living room with original ornaments has access to a lovely balcony and a river view onto the skyline of Rotterdam (incl. the Erasmus bridge and Willemsbrug). The apartment is fitted with design furniture and the kitchen has everything you need. The bedroom is very spacious and connects to the modern bathroom. There is an office with 2 large closets.

Guest acce
neighborhood_overview: Noordereiland is a very cozy historic neighbourhood with beautiful views and a quiet environment yet very close to the city. Surrounded by water, you can enjoy a great Italian restaurant, the café Cozy, and the pop up restaurant a la Plancha floating on the water in the summer. A supermarket with a post office is around the corner.

name: Boat in Rotterdam · ★4.86 · 1 bedroom · 2 beds · 1.5 baths
description:
Welcome aboard the Rothor, located in one of the old harbours in the centre of Rotterdam. Private access, lovely view and deck terrace!

The space
Rothor is a ship built in Amsterdam in 1931. Your boat apartment is about 45 m2. There is a semi separate bedroom (2 persons) in front of the boat. Bathroom (shower) and separate toilet are also in front of the boat. The salon is spacious with natural daylight. There are windows all around. The kitchen block is in the middle and there a plenty places to sit and relax. There is a sofa bed for 2 persons in the salon. When you open the back doors of the salon you find a lovely, furnished deck terrace.

Guest access
The Rothor and its back deck terrace are yours. The boat is located next to a pontoon. You will reach the boat over the pontoon. The pontoon is shared with the boat on the other side, the Animathor. Your host lives on this boat and there may be guests there .

Other things to n
neighborhood_overview: Rothor is moored in the Haringvliet, one of the historic harbours of Rotterdam, located in the centre.  Next to the Rothor is the bridge to the Oude Haven (Old Harbour). In the Old Harbour you can sit and have a drink by the water. There are bars and restaurants. In the harbours, Leuvehaven, Haringvliet, Oude Haven and Wijnhaven are filled with classic Dutch boats. The area is a mix of very old warehouses, bridges, ships, bars and modern skyscraper apartment buildings. The very famous and striking Kubic Houses are just around the corner. A little bit further is the Markthal a very remarkable building, not to be missed when you visit Rotterdam!
host_about:
I'm an entrepreneur in the leisure field in Rotterdam.
I like meeting people from all parts of the world.
I  enjoy travelling and checking out other B&B's abroad.
I can give my guests a lot of information about Rotterdam and its attractions.
I enjoy rebuilding classic boats in an authentic nautical style.

neighborhood_overview:
You live in blijdoorp (translated: happy village); a lush, authentic & dynamic neighborhood behind the city center.
Here you find several restaurants, pubs, supermarkets & everything you might occasionally need. With only 10 minutes walking distance from the city centre & Rotterdam's central station, so you have all the options. You can easily jump on a train to explore other beautiful dutch cities Utrecht, Amsterdam or Den Hague, or even go to the beach at Hook van Holland...
The house opens to a beautiful view. Where there used to be a monestry garden, there is now a small neighbourhood tennis court, surrounded by big trees. If it wasn't for the tiny bit of skyline, you would almost forget that you are in the city with the biggest haven in Europe!

name: Houseboat in Rotterdam · ★4.80 · 2 bedrooms · 3 beds · 1 bath
description:
This romantic and unique tiny houseboat is located in the city centre, in the beautiful & upcoming Maritime District amid high-rise buildings in an idyllic harbor. It's purely Dutch design and you definitely fall in love! Wikkelboat's smart interior offers you great comfort with good airco & heating. Public transport is just a step away and you can use a luxurious Spa for free, same for the 2 electric bikes. Optional services are (inter)continental breakfast, lunch & boating.

The space
"Wikkelen" is the Dutch word for wrapping; this boathouse (33m2) is mainly made of wrapped cardboard and it's loaded with luxury facilities. At the front side of the Wikkelboat a terrace of 6x3m2 is located, with a bistroset seating 4, seats to enjoy the view on the White House or to just jump into the water. And best of all: you can use the luxurious terrace-built-in Spa for free!
You'll definitely enjoy the tranquillity at the water while being in the city heart of Rotter

name: Loft in Rotterdam · ★4.93 · 2 bedrooms · 2 beds · 1.5 baths
description:
Bijzondere, authentieke bovenwoning nabij het centrum van Rotterdam, in de geliefde buurt Kralingen. Markthal op 7 minuten fietsen (15 min. lopen). De buurt geeft je een dorps gevoel terwijl je midden in de stad verblijft. Kralingen staat tevens bekend om de vele kroegjes en restaurants. In onze woning voelt ieder zich zeer op zijn gemak. Openbaar vervoer: tram voor de deur en metro om de hoek. Liesbeth & Isabelle nodigen je van harte uit en zorgen dat jullie verblijf onvergetelijk wordt!

The space
Schoon, goed onderhouden, ruim en zeer gezellig huis. De fraaie lichtinval gedurende de hele dag maakt het huis extra mooi. Het pand is in 1870 gebouwd en heeft daardoor mooie details.

Other things to note
Er is alleen een toilet op de verdieping waar de woonkamer/ keuken is. Op de slaapetage is helaas geen toilet.

0599 D451 FE44 53C2 273B
neighborhood_overview:
Kralingen is een geliefde wijk in Rotterdam vlakbij het centrum. Leuke ontbijt winkeltjes en diverse supermarkten op 5 minuten lopen. Openbaar vervoer in de buurt of huur fietsen en ontdek Rotterdam per fiets........
Musea in de buurt en veel mooie natuur. Het Kralingse bos is op 10 minuten afstand.
host_about:
Wij zijn Liesbeth & Isabelle. 
Liesbeth werkt bij een gerenommeerd architectenbureau en Isabelle gaat in de buurt naar de allerleukste school!  Wij wonen met veel plezier in Rotterdam en kennen alle leuke plekken in de stad. We zijn gek op onze Peugeot oldtimer, houden van lekker, eerlijk en gezond eten (maken en nuttigen) en genieten van mooie kunst en cultuur. We verwelkomen je graag in ons zelf gerenoveerde huis, waar wij ook zelf wonen.

The space
Dear Guest,

I welcome you in Rotterdam in an authentic house from 1888, originally a coach house.

You will have a large private attic apartment. A bathroom toilet, shower and bad and an open kitchen.
The apartment is the centre of Rotterdam located in the Gallery Quarter. Everything is in walking distance, the Central Station, museums, parks, restaurant and cafe's!

The undergrounds and Central Station are in near distance and very easy to reach.

Around the building parking is possible. Parking is around €4,30 per hour from 09:00 till 23:00. It can be difficult to find a parkingspot.

If you park your car at one steady place around the building during your stay I can arrange parking for € 1,20 an hour.

name: Condo in Rotterdam · ★5.0 · 1 bedroom · 1 bed · 1.5 baths
description:
An amazing, light and sunny apartment on the sixth floor of the popular Timmerhuis building, with nice views over the city skyline.

The apartment has two terraces, both of 45m2, one on the east side and the other on the south/west side, both with trees and plants. There are two sunbeds and two lounge chairs.

The size of the apartment itself is 116m2.

The space
The apartment has an open living area, with kitchen, dining table, living and lounge, with access to both terraces.

There is one large bedroom of 20m2 with a double bed (Auping) with access to the terrace on the east side.

The bathroom has both a bathtub and a shower.

The length of the entrance hall is spectacular: 14,5m!

The apartment is equipped with underfloor heating, which in the summer can also be used as cooling.

Guest access
Guests have access to the complete apartment.

Other things to note
neighborhood_overview:
Located in the heart of the city, just behind the City hall.

Shopping areas, restaurants and bars are just around the corner. All major sight seeings are within walking distance.

You won't find an apartment more centrally located than this one. Enjoy the city life!
host_about:
Hi, 

I am Saskia, single, lawyer. I have been living and working in Rotterdam for about 30 years. In July 2015 I bought the apartment in the Timmerhuis (casco), and I moved in at the end of 2015. 
I live there with a lot of pleasure! The location is fantastic, I have very nice neighbors and the apartment itself has everything I could want. But the terraces are my pride and joy, and also the main reason for buying the apartment. I have what you call in Dutch "green fingers."

Because of a major leak, which fortunately has now been fixed, I was unable to accept bookings for a year.  This was followed by the Covid pandemic. 

I look forward to hearing your experiences! 

Greetings, 
Saskia

host_about: I have been living in Rotterdam for 25 years. I live with my daughter Isa (2009) in our cute little house, we’re in the north of the city (the area called: ‘Liskwartier’). name: Townhouse in Rotterdam · ★4.75 · 1 bedroom · 2 beds · 1.5 baths
description:
Stadswoning in het centrum van Rotterdam (Bergpolder/Blijdorp).

The space
Algemeen
Woning op de begane grond met eigen voordeur. Buren links, rechts en boven, grenzend aan het huis.

Wanneer het huis niet verhuurd is, is het mijn woonhuis. Dit betekent dat zich veel privé eigendommen in het huis bevinden. Maar dat zal duidelijk blijken. En hier zal ik hieronder ook nog specifiek op terugkomen.

Woonkamer/keuken
Open keuken in de woonkamer. Met oven, gasplaat, afzuigkap en koelkast. Pannen, tajine aanwezig. Nespresso apparaat aanwezig. Geen vaatwasser aanwezig. Eettafel, bank. Geen televisie! Badkamer met douche/bad in één. Wifi. Stofzuiger en schoonmaakmiddelen (onder de wastafel) aanwezig.

Tuin
Tuin met vlonder afgescheiden van de rest van de tuin. Tuin ligt op het westen.
Mogelijk lopen er katten van buren door de tuin. In de tuin staat een schuur. Indien u graag een fiets wilt gebruiken, laat het dan van tevo
neighborhood_overview: Gezinsbuurt in het centrum van rotterdam. Woning gemakkelijk vanaf treinstation Rotterdam Centraal bereikbaar per tram. Openbaar vervoer makkelijk te bereiken vanaf de woning. Tram op 3 min lopen. Metro iets verder. Stad ook te bereiken per fiets (1 fiets op aanvraag gratis ter beschikking) eventueel mogelijk fiets te huren, bijvoorbeeld op het treinstation. Veel winkeltjes, cafeetjes en restaurantjes in het centrum. Aanrader de Kop van Zuid met Hotel New York, en het Deliplein. Ook de Witte de Withstraat is leuk voor cafés en restaurantjes. Voor winkelen oa de Meent. De mooie dierentuin Blijdorp is in de buurt. Verschillende musea, waaronder de Kunsthal. Daarnaast toeristische trekpleisters als de kubuswoningen en de Euromast. Maar vergeet zeker niet de Erasmusbrug aan de Maas in de avond in het donker.
host_about: Ik ben een 31 jarige vrouw. Hoewel ik mijn hele leven in de stad heb gewoond houd ik veel van de natuur en van dieren.

name: Condo in Rotterdam · ★4.86 · 1 bedroom · 1 bed · 1 bath
description:
Spacious and comfortable ground floor apartment including beautiful garden.
You will have a great stay in this characteristic over 100 years old mansion in the heart of the city only 900 meters from the central station, with lot's of cafes, terraces, galleries, restaurants and shops surrounding you.

The space
The house is over 100 years old so it has lots of character and with the comfort of modern day standards. It is situated on the ground floor and has its own entrance. The long hallway will give you access to all the spaces and rooms in the house. There is nothing shared, so you will have your privacy and comfort. The apartment is about 80 m2. It offers all necessary utilities such as bathroom, toilet, kitchen, living room and bedroom en suite. The style and character is used throughout the entire apartment.
Free wifi is available.
The kitchen contains an Illy coffee machine and offcourse an electric water cooker.
The living room has bea
neighborhood_overview:
The apartment is situated in a very nice neighborhood behind Central Station. The station is about 900 meters walk and there you will find yourself in the hart of Rotterdam which offers the nicest cafes, restaurants, museums, galleries, shops and cinemas, the museum park with Museum Boymans and De Kunsthal, the authentic Witte the Withstraat, the Binnenweg, China Town with several small toko's is all within walking distance.

Exploring the city by electric scooter is the best way.
With the electric scooter you can go to the nearby parks such as Vroesenpark and off course a "must see" Kralingse Bos. You can go to the center or take a walk along the river Maas, cross the Erasmus bridge and go by watertaxi to different parts of the city.

With public transportation nearby you can reach all different parts of the city with their own charme and character.
Public transport is nearby with tram around the corner and a subway station within 5 minutes walk.
host_about:
Hi, my name is Harald and I live in the beautiful and upcoming city of Rotterdam. I love to travel and discover the world. But coming home after another adventure always brings a smile to my face. This is because this city is my home and my home is my sanctuary. I appreciate and enjoy it a lot and I hope you will too.
Life is short, so enjoy as much as you can!

name: Hotel in Rotterdam · ★4.71 · 1 bedroom · 1 bed · 2 shared baths
description:
CityHub is a urban hotel for the new generation of travelers. You stay in cool sleeping units called Hubs, you can chill and make friends in our hangout and prepare your own drinks at the self-service bar. In the hangout you can always find a CityHost, a local buddy who knows all the cool places and is available 24/7 through the CityHub App. Come check it out!

The space
A Hub is a unique room equipped with a large, comfy, double bed, space to store luggage and hang clothes, bluetooth music streaming system, free WiFi and multi-color lights controlled via the CityHub App. Toilets and showers are shared. But no worries, they are spic and span at all times!

Guest access
During check-in you activate your wristband to enter your hub and use the self service bar in the Hangout. There you can find cozy couches and tables to eat or work, board games, cards and even vending machines with snacks.

Other things to note
We have l
neighborhood_overview: CityHub is the perfect base from which you can explore Rotterdam. We are in the most lively and hip street of the city, right where it all happens. Many of the cultural highlights are just around the corner and Central Station is a 15-minute walk away.
host_about: CityHub represents a new generation of travellers that has emerged from today’s interactive and interdependent world. At CityHub they ENJOY, INTERACT and SHARE their experiences and so jointly create a base from which they explore the beautiful cities of the world.

The 100 m2 two-bedroom apartment retains beautiful details from the 1930s, such as stained glass windows, a marble fireplace, parquet floor and steel window frames.

name: Condo in Rotterdam · ★4.98 · 1 bedroom · 1 bed · 1 bath
description:
Welcome to my beautiful, cosy and characteristic apartment. This apartment is built in the 1930s and many of the original details are still intact such as the marble fireplaces and en suite doors leading to the bedroom.

The apartment is less than a minute's walk from the tram station Schieweg (line 125, which takes you to and from Rotterdam Central Station, the city centre and Kop van Zuid), a 10 to 15-minute walk from Rotterdam Central Station.

The space
The apartment comfortably hosts two persons. It has a washing machine and dishwasher. Heating is done with an authentic well-kept gas fireplace and heats the whole apartment. There is electrical and portable heating stored in the bedroom if needed. The previous owner of the apartment decorated the bathroom and balcony in a Mediterranean Gaudi style, which I decided to keep as it brings such charm.

The apartment’s size is 65m2. It holds a living room, a dining room with a table, two chairs
neighborhood_overview: Rotterdam Blijdorp / Bergpolder is a very friendly and affluent neighborhood.  Many children are raised here by young professional couples, and people are very open minded. On the corner of the street you will find your groceries, drugstore, florists and fun boutiques.  Across the street is a professional Beauty Bar where you can get a massage, solarium, or your nails done. One block away you can even get pierced or tattooed...! If I won’t welcome you personally, I will have the keys at Pleur, a concept store across of my apartment.
host_about:
Hi there!

My name is Daan, I am 29 years old and have been living in Rotterdam for the past five years. 

I love traveling to the Middle East, but my favorite city in the world is Melbourne! 

If you rent my apartment you will not only enjoy the happy spirit it carries, but also the many convenient facilities of my neighborhood. You are a 12 min walk from Rotterdam Central Station, the tram is just a footstep away and within 7 minutes you are at the Metro towards The Hague or Rotterdam South. And within three minutes you are on the highway to Amsterdam, Schiphol, Utrecht or Breda.

Hi!
Ik ben Mario en eigenaar van het schip te samen met mijn vrouw Eelke.

name: Rental unit in Rotterdam · 1 bedroom · 1 bed · 1 bath
description:
Cozy, artistic, vintage appartement in one of the most popular (creative) neighbourhoods in Rotterdam. Hipster coffeeshops and bars around the corner (just across the street), 15 minute walk to centre, 15 minute walk to central station, 10 minute walk to famous Bird (disco, bar) and good restaurants. Bakery and grocery store around the corner.

It is my goal to make you feel comfortable, welcome and safe while staying in my appartement! I want you to have an awesome and memorable time!

The space
Livingroom: make yourself at home! And please enjoy my small xmas tree to experience a xmas-newyears like never before!

Kitchen: please njoy the cookbooks to make an extraordinary meal for you and your (traveling)partner.

Bedroom: It looks small because the bed is huge! You find it is quite cozy! And it has a great view, while lying in bed!

Bathroom: small but nice and warm shower.

Registration number
0
neighborhood_overview: This neighbourhood is very popular because it has some great area's: a park on top of an old trainstation in the sky and an airtunnel (a must see! And a nice walk), little stores and galleries at 'de hofbogen', hipster coffeeshops, vintagestores, Vroezenpark and much more!
host_about:
Hi! 

Nice to meet you! 

My name is Gwen. I work as a freelance creative and researcher for television and documentary film. My work is my passion. I love people, cultures, art, design, journalisme and basically I really enjoy life! Sounds cheesy doesn't it .. sorry I cant help it .. I just do!

I hope my cozy and vintage-art house will give you as much inspiration and joy as it gives me. And that Rotterdam will be an experience you will always remember. 
I live in a neighbourhood that is one of the hotspots in Rotterdam. Creatives and artist live her. It's filled with nice coffeeshops (the ones with coffee! ;)) and quality restaurants. 

A few of the finest bars and discotheques are in 5 minute walking distance and the city is a 10 minute walk! Where you find even more places to party or have dinner or a drink. 

I hope my house is a place where you feel comfortable, welcome and most of all inspired. 

Hope  to see you soon!

The spacious bedroom where you'll be staying has one standard queen size bed and one double sleeping sofa. So both ideal for a couple or for a group of up to four friends. There's WiFi across the whole apartment.

The bedroom is directly situated besides the bathroom, where you can enjoy a relaxing bath or take a shower. This bedroom includes the second toilet. On this floor there is also a washing machine for you to use with drying rack.

On the first floor there is a big living room with TV (Netflix) and speakers if you want to watch series or listen to music on our comfortable sofa. The kitchen/dining room has everything you need to make breakfast including a coffee machine, thee pot and food processor with mixer. We have loads of kitchen equipment to make a nice diner.

Guest access
Guests are allow
neighborhood_overview: We live in a friendly neighbourhood in Rotterdam West, close to the Witte de Withstraat and Nieuwe Binnenweg, where you can find a lot of the nice bars and restaurants Rotterdam has to offer. The museum district is within 2 km, where you can find museums on architecture, modern art and natural history. Of course you can ask us anything, so we can advice you on the nice places!

description:
Studio 2/2

Next to one of the old spice mills "De Ster", you’ll find the former miller’s house, which has been redeveloped into two luxurious heritage studios at the lakeside (Ground floor studio & First Floor studio).

The space
Heritage lodge "De Karot" (35m2) is located on the first floor of the former miller's house. The lodge, with a magnificent view on the lake, is split into 2 independent units, both with their own private entrance. You can also rent both units (the units are connected with a locked and soundproof door).

The living area has a sofa bed (fits for two children or one adult), a small, but well-equipped (dining) kitchen and a glass door displaying windmill "De Ster". A roof terrace will be realized here in the future. The bathroom has floor heating, a shower, sink and toilet. The bedroom, with a double bed from Auping, overlooks the lake. The studio has a small private terrace on the lake (see photo). The entrance to the
neighborhood_overview:
The heritage lodges are situated in the middle of the Kralingse Bos (forest), a green oasis in the heart of the city of Rotterdam.

Right next to the lodge you’ll find a nice restaurant which offers breakfast, lunch and dinner. The Kralingse Bos is a wonderful recreational area with all sorts of things to do. There’s for example a small beach, a sailing school, petting zoo, deer park, golf club and climbing park. And if you feel like popping into town, the centre of Rotterdam is just 3 metro stops away.

name: Rental unit in Rotterdam · ★5.0 · 1 bedroom · 1 bed · 1 bath
description:
The apartment is very light and cosy, the interior is very new. Free parking is a few Blocks away. Or for 10€ in my street. The balcony has morning and evening sun and one room for yoga/meditation. There are quite some plants.
The neighborhood (Tarwewijk) is lively and multi-cultural and filled with dutch, turkish and polish supermarkts, second hand shops, coffeeshops and restaurants.
The museum square and Katendrecht are on 10 minutes by bike, through tunnel and by watertaxi.

The space
Smoking preferably not in the house, but on the balcony.
If there is any questions or special wish please let me know, i can be flexible.

Guest access
You can use all the space that is mine, there is also a cellar if you wish to store a bike inside.

Registration number
0599 371D F1DE 5715 D345
neighborhood_overview:
The reason i wanted to live in this area is because it is very international. There is several bruin cafe's (dutch pubs) in the area and many different restaurants, Surinam, italian, turkish, Dutch, polish and many supermarkets.
Besides that there is a brandnew 50 m swimming pool and also a Japanese centre (Shofukan) nearby that hosts teaceremonies in their teagarden on request.
There is the huge 5 km wide Zuiderpark on 5 minutes walking.
The historical Delfshaven is on a 10 minute bikeride, through the bikingtunnel under the river that is quite an experience for most foreigners.

Welcome to our nice cottage, situated in a spacious garden. It’s only a five-minute walk to the subway station and two stops to Rotterdam Central . It’s the perfect place for exploring the city and surroundings. The cottage is fully modernised. You can rest and relax here, taking a nap in the hammock between the trees or have breakfast at your own terrace.

name: Condo in Rotterdam · ★4.77 · 2 bedrooms · 2 beds · 1 bath
description:
Welkom in ons historische appartement uit 1902, gelegen aan een rustige singel in Rotterdam. Dit ruime appartement op de eerste verdieping biedt comfortabel plaats aan 4 gasten, met 2 slaapkamers, een goed uitgeruste keuken en een stijlvolle badkamer. Geniet van de mooie ligging aan de singel, terwijl de bruisende binnenstad op loopafstand te bereiken is. Ontdek de bezienswaardigheden, musea en levendige sfeer van Rotterdam.

The space
Bij binnenkomst word je verwelkomd door een prachtige, ruime trap die je naar de eerste verdieping leidt, waar jouw verblijf zich bevindt. Op deze verdieping vind je een goed uitgeruste keuken en een comfortabel toilet. Op de tweede verdieping bevinden zich de badkamer en een tweede toilet.

Dit historische appartement ademt karakter met zijn prachtige glas-in-loodramen en hoge plafonds. Je zult je direct thuis voelen in de twee heerlijke slaapkamers.

Guest access
The entire first floor is exclusive

The space

If you go upstairs you will find a nice and spacious bedroom with a large king-size bed, an extra room to store your clothes an
neighborhood_overview: The neighborhood has a lot to offer, like restaurants, bars and of course "Diergaarde Blijdorp" (the Zoo). We will provide you with a list of our favourite restaurant and places to hang out.

name: Rental unit in Rotterdam · ★4.93 · 1 bedroom · 1 bed · 1.5 baths
description:
Modern and fully furnished apartment in the center of Rotterdam. Within a few minutes walk you will reach the famous Coolsingel and Koopgoot. There are several restaurants / bars nearby, also the Old Harbour and New Binnenweg are within walking distance. Meanwhile, 'De Hofbogen' has been restored and there are several bars and restaurants represented. The Hofbogen run along the apartment.

The space
The apartment is about 70m2 and arranged as follows: a bedroom with a double bed, a bathroom with shower unit and washing and drying machine, a separate toilet, a kitchen, a dining room/working space and living room with access to the balcony. During your stay, you may use the Wireless Internet, a part of the refrigerator and freezer, the Nespresso machine, electric kettle, toaster, oven/microwave and induction cooker. Including use of bed linen and towels.

It’s situated on the first floor and accesible by elevator or stairs. You may use my private parkingsp
neighborhood_overview:
The story of the city, the bombardment and reconstruction, and the drive to innovate that locals still use today to shape their city all make Rotterdam a fascinating place to visit. Everything seems possible here, and there’s so much left to explore. Rotterdam is a young, dynamic global city, continuously renewing itself at a rapid rate. Sparkling skyscrapers, an impressive port, trendy restaurants and food markets, renowned museums and awesome festivals are the direct result of the can-do mentality of the Rotterdammers. Add to that the many extraordinary attractions and city tours – by bike, bus, boat or on foot – and you understand why Rotterdam was voted Lonely Planet’s Best In Travel 2016.
There are some flyers in the apartment, but visit Rotterdam Tourist Information at the Coolsingel and rotterdam.info to prepare your visit to Rotterdam.
host_about:
Hi! Ik ben Olga! 
Werkzaam als docent van jongeren met gedragsproblematiek en/of een verstandelijke beperking. Ik hou van reizen (met name citytrips of fly/drives), koken en de natuur! Meestal gebruik makend van airbnb, vanwege de bijzondere plekjes i.p.v. de massa hotels en parken! Ik ben een echt stadsmens en werk ook middenin de stad, maar vertrek wanneer mogelijk naar mijn buitenhuisje in de natuur. Op die momenten verhuur ik mijn appartement aan max 2 mensen die van de mooie stad Rotterdam willen genieten en vanuit mijn appartement de stad te voet kunnen of willen verkennen.

Hi! My name is Olga!
I am a teacher, but I also work as a coach for young individuals with an intellectual disability or behavioral issues. I love traveling, most of the time citytrips or fly/drives, cooking and nature! I don’t like the big hotels with loudy tourist, so normally I book nice and special places by Airbnb! I really love living in the city and also work in the center, but in weekends I often leave to my small house a few miles away in nature. When I leave, I like to rent my apartment to max 2 people who want to enjoy the lovely city of Rotterdam!

neighborhood_overview:
Kralingse plas, a wonderful lake and park, is within 1 minute walking distance.

“Lusthofstraat” offers grocery stores, shopping, and things such as hair dressers and beauty salons. It’s about 3 to 4 minutes walk.

The Erasmus university and Brain-park are about 800m away, and can easily be reached by foot/bike within several minutes.

Flex-bikes, something similar to Airbnb but then to rent bikes per minute, are frequently stationed just around the corner. Making it easy to rent a bike for a small fee when you need it.

There’s a lot more going on, and ample restaurants nearby, also the center is close and can easily be reached. For any questions please feel free to reach out.

neighborhood_overview:
Prins Alexander is a family friendly residential area in the east of Rotterdam, between the Kralingse Bos wooded park and the Zevenhuizerplas lake and its many recreational opportunities.

Convenient: from the Prins-Alexander station, you can easily catch a train to Utrecht or get the metro to Rotterdam City Centre.

• Pietje Bell adventure playground: the ultimate outdoor play area in Prinsenland, with ponds and playground equipment.
• Nesselande beach: an expansive sandy beach stretching 800 metres along the Zevenhuizerplas.
• Alexandrium Shopping Centre: 140 shops focusing on fashion and interior decoration.
• Kralingse Bos park is popular with joggers and inline skaters. On and around the lake, you can sail, swim, or just relax in the sun beside your barbecue.

neighborhood_overview:
Rotterdam’s passion for work and dynamic energy are unleashed to their fullest here. This area is all about working hard and playing even harder. The area used to see a constant flow of passenger ships arriving and departing. Lloydkwartier has been transformed into a modern area where people live and work, with a strong focus on the creative sector. The historic warehouses, old port monuments and modern buildings house a wide range of design agencies, advertising firms, architects, photographers and audiovisual companies. Interested in meeting these creative spirits? Grab a cup of coffee at Stroom, a former power plant that has been transformed into a hotel and restaurant. This is where the local creative entrepreneurs have their appointments and source their daily shot of high-octane caffeine.

People from ‘beyond the islands’ also enjoy visiting the Lloydpier and Müllerpier, taking a stroll along the riverbanks, checking out the ships, and feeling the wind through their ha

description:
A beautiful house from the 1930's with good vibes, close to the city center of Rotterdam. Located in a quiet and historical neighborhood, near highway exits and public transport.

It's a family house, safe for small children. We have one bedroom with twin bed and and one bedroom with a children’s cot. A single bed bed can be placed extra in that room for bigger children or an adult.

We live in this house and you’re welcome to visit for the true Rotterdam experience!

The space
The house has a private entrance. Living room, kitchen and toilet are located on the first floor (one staircase up). On the second floor there is one bedroom with a twin bed, balcony and a private little bathroom with toilet and sink. The second bedroom is a children's room. It has one toddler bed and can optionally be expended with a travel cot for another child or single bed, for an adult. This is a comfortable folding bed. There is also a bigger bathroom with bath on
neighborhood_overview:
Historical neighbourhood, built mainly in the 1930’s, with beautiful nature on walking distance. There are several supermarkets, bars and restaurants nearby and playgrounds for the little ones. You can also find one of Rotterdams most authentic multicultural shopping streets with local stores and restaurants at 15 minutes walking distance.

Public transport is also easy to find, which brings you quickly to the city center.

There’s paid parking in the streets but there is free parking on a ten minute walking distance.
host_about:
We are a married couple with one child and moved to this house a few years ago. We renovated it all by ourselves and really enjoy living in it. We are born and raised in Rotterdam and love this city! It's people are very open, mixed and direct. A great combination :)

We like to share the experience of our house and city with you!

description:
Are you looking for the perfect stay in Rotterdam; look no further! This apartment is located in the most popular neighbourhood of Rotterdam: Blijdorp. Everything you need is within walking distance: supermarket, metro station, Rotterdam Central station, restaurants, nature. Blijdorp has it all!

The space
This apartment has everything you need for a city trip or longer stay close to the city centre of Rotterdam. It's a spacious apartment with a well equipped and open kitchen, a cosy bedroom, a modernly styled living room and a large bathroom (with bubble bad!). And the big garden is the cherry on the cake. You can have a drink or just relax on the porch (with roof), where we have a lounge set and a heater.

Guest access
You will have the entire apartment to yourself!

Many young families and starters are situated here. It's super close to basically everything; 1 min walking distance from a supermarket & Blijdorp metro station. Within 5 min walking distance, you can find many other hotspots, such as 'Het Vroesenpark' - a large city park, several coffee places and more. One of Rotterdam's most visited tourist's spots is the Blijdorp Zoo, which is also very close. Furthermore, you are super close to the city centre: 1 metro stop to Central Station (2 min), 8/10 min bike ride or 20 min by foot.
host_about:
Who am I? I am 29 years old, I live in Rotterdam together with my boyfriend and I work for myself as a sustainability consultant and yoga instructor. 

I LOVE to travel, I LOVE the sun & I LOVE animals (especially dogs). I think this is basically the three things I love the most ;) (Besides my boyfriend, family & friends of course). 

I like doing yoga and living in the moment. I love nature and being surrounded by people who enjoy life and simply smile at whatever comes their way. 

Food: Italian & Indian
Travel (tops): New Zealand, Australia, Vietnam,  Sri Lanka, USA. 
Books: The power of Now 
Music: everything :)

description:
Welcome to our cosy home! After traveling and living all over, we decided to settle in the great city Rotterdam. We were really lucky to find this beauty just out of the city centre. It is perfectly tranquil, but with the center around the corner. With a lot of sweat and love to detail, we tried to make the house homely. Our spare room is the room you would stay in, with all amenities you can image. We will share the 1,5 bathrooms and feel free to use our kitchen or relax in our living room.

The space
The house is split into three levels. On the second floor, you find our kitchen and big living room with a south-facing balcony. Feel free to use the kitchen and we will make space for you in the fridge.

On the third floor is your comfy room with everything you need.
Name it we have it: a comfy double bed, closet, desk you can work on or that converts into a dressing table, hair dryer, towels and many specials. There is also our washing machine, th
neighborhood_overview:
We live in a lively and multi-ethnic neighbourhood that feels a little bit like a small, international village within Rotterdam. You have literally everything around the corner from a bakery to supermarkets, a flower shop and many restaurants.
Our favourite cafe is Wolf on Wolphaertsbocht with great breakfast and cakes.
A small hidden secret is Koffie Ambacht with its lovely people and music or art performances.
The big shopping mall at Zuid Plein is a 15 min walk. There is also the new theater with a lovely big terras and nice other restaurants where you can enjoy the sun till late in the evening. (Lisa is our favourite)
You can see the top of the trees from Zuider Park (the largest park in Rotterdam) form our living room window, or can walk to Ahoy or the water front.
Katendrecht and Wilhelminapier with its iconic buildings is only 2,5 km away.
The city center is 15 min by public transport.

neighborhood_overview: Rotterdam Alexander is a quiet neighbourhood, with excellent public transportation to the city center and the highway A16 and A20.
host_about:
Ik Stefanie (Nederlanse, getrouwd, momenteel 57 jaar) reis meestal samen met één van mijn dochters Samantha en Brigitte (28 en 31 jaar), aangezien mijn man niet zo van culturele reizen houdt. Ik geef de voorkeur aan een betaalbare accommodatie ter plaatse boven een hotel, vanwege de huiselijke sfeer en de mogelijkheid om eventueel andere mensen te leren kennen. Ik ben geen veeleisende bewoner en zal goed met uw spullen omgaan. 

Mijn stijl van reizen is low budget, ik maak graag gebruik van hostels en dergelijke, kamperen is echter niet mijn stijl. Ik kom graag in contact met plaatselijke bewoners om te horen hoe zij hun leven ervaren en hun mening te horen over deze wereld.

In het verleden heb ik op diverse reizen naar Zuid-Afrika ook vrijwilligerswerk gedaan (samen met één van mijn dochters) in de townships van Port Elizabeth. Ik vind het belangrijk om te proberen mijn steentje bij te dragen in de leefbaarheid voor andere mensen op onze aarde 

Mijn hobby's zijn lezen, handwerken, reizen met mijn kinderen en mijn werk op de klantenservice van een energiebedrijf. 

I am Stefanie ( Netherlandish , married , currently 54 years) usually travel with one of my daughters Samantha and Brigitte (25 and 28) , as my husband does not like cultural tours . I prefer an affordable accommodation spot above a hotel, because of the homey atmosphere and the opportunity to get to know any other people. I'm not a demanding occupant and will properly handle your belongings.

My style of travel is low budget , I like to use hostels and such , camping is not my style. I like to come in contact with local residents to hear how they experience their lives and hear their views on the world.

In the past I have also volunteered on several trips to South Africa (along with one of my daughters) in the townships of Port Elizabeth. I think it's important to try to do my part in the quality of life for other people on earth

My hobbies are reading , crafts, traveling with my children and my work on the customer service of an energy company.

description:
Our apartment (110m2) is located in the city center, very close to the central train station & subway, the main shopping street (Coolsingel, Koopgoot, Meent), many restaurants (Oude Haven, Witte de Wit), and musea (e.g., Booijmans van Beuningen). Within walking distance from the Markthal, the Cubicles, and the river (Maas).

Suitable for city trips, holidays and business travels or even long stays.

The perfect location if you want to explore the beautiful city of Rotterdam and relax afterwards

The space
We have a large living room with a big kitchen and two dining spaces (bar attached to the kitchen and table). We have sunlight all day on either one side of the apartment as well as a very spacious balcony. The bathroom has a separate bath and walk-in shower. We have three bedrooms, one which is actually used as the master bedroom, one as an office and one is for extra guests or for washing your clothes or exercising.

Our apartme
neighborhood_overview: We live in a complex named Heliport. Back in the days this used to be a helicopter platform until the arrival of Rotterdam airport. It is like a small village in the city center, which is why we love it here! We will send you a detailed map to explain where you have to be, because you have to know your way around. There are elevators, but you need a tag, which we will leave in the house. The neighborhood is very quite and pleasant with mix of people (from young singles to families and everything in between).

neighborhood_overview: My loft is situated in Rotterdam Delfshaven, which is in the western part of town, very close to the city center. Delfshaven is a very multicultural part of Rotterdam, the pier where I live is known for its port activities. Usually, there are one or more commercial boats moored close by. Depending on the season, one or more cruiseships sail by every week on their way to either the city center or back towards the North Sea and often people drive up here just to see them sail by.
host_about:
Hi!
Welcome to my page. My name is Jolie. I'm a clinical psychologist who moved to Rotterdam 7 years ago. I'm the first owner of my loft and have designed the interior myself with great care. I enjoy living here very much. After some nice experiences with Airbnb as a guest, I decided it would be selfish to keep my spare bedroom all to myself, especially since it has such a great view of the Rotterdam skyline. I live with my dachshund Laika, but she doesn't talk back very much. That's another reason why I've decided to make my guest bedroom available on Airbnb. In the evening I am mostly home and always open to a nice conversation, or to just hang out. But please don't feel obliged, as I know very well how nice it can be to retreat in a nice private room when travelling.  
I look forward to meeting you!
Jolie

name: Rental unit in Rotterdam · ★4.88 · 1 bedroom · 3 beds · 1 bath
description:
The centrally located luxurious studio is in the most beautiful area of Rotterdam, the Scheepvaartkwartier, where historic sailing ships gently float on the water. The studio is in a monumental building from 1860 and completely renovated in 2020. Public transport options like tram, metro & watertaxi are 3 min away. Relax in The Park, enjoy many of the atmospheric restaurants, enjoy breathtaking views from the Euromast or stroll along the Maas River. All a few steps away!

The space
The studio is conveniently located on the ground floor. It's a private space equipped with all comforts. It has a very comfortable queensize bed with an awarded mattress, an extra bunk bed, TV with Netflix/Disney+/Videoland, fridge, table and chair, Sonos music player, closet, washing machine, tumble dryer, Nespresso coffee machine & water cooker. The luxurious bathroom has a rainshower with separate handshower, sink and toilet. Bathtowels, shampoo, conditioner, hairdryer, iron, water,
neighborhood_overview:
The Scheepvaartkwartier is a protected cityscape. Stately mansions on classic avenues bring the rich shipping history of Rotterdam to life. A romantic location for couples, who like to be immortalized by a photograph against a picturesque backdrop. Anyone who feels like a glass of wine and a tasty dinner can go to atmospheric restaurants such as Loos, Zinc or Louise Petit. The amazing Bar Berta is just next door, where you can have the best tapas outside Spain!

You’re steps away from many of the Rotterdam highlights like the Euromast Park, the Maas River, historical Veerhaven, Erasmusbrug, Markthal and cultural destinations like the Kunsthal Museum.

The Park is a popular place to relax and picnic in the summer. Moreover, all kinds of festivals and events take place. The park is home to the Euromast, the highest observation tower in the Netherlands. A restaurant with a panoramic view of the city and harbor is located at an altitude of 100 meters.
host_about: I love meeting people, music, travelling and my home town Rotterdam. I'm an Airbnb fan from day one! Next to being an Airbnb host myself I love using it while travelling. I'm very relaxed and super-positive!

name: Dome in Rotterdam · ★4.57 · 4 bedrooms · 4 beds · 1.5 baths
description:
Penthouse Prison, located in the heart of Rotterdam situated on the top floor of the former PoliceBuilding.
A UNIQUE EXPERIENCE FOR FRIENDS AND FAMILY

Penthouse Prison is part of a social project, called Heilige Boontjes. The basic idea is that young Rotterdammers - that have a so-called distance to the labour market - will be helped and trained to get and hold a job in the cafe, restaurant on the ground floor and the Bed&Breakfast on the top floor.

The space
Of the complex of 6 prison cells, 4 cells have been converted with modern beds for comfort, but the general impression of the prison is still intact. There is one cell with a queen sized bed and three with a single bed. One cell is used as a toilet and one is used for general purpose to relax with a tv and books.
Thanks to the unwavering commitment of Daan Bakker from Daf-architecten, the building has been given a new future while retaining its social purpose.

Guest access<
neighborhood_overview:
Penthouse Prison is located on Eendrachtsplein (Union Square) It is located in the very heart of Rotterdam with the North-South axis connecting Centraal Station with the Art area (o.a. Museum Boymans and Kunsthal) to the South and connecting the Lijnban shopping area with the up-and coming Oude Westen area.
The hustle and bustle nightlife in the Witte de Witstraat and the serenity of The Park are within a ten minute walk.
YOU WILL NOT FIND A LOCATION MORE CENTRAL.
host_about: We are part of Heilige Boontjes, a social project to give Youngsters In Rotterdam a second chance.

name: Rental unit in Rotterdam · 1 bedroom · 1 bed · 1 bath
description:
Beautiful spacious apartment on the 9th floor with amazing sights and in lively neighborhood with lots of entertainment. Ideally located only 5 kms away from the Eurovision 2020 event venue Ahoy and 5 kms away from the city centre. Public transport is situated only 300 meters from the apartment.

The space
The spacious apartment is situated on the 9th floor of the building. There is an elevator in the building that brings you to your own entrance on the 9th floor. After exploring all that Rotterdam has to offer, you can unwind on the indoors balcony with lounge set (so if it's raining you are still able to sit on the balcony), or on our huge couch, or catch a bite on the ground floor. The apartment of 89 m2 has spacious living room and an open kitchen with an island. We also have a dishwasher, plus all the other kitchen appliances you need! Which I doubt you will use because of the great offer of restaurants on the ground floor.

Tired? Time for some Net
neighborhood_overview:
The apartment is situated in the middle of lively neighborhood with lots of entertainment. So take the elevator to the ground floor, walk out of the building and you are a few steps away from the cinema, a game hall, bowling alleys, 6 (!!) restaurants with a lot of varieties of world food, fast food chains and the football stadium "de Kuip" (home of football club Feyenoord).

Furthermore it is only 10 minutes away from the city centre and a few minutes away from the beautiful Wilhelminapier (the Manhattan of the Netherlands).

name: Condo in Rotterdam · ★5.0 · 2 bedrooms · 2 beds · 1.5 baths
description:
Modern sunny apartment with windows and balconies all around. Huge roof terrace with Rotterdam skyline view and lush green. Close to metro, citycenter, central station and zoo. National monument from the 1930's and completely renovated in 2010.

The space
This 1930s appartment is part of a friendly modernist yellow brick building designed by the Dutch architecture icon Jaap Bakema (Van den Broek&Bakema).

The house has a typical portico access which means a private front door and two staircases to enter.

The house is very light and sunny with lots of windows and balconies all around.

The living quarters form one continuous space: kitchen, dining and seating.

Large plants make the interior almost as green as outdoors.

Every sleeping room has double openable doors accessing a balcony.

The master bedroom has access to the lush green roof garden with outdoor dining table.

Total floorspa
neighborhood_overview:
Blijdorp is a lush green laidback residential neighborhood directly next to the Central Station and city centre.

In our street you find Vroesenpark with the relaxed Parkpavillion for food and drinks in the sun. The park is great for jogging and has outdoor fitness facilities.

A short walk along the romatic Singel waterway you get to the entrance of Blijdorp Zoo.

Around the corner you can have breakfast at Sajoer juice bar or grab a beer at Statencafé.
host_about: We are Emilie and Kris, two architects, with daughter Roos. We're fond of veggies and fruits from our allotment garden, our oldtimer Mercedes, sailing. We love to receive you in our self-renovated house.

host_about:
Hey Everyone, 

I am so excited to be a part of the AirBNB community. Im Canadian and spent 10 years living and working in Vancouver, Canada as an investigator and have recently relocated to the Netherlands.

My background is in law enforcement and I currently work in football (soccer). During my time in North America, and occasionally in Europe, I work in film and TV.

I live a very and active healthy lifestyle and also train Brazilian Jiu Jitsu, CrossFit and travel frequently to study and train. 

I use AIRBNB a lot to travel with my boyfriend Ronald as well as he moves around a lot between Europe, North America and Australia in the horticultural industry for long durations.

I am a very easy going, happy person who is respectful, enthusiastic, friendly and polite and promise to make your visit as enjoyable as possible and/or to treat your homes with the utmost care.

I am always looking forward to using airbnb to travel and host to experience new cultures, meet new people and see the world.

Urban, spacious and sunny apartment in Blijdorp - one of the popular areas of Rotterdam. 76m2 meters with a big living room, open kitchen and lovely garden with both a terrace and lounge spot to enjoy sun. The house is built in typical architectural 30s style and recently renovated with great facilities: new bathroom with rain shower and separate bath. Our bath is perfect for a relaxed evening. The house is a perfect fit for both working from home and vacation.

The space
The house is perfectly located in Blijdorp, a relaxed, well-kept neighborhood. The Vroesenpark is a 300 meter walk and it is only 1 metro stop from Central Station and Rotterdam city centre (5-10 min by bike). Also Park Zestienhoven is very nearby. Our quests are always welcome to borrow our (2) bikes to have the proper Dutch experience and explore the city and nature by bike. The house is a perfect fit to combine work with time off. We have a work place as well in the kitchen and in our souterr

name: Rental unit in Rotterdam · 1 bedroom · 1 bed · 1 bath
description:
Erg knus en gezellig huisje (Ibiza style) dichtbij het centrum van Rotterdam. Het huisje is van alle gemakken voorzien; je kunt je er prima een weekend lang opsluiten om tot rust te komen (wij hebben er zelf een jaar lang met heel veel plezier gewoond :), maar wil je toch het terras op, shoppen, cultuur snuiven of lekker uiteten, op de fiets of met de metro ben je in no time in het centrum.

neighborhood_overview:
Ons plekje is uniek in Rotterdam! Omringd door water met veel groen (en heel veel leuke watervogels). Elke dag komen er wel een aantal vogels gezellig buurten! Vooral de grote zwanen zijn zeer imposant! En er is rust! Je hebt niet het gevoel zo dicht bij het centrum van Rotterdam te zijn.

De Kralingse plas ligt op 5 minuten fiets afstand en als je een minuutje verder fietst, zit je in het centrum van Kralingen met zijn gezellige barretjes een eettentjes.

Fiets je de andere kant op, dan ben je in 20 minuutjes (inclusief het pondje) in Kinderdijk, met al zijn mooie molens!

En het blijft een fijn idee dat je met bus, tram en metro (die laatste bevind zich op een minuutje fiets afstand) zo in het bruisende hart van Rotterdam bent!!

Perfectly located close to public transport, the best bars & clubs, cool shops, supermarket & proper good food.

This spacious apartment comes to you fully furnished & equipped with sound proof double glass windows.

neighborhood_overview:
Witte de Withstraat also called White Street is without a doubt the coolest most vibrant street of Rotterdam. This street is also home to the very famous bar ‘De Witte Aap’, voted ‘Best Bar in the World’ by Lonely Planet.

Never a Dull Moment
With rows & rows of only proper good food, bars, clubs, wall arts & quirky shops igniting your senses, one should only fall in love with feeling so alive here. The true city vibe beats on this street, so if you're looking to stay right at the heart of Rotterdam, this is the place to be.

This is my profile! As a host I feel it's my duty to make you feel at home during your stay. I like to improve my accommodation based on reviews from actual guests and have made many (small) improvements overtime to increase the overall guest experience. 

Personally I travel quite often around the world and get a lot of inspiration from other people's accommodations as well. I believe that with our ideas combined together, we can create a picture-perfect 5 star accommodation. Welcome to your (temporary) home where we will be at your service 24 hours a day, 7 days a week.

Supernova Hotel features a restaurant, free bikes, a bar and garden in Rotterdam. With a terrace, the 4-star hotel has air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi, each with a private bathroom. The accommodation offers a 24-hour front desk, a concierge service and luggage storage for guests.

Breakfast & brunch are served a-la-carte in our restaurant each morning from 7:30am-12:00pm so you can start the day at your own pace. Our barista-trained team will happily serve your coffee just the way you like it and give you local tips on how to make the most of you
neighborhood_overview: Rotterdam is the ultimate place for a global nomad to feel at home with its melting pot of different cultures. Want to live like a local? Easy. Grab a Supernova bike and explore the hustle and bustle of the neighbourhood. Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Het Nieuwe Instituut, Chabot Museum and Sonneveld House. The nearest airport is Rotterdam The Hague Airport, 8 km from Supernova Hotel. You have great places to have breakfast, lunch or dinner just within 800 meter of the hotel. For local tips follow us on Instagram.

name: Condo in Rotterdam · ★5.0 · 3 bedrooms · 3 beds · 1 bath
description:
Situated 3,5 min walk from Rotterdam Central is this stunning apartment in a 120 year old building with many of the original features and high living room ceilings still intact.

Facing a green and lush boulevard with water, this is your perfect tranquil home base in a bustling city. You can escape the madness on the balcony or in the large garden.

The city is full of contrast. The apartment is located in one of the finest old streets of the city. The renowned modern architecture is never far.

The space
You enter through a high door in the magnificent old facade.

After hanging your coat, enter the spacious dining area with views out of huge windows on the trees, water and century-old houses in the distance.

Take a seat and listen to some music, or head up to the living area with the best couch in the world and French doors to a huge balcony with morning sun.

Walk back down and past the kitchen. Entering the
neighborhood_overview:
The neighborhood is one of Rotterdam’s greenest and quietest. However, it is lined with cute pubs and hip coffee places. Also, you are never far away from downtown, where there is an abundance of food, drink and art culture.

Right from the doorstep is a boulevard which can be followed for miles. To the city center, or away from it to the park.
host_about:
Hi! I am a Dutch airline pilot with knack for traveling. I’m probably booking last-minute, because when on holiday I don’t plan ahead most of the times! Most often I travel together with Lotte, my girlfriend of 7 years. We live in Rotterdam.

Love music, reading, hiking, living with intent.

We have decided it would be fun to live in a different city for a few months, and therefore we rent out our apartment to reduce our own costs of staying somewhere. There are no reviews of the apartment itself as of yet, but I have been rated highly while travelling, and mean to perpetuate this while renting out. 

If you look at the map and the pictures you can see it’s a superb apartment. We are looking forward to meeting you.

name: Hotel in Rotterdam · 1 bedroom · 1 bed · 1 shared bath
description:
An efficient layout sets the tone in these rooms. Light and trendy colors, natural materials, atmospheric lighting and everything you need as an urban traveler, at your fingertips.

The space
Do you wish to enjoy the comfort of a hotel and benefit from the freedom of an apartment? Then 171 is your best choice in Rotterdam. There is a host present and in our living room you will find the self check-in. You receive the digital key for the entrance of the hotel by email. Feel at home in a fine design setting. Venture out and discover roaring Rotterdam with 171 on the Nieuwe Binnenweg as your base.

Guest access
For those who want a bit more space. With a hint more comfort and a sofa. Of course in an atmospheric design environment with warm and pale colours.

name: Boat in Rotterdam · ★4.81 · 1 bedroom · 1 bed · 1 private bath
description:
Captain's Cabin is one of the most romantic floating stay in the city centre of Rotterdam: a tiny house in the backend of a Coaster from 1909 with an own terrace to watch the sunrise and drink your coffee/tea. Located in the historic harbors of the Maritime District with all kind of extra optional facilities like a jacuzzi, electric boating, etc. aboard.

The space
Captains Cabin consists of 2 rooms; the wheelinghouse upstairs with a terrace on the backside of it and a cosy sleeping- & livingroom downstairs with a kitchen and bathroom

Guest access
You have your own backend of the ship including your own terrace. On the middle of the ship another terrace sometimes can be used if other guests are ok with that; we use signing to let you know.

Other things to note
You're on a ship so please be aware water is all around you, so be careful when getting on and off the ship.

Registration number
0599 3828
neighborhood_overview: The Maritime District is the historic heart of the city centre and is an awesome place to stay as it has >200 bars, restaurants & musea.

name: Rental unit in Rotterdam · ★4.80 · 1 bedroom · 1 bed · 1 bath
description:
Welkom in ons appartement in Rotterdam-West, een bruisende wijk met veel restaurants, koffiezaken en winkels. Het toeristische centrum bevindt zich op loopafstand, maar er stoppen ook een aantal trams voor de deur die je praktisch op alle leuke plekken in de stad brengt.

The space
Het huis heeft een ruime woonkamer en een fijne slaapkamer met tweepersoonsbed aan de rustige kant van het huis. Eventueel is er een derde matras aanwezig (maar geen bed!). Aan de keuken en slaapkamer grenst een heerlijk balkon waar het vooral in de ochtend en middag (met zon) goed vertoeven is.

Voor vragen of bezoektips kun je altijd een berichtje sturen!

Other things to note
Wij wonen zelf in dit huis, dus er zijn ook persoonlijke spullen aanwezig. Verwacht geen lege hotelkamers ;-)

host_about: Hi there! I'm a creative, curious and open-minded girl living and working in Rotterdam. I love traveling, writing, photography, art and coffee. About the latter I write daily as an editor. Hope I can offer you a nice stay in Rotterdam!

name: Boat in Rotterdam · ★4.73 · 5 bedrooms · 5 beds · 3 baths
description:
We're looking forward to welcome you aboard of our totally renovated and upgraded Coaster! This unique ship from 1909 with 3 luxurious fully equipped 2-room Cabins is located in the old harbors of the Maritime District, centre of Rotterdam. Great for meetings, lounging and thé perfect spot to start and end your explorations of Rotterdam.

The space
With 70+ square metres of terrace, an outside BBQ-kitchen, 3 kitchens and 3 bathrooms inside, high ceilings, all kind of facilities and extra services aboard this ship is the ultimate stay for all who want to fall in love with Rotterdam. 3 own entrances so perfect for multiple families or friends but also possible to walk from one cabin to the other.

Guest access
You have all the ship:-)

Other things to note
Please be aware this is not a party boat...we have a lot of neighbors and strict silence after 10pm (at least outside) should be respected!

name: Loft in Rotterdam · ★5.0 · 1 bedroom · 1 bed · 1 bath
description:
Love luxury easy living in the city center? Be at the heart of it all, this good-looking 70sqm Luxury Loft Apartment is located at the hippest street of Rotterdam 'Witte de Withstraat'.
This awesome spacious pad is fully equipped & has laundry facility at the next building.

Witte de Withstraat also called White Street is without a doubt the coolest most vibrant street of Rotterdam. This street is also home to the very famous bar ‘De Witte Aap’, voted ‘Best Bar in the World’ by Lonely Planet.

Never a Dull Moment
With rows & rows of only proper good food, bars, clubs, wall arts & quirky shops igniting your senses, one should only fall in love with feeling so alive here. The true city vibe beats on this street, so if you're looking to stay right at the heart of Rotterdam, this is the place to be.
