name: Home in Rotterdam · ★4.84 · 2 bedrooms · 1 bed · 1.5 baths
description:
Een authentiek Nederlands huisje volop in het groen maar dan in Rotterdam. Kan dat?! Ja dat kan. Hier vind je geen auto's voor de deur maar een grote steiger aan het water. Spring op de fiets (of in het water) en binnen no-time zit je in het hart van Rotterdam, Schiedam of Delft!

Ons dijkhuisje is gebouwd in 1895 en behoort tot historisch Overschie. De authentieke stijl hebben we zoveel mogelijk geprobeerd te behouden zonder te bezuinigen op een beetje hedendaagse luxe.

The space
Het huisje ligt aan de Schie, ter hoogte van de Hoge Brug. Voor het huis ligt een steiger waar je vanaf de middag totdat het donker wordt, heerlijk in de zon kan zitten. Zowel aan de voor als achterkant van het huis is alleen maar groen te zien.

Na de entree kom je in de woonkamer, waar de hoekbank de ruimte deelt met de keuken en eettafel. Er is een vaatwasser, vriezer en koffiezetapparaat aanwezig. Ook is er een ruim assortiment aan kruiden beschikbaar.
neighborhood_overview:
Het huisje ligt aan verschillende fiets- en wandelroutes, maar ook met de auto is het goed bereikbaar en kan je genoeg kanten op.

Overschie is zelfs voor vele Rotterdammers nog een onontdekt stukje historie in Rotterdam. In het oudste straatje loop je langs smalle huisjes met kanten gordijntjes en glas in lood. De kerk slaat ieder kwartier en de koeien grazen rustig in het verborgen weiland tussen de huizen. In het nieuwe centrum van Overschie (10 minuten lopen) vind je verschillende voorzieningen zoals een Plus, Lidl, Indiër, goede snackbar (met vega opties), Hema en een bakker.

Ga je naar links, dan ga je langs de Schie richting Rotterdam. Onderweg kom je langs historisch Delfshaven en Coolhaven, om via het museumpark en de Witte de With het centrum in te rijden.

Ga je naar rechts, dan ga je door historisch Overschie, langs de oude villa's langs de Schie, de Zweth en de weilanden tot je in Delft belandt. Ook zit je dichtbij natuurgebied Delfste Hou
host_about: Samen met mijn vriend Jesse hebben wij het afgelopen halfjaar heel hard gewerkt om ons huis om te toveren tot een paleisje. Zelf wonen we in de zomer voornamelijk in onze blokhut in de natuur en daarom verhuren we ons huis graag aan anderen zodat zij er net zo van kunnen genieten als wij!

Utterly bursting with life, and outside the usual tourist trail, the street and immediate neighbourhood has an addictive atmosphere. A One-of-a-kind fusion of Asian street culture, European indulgences, and Middle Eastern food-market energy.

In 1 minute you can be relaxing on the bank of one of the widest and most magical canals in Rotterdam, the “Heemradsingel”. The space
kleurrijke, ruime kamer (48m2), heerlijk koel in de zomer! Zonder tv maar met veel boeken (en prima wifi). Let op: hoogte onder balken is 2.03 m1 en plaatselijk 1.96 m1

Guest access
U heeft toegang tot de tuin en de accomodatie

Other things to note
Er bevindt zich een sauna in de ruimte. Die kunt u gebruiken tegen een vergoeding van €15,- (voor schoonmaakkosten, handdoeken en elektra). Bij meerdere dagen saunagebruik rekenen we €10,- per dag e
neighborhood_overview: Veel wandelmogelijkheden in de buurt, ons huis ligt naast een park en er zijn meerdere parken in de nabije omgeving. Een winkelcentrum, restaurantjes en openbaar vervoer liggen op loopafstand.
host_about: I love to travel whenever possible, meet new people and get inspired.

name: Loft in Rotterdam · ★4.90 · Studio · 1 bed · 1.5 baths
description:
Met veel liefde gerenoveerd design, zolder loft te Rotterdam-west. In een rustige straat met om de hoek winkels, cafe’s en restaurants. Goed te bereiken met openbaar vervoer en slechts 5 min van de binnen stad. De loft is geheel voor uzelf en beschikt over alle benodigdheden en luxe voor een ultiem verblijf. Badkamer met bad, lux tweepersoonsbed, complete keuken. Wij staan voor u klaar met tips over de stad, bijvoorbeeld wat je kan doen in Covid-19 tijden, zodat je verblijf onvergetelijk wordt.

The space
Met veel liefde hebben we dit Appartement net zelf gerenoveerd, ontworpen en verbouwd met oog voor de authentieke elementen van het pand. Het is een licht, gezellige en fijne Ruimte. Helemaal ingericht met mooie design meubels en kunst. We hebben rekening gehouden met alle benodigd heden, zodat u een ultiem luxe ervaring heeft. Denk aan een bad en een heel fijn lux boxspring-bed.

neighborhood_overview: Wij vinden zelf dat we in de tofste wijk van Rotterdam wonen. Het bied alles wat Rotterdam heeft. De straat zelf is heel rustig en u kijkt uit op een grote binnen tuin. Om de hoek zijn gezellige cafe's , eettentjes en diverse winkels. Daarnaast is het centrum en diverse bezienswaardigheden, zoals Euromast, musea, historisch Delfshaven binnen 5 min  te bereiken.

name: Home in Rotterdam · ★5.0 · 2 bedrooms · 2 beds · 1.5 baths
description:
Looking for a comfort stay? Here you will find 2 large bedrooms with kingsize beds (180X210) and a private luxurious bathroom with bath and walk in shower. Also a private living area with kitchen and roof terrace with an amazing skyline view! No need to search for a parking spot and parking costs. You will have your own spot in our garage. City centre and beautiful forest with lake within walking distance. Need some advice for great activities? Just ask us or read our manual ;-)

The space
Environment friendly new build house with a private 25m² terrasse, next to a closed courtyard with play equipment for children. Free wifi of course and Netflix if you want to watch your favorite serie in the evening.

Registration number
0599 5009 D6FF FB7B ED30
neighborhood_overview:
Located in a quite area in Kralingen-Crooswijk, next to the city centre of Rotterdam within walking distance. You can visit cafe's, restaurants, shops and a brewery in the immediate vicinity at the Zwaanshals, or walk into the other direction to the Kralingse Bos, a lake with a beautifull forest around it.

Like to sport? Go to Schuttersveld around the corner to have free acces to the tennis court, outdoor fitness equipment and running track, or take a run around the lake of Kralingse Bos.
host_about:
We, Stef and Jeen, are a couple living in the beautiful city Rotterdam. We are both born and raised in the area so we are happy to tell you more about all the great places to visit.

We used to work in the hospitality branche for many years and we love to travel.  In the past we used Airbnb the to stay at somebody’s home, but now it’s time to be your host.

Please feel free to contact us if you have any questions. 

Hope to see you soon!

neighborhood_overview:
Blijdorp is a vibrant and green neighborhood located in the north of Rotterdam, known for its beautiful zoo, historic architecture, and various amenities. The neighborhood is known for its child-friendly environment with several parks, playgrounds, and schools in the vicinity.

The location of Blijdorp is ideal for both tourists and local residents. The city center of Rotterdam, with its bustling shops, restaurants, and nightlife, is easily accessible within a short distance. Rotterdam Central Station, a major hub for train, tram, and metro transportation, is also easily accessible from Blijdorp.

neighborhood_overview: Als bewoner van het Van Vollenhovenkwartier geniet je iedere dag van de grandeur van de monumentale wijk Het Scheepvaartkwartier. Het Scheepvaartkwartier, ook wel Nieuwe Werk genoemd, is een karakteristieke en veelzijdige buurt. De maritieme sfeer, de indrukwekkende historische bebouwing en het vele groen maken de buurt tot een aantrekkelijk stuk Rotterdam. Het leuke van de ligging is dat het omgeven is door de klassieke allure en uitstraling van het Scheepvaartkwartier terwijl het bruisende stadscentrum makkelijk te bereiken is. Of het nu gaat om de Markthal, het Museumkwartier, Rotterdam Centraal, de Nieuwe Maas of de Wilhelminapier. Alle hotspots zijn dichtbij. Haltes voor tram, bus, watertaxi en het metro zijn op loopafstand te bereiken. In de wijk vind je horeca waaronder toprestaurants, delicatessen, een AH, musea, kan je borrelen in de prachtige historische Veerhaven of ontspannen in het Park. Sfeervol, uniek en historisch wonen op een van de beste stadslocaties van Nederland me
host_about: As a resident of the Van Vollenhovenkwartier, you can enjoy the grandeur of the monumental Het Scheepvaartkwartier district every day. A neighborhood known for its nearly 100 national monuments and as one of the richest neighborhoods in the Netherlands. In a few steps from your home you will find top restaurants and museums, you can have a drink in the beautiful historic Veerhaven or relax with friends in the Park. The other Rotterdam pearls are also at your feet. Whether it concerns the Markthal, Museum Quarter, Rotterdam Central or the Wilhelminapier. All hotspots are close by and also easy to reach by public transport and water taxi. Furthermore, the district is car-free and there is no through traffic.

There are nice walking routes down the riverside and there is a beautifulll park which will make you relax after a day of work or study.
host_about: I'm a passionate kitesurfer. I work at a vocational school in Rotterdam. I love my homecity and when there's wind you can find me on the beaches of Zeeland and Hoek van Holland.

name: Rental unit in Rotterdam · ★4.89 · 2 bedrooms · 1 bed · 1.5 baths
description:
Welcome to my beautiful and light bohemian home on Noordereiland. An unique space in the heart of Rotterdam . You'll be staying in my 75m2 apartment on the ground floor, including spacious modern kitchen and living room, 2 bedrooms (1x king-size bed, 1x childbed with slide ;) and a bathroom with bath and shower, sunny balcony and 50m2 garden on the south-west. And oh: my worm bin (yes, do my own composting ;).

The space
My apartment was newly renovated in 2020 and is fully equipped with everything you need: a sustainable bed, kitchen equipment, wifi, washing machine, dishwasher, towels and sheets. You name it.

You can enter the house through the sunny garden, where you'll also find a balcony with hammock to chill out (in spring and summer). Do note: it is a ground apartment, accessible though the garden or front door, but does have a small staircase.

Registration number
0599 65FB AF58 BAC2 541F
neighborhood_overview:
The apartment is based in the hart of the city on the Noordereiland, an island that lies between the Meuse, right between the three iconic Rotterdam bridges. From the window you can see the river and the big white bridge (Erasmus bridge).

The neighbourhood is a very laid back place in a city that is vibrant and urban, with very nice people (so are my neighbours :). There is little car traffic as people hardly pass the island itself to get somewhere. There is a small Spar supermarket, two coffee and lunchrooms, a pop-up restaurant and several kids playgrounds in the middle of the island.
host_about:
My name is Sabine. I am an entrepreneurial anthropologist, living & working in Rotterdam.  I started my own company in 2015: BlueCity: based in a former swimmingpool in Rotterdam (Tropicana). Its core business involves sustainability and showing what we can do with waste :-)...
And my little son Jan and I have created our own paradise in the city! 

My interests are social entrepreneurship, social innovation, surfing, circle economy, systemic thinking, more, more and ever more sports and (online) large scale interventions & sustainability.

The world is my number one country :-!  But aside from all that, I love to learn! About you, about the world and about your world!
So hope to meet you soon :-)!

host_about:
We are Natasja and Mylan -  a couple who live in Amsterdam and own several small businesses in the direct area and in Rotterdam.  

We started in 2012 with our B&B -Charming Apartment with Canal View!  In august 2015 we opened a small pension Hotel Midtown Amsterdam. In May 2021 our brend new accomodation in Rotterdam opend. Now we have 4 studio/apartments in Amsterdam and 4 studio/apartements in Rotterdam. We would love to welcome you in both city's! 

We enjoy living in Amsterdam, just 5 minutes from the hotel in Amsterdam. 

Our goal is to offer comfort, good mattresses, privacy, a clean apartment and a good location to access all the main attractions of Amsterdam/Rotterdam culture.

We would like to welcome you and hope to offer more accomodations in the Netherlands in the future.

Stylish and spacious 4-person studio in the center of Rotterdam. There are two comfortable double beds, a spacious bathroom with shower, toilet and sink. The Hofplein is around the corner and Rotterdam Central Station is 150 meters away. The studio has a kitchen with cooking facilities and a dishwasher. Ideal for families or friends.

The space
Spacious and luxurious studio in the heart of Rotterdam. Suitable for 4 people. There is a kitchen with Nespresso coffee machine, kettle, pans, dishes, fridge, towel and tea towel and dishwasher. Furthermore there is a bathroom with shower, sink and a toilet, and the studio has a double bed. Bed linen and bath linen are arranged. The studio is located on the ground floor.

Registration number
Exempt
neighborhood_overview: When you step out the door, you are right in the center of Rotterdam. Nice coffee corners, lunchrooms, restaurants, shops and sights and the well-known Hofplein are right around the corner. The central station is located 150 meters from the accommodation. You can also visit the Markthal within 15 minutes walking distance for some delicious food.
host_about:
We are Natasja and Mylan -  a couple who live in Amsterdam and own several small businesses in the direct area and in Rotterdam.  

We started in 2012 with our B&B -Charming Apartment with Canal View!  In august 2015 we opened a small pension Hotel Midtown Amsterdam. In May 2021 our brend new accomodation in Rotterdam opend. Now we have 4 studio/apartments in Amsterdam and 4 studio/apartements in Rotterdam. We would love to welcome you in both city's! 

We enjoy living in Amsterdam, just 5 minutes from the hotel in Amsterdam. 

Our goal is to offer comfort, good mattresses, privacy, a clean apartment and a good location to access all the main attractions of Amsterdam/Rotterdam culture.

We would like to welcome you and hope to offer more accomodations in the Netherlands in the future.

name: Rental unit in Rotterdam · ★5.0 · 1 bedroom · 1 bed · 1 bath
description:
Heerlijk rustig 2-persoons appartement midden in het bruisende Rotterdam west. De Nieuwe Binnenweg is een van de beroemdste, oudste straten van Rotterdam en ook de langste winkelstraat van Nederland!
In de buurt is dus genoeg te doen, mooie boetiekjes, heerlijke cafe's & restaurants, een poppodium & beauty salons, alles is in deze straat te vinden. Tram 4 stopt recht voor de deur. In het luxe privé appartement kom je tot rust van de drukte van de stad, en ben je van alle gemakken voorzien.

The space
Het appartement bevindt zich op de begane grond, en door middel van een aantal kleine trapjes kom je in de verschillende ruimtes. Deze verschillende woonlagen geven het appartement een speels karakter, dankzij de hoge plafonds blijft het een ruimtelijk geheel.
Je komt binnen in de hal, aan je linkerhand bevindt zich dan de badkamer en rechts de woonkamer. De slaapkamer bevind zich in het hoger gelegen gedeelte. Omdat het een appartement op de begane grond

name: Townhouse in Rotterdam · ★4.87 · 1 bedroom · 1 bed · 1.5 baths
description:
In a building from 1888 the bel-etage is the floor above a raised basement. It's in the most lively part of the city with a great variety of shops and restaurants out the front door and a green oasis with a balcony at the back. The metro station at just 150m from the front door takes you straight to the beach at Hoek van Holland.

The space
The front room (4x6m) has windows to the street and a bed of 160x200cm. It has two comfortable chais and a TV and it is separated from tha back room with a sliding stained glass door. The dining room is 4x6m with a table that's big enough for dinner and work. it borders on an open kitchen with a gas stove and an electric oven. And there's a separate bathroom that you recah from the dining room with a shower and a toilet. We have a fiber to the home internet with 1Gigabit up and down.

Guest access
Within 200 meters there’s a metro station (lines A, B and C) and stops for buses (line 44 and 32) and tram 4,
neighborhood_overview: Within 250 meters there’s a huge variety of things that you want nearby: shops, breakfast places, restaurants, cafes, a night shop, the Emergency Room of the Erasmus University Hospital the Depot of the Boijmans Museum and stops of the main lines of the metro, trams and buses. There are four supermarkets and the best vinyl record shops of Europe within 700 meters.
host_about: We love to travel and have done so through over 80 countries mainly over land. In Rotterdam we have a company in the hospitality industry called City Safari in which we invite people to visit the superdiverse Rotterdamers in their homes, houses of worship or civic initiatives. This way we help organizations build their diversity program by actually meeting the people who make up the city in person and we invite individuals to explore the city by meeting these people and going places outside the city center.

name: Rental unit in Rotterdam · ★4.94 · 1 bedroom · 1 bed · 1.5 baths
description:
Located at one of the few remaining canals in Rotterdam this apartment is a perfect starting point for sightseeing, visiting musea and trying out many restaurants. Positioned in a unique 70s style apartment building, with its 60m2 it’s an ideal space for a single person or couple

The space
The apartment has a 2 person bed, balcony facing the south with a parasol and a big kitchen and bar with all the amenities for preparing your own breakfast/dinner, including a moka with coffee. Living room with big sofa, dining table/home office, fast and stable WiFi, speakers with audiocast and smart TV. Bathroom contains waterfall shower, sink, dryer and washing machine and there is a separate toilet. Soap, towels and linen are included.
The apartment is located on the first floor (accessible with elevator) and has private access. Guests can use the entire space without any disturbance.

Other things to note
We have a dog (the dog will not be in the
neighborhood_overview: The city center is special for its experimental architecture, street life and great food. Walking distance from major train and metro stations, near landmarks (Markthal, Kubus houses and waterfront) and famous neighbourhoods. Main shopping and restaurant areas are just a stone-throw away, but the immediate surrounding is tranquil. Arrive by train or car (p+r easily accessible by metro) and make use of the newly renovated pedestrian public spaces or rent a bike. Also a good starting point for day trips to The Hague, Delft or Amsterdam.

name: Condo in Rotterdam · ★4.75 · 1 bedroom · 1 bed · 1 bath
description:
An 80s social housing condo apartment that we have bought and styled to modern comfort. Located on the third floor (no elevator) with two balconies and many windows. You can enjoy natural light and skies, but can block it out almost completely with the shutters when you want to fire up the home cinema system or sleep on the luxurious boxspring. There is a dedicated workroom with two desks at which you can either stand or sit, use an extra monitor and cable up to the internet for max speed.

Other things to note
Please note that we have a cat in the house. Her name is Mette and she is 11 years old - she is shy and sweet and generally not intrusive. When you gain her trust, she will typically come and sit on your lap in the evening if you're reading a book or watching a movie.
Take the cat into account when you are making the booking, and consider whether you have allergies and whether you appreciate having a cat in the living space. For us, it's a great joy.<
neighborhood_overview: The beautiful Heemraadssingel and park is just around the corner to picknick or do your runs. The Middellandplein area features an excellent pizzeria, ice cream store and multiple coffee bars.
host_about: As a child I once read about Leonardo Davinci and the homo universalis. This concept has stayed with me for the rest of my life. I will always be an inventor, artist, engineer, philosopher, musician and entrepreneur. I have an open mind, like to learn about things by experiencing them first-hand and love foreign cultures.

name: Houseboat in Rotterdam · ★4.77 · 2 bedrooms · 4 beds · 1.5 baths
description:
Een verblijf op een van onze Wikkelboats in de Rijnhaven is zeker onvergetelijk! Op een toplocatie, gelegen tussen de metropolische Kop van Zuid en het hippe Katendrecht en vlakbij het bruisende centrum. Wikkelboats zijn zeer comfortabele tiny houseboats welke multifunctioneel en duurzaam zijn ingericht. Kom heerlijk tot rust, hangend in de tweepersoons hangmat onder de veranda en/of geniet van het prachtige uitzicht om je heen vanaf je ruime terras aan het water...wedden dat je betoverd wordt?

The space
Je hebt twee fijne woon-/slaapkamers, een badkamer, keukentje en een fijn terras met hangmat en ook nog een buitendouche.
Ter info: tussen ~10.30-15.00u kan terrasluik naar kelder op voorterras door ons (schoonmaakteam) worden gebruikt voor ophalen en opbergen van spullen. Uiteraard proberen we jullie daarbij zo min mogelijk te storen!

neighborhood_overview: Deze Wikkelboat is onderdeel van het project "Floating Rotterdam", een nieuw initiatief in de Rijnhaven van Rotterdam. Je zit hier letterlijk naast de leukste bioscoop van Rotterdam, LantarenVenster en hebt tal van restaurants en theaters en veel watersportmogelijkheden in de buurt. Niet voor niets dat dit dé nieuwe hotspot van Rotterdam wordt genoemd. Na een prachtige en zeer aanbevelenswaardige wandeling over de Erasmusbrug van 10 minuten zit je in centrum Rotterdam.

name: Home in Rotterdam · ★4.21 · 3 bedrooms · 6 beds · 1 bath
description:
Sfeervol dijkhuisje aan de rivier De Rotte!
Erg gezellig huisje met fijne aanlegsteiger en heerlijk zwemwater voor de deur!

The space
Dit dijkhuisje is het rechter huis van een 2 onder 1 kap op de dijk van de rivier de Rotte. Het ligt in de rustige wijk Hillegersberg, een wijk net buiten het centrum van Rotterdam. Het is een karakteristiek simpel dijkhuis van ruim 100 jaar oud zonder veel luxe maar wel erg sfeervol.
Het is tevens compleet ingericht.
De entree is aan de achterkant van het huis op dijkniveau. Je komt in de open keuken binnen, bij de eettafel en tevens ook de woonkamer met open haard. De keuken is simpel maar volledig ingericht.
Op de eerste verdieping zijn 2 slaapkamers met in het midden een badkamer blok. In dit blok (waar je omheen kunt lopen) bevinden zich aan de ene kant in een nis het bad (met 2 wastafels) en aan de andere kant de douche en wc (welke af te scheiden zijn door schuifdeuren). De douche en de wc bevinden op de
neighborhood_overview:
The house is situated in Hillegersberg, a nice and quiet neighbourhood nearby Rotterdam. So especially in the evenings there can't be a lot of noise.
In Hillegersberg there is a small and cosy centre with soms shops and restaurants. The supermarket is also nearby.
In front of the house is a river, which is going to several lakes.
There are also some possibility's to rent a boat.
The centre of rotterdam is 15 minutes drive and the beaches from Den Haag/ Scheveningen till Hoek van Holland are 30/45 minutes drive.
host_about:
We live 100m. from the house ourselves also in front of the River with our 3 lovely daughters. We really like this place to live because it's very quied and relaxing. 
I am working as an interieur architect.

name: Condo in Rotterdam · ★4.81 · 1 bedroom · 2 beds · 1.5 baths
description:
Spacious and light apartment on the 3th and 4th flour in the city centre of Rotterdam. The apartment overviews the Binnerotte and has a view on the Laurens Church and the popular “Markthall”

The Meent is a popular street with shops, restaurants and the best ice shop of Rotterdam (de IJssalon).

Our house is a hidden pearl on a great location.

The space
On the 3th floor you will find the comfy living room with a fully equipped open kitchen and dining area. The balcony is a nice place to sit and enjoy a morning coffee or evening wine.

The TV in the living room is a smart TV with a soundbar for watching movies. In the kitchen there is a Bose speaker to enjoy music during cooking.

On the 4th floor you will find a spacious bathroom with a tub and rain shower.

The bedroom ha comfortable boxspring beds (2 x 90 x 210 cm). They can be put together to create a kingsize bed. Trough the window there is a great view
neighborhood_overview:
Our house is located on one of the most popular streets of Rotterdam (de Meent). There are bars, restaurants and shops. The Market hall, Blaak, cube houses and Laurens Church are within walking distance.

On Saturday and Tuesday there is a big outside market on the Binnerotte. In front of our house the terraces are always filled with laughing people even on rainy days. True Rotterdam city life can be experienced here.
host_about: I’m 36 years old and I usually travel with my partner Danny who is 41 years old. We’ve been to many countries and intent to visit a new country every year. We have a baby boy that was born in 2021 so our traveling will change a bit ;)

name: Earthen home in Hoek van Holland · ★5.0 · 2 bedrooms · 1 bed · 1 bath
description:
Take a dive under nature in in the first bunker of Cocondo! In Hoek van Holland an old German telephone bunker has been transformed in to a holiday home for two adults and two children.

You will be staying in the nature reserve and national monument ‘Vinetaduin’. Beneath these dunes lie about 70 bunkers that originate from four layers of military history of the 20th century. The telephone bunker lies in the northern part, near the villa district and entrance to the beach.

The space
For the transformation of the telephone bunker, we collaborated with progressive designers and builders. They gave the bunker a new peaceful function and worked with as much ecological and circular material as possible. This way you come in contact with contemporary designers and sustainable building techniques during your stay.
The bunker now has:
- underground bedroom for two adults (1.90m high)
- box bed for one adult or two children (190 x 134cm)
-
neighborhood_overview: The town of Hoek van Holland originates from digging the Nieuwe Waterweg in 1872. In the following century, thousands of defenses were built on both banks to defend this new channel. These influences have been decisive in shaping the landscape of ‘the Hook of Holland’. Even today, the Hook is continuously subject to the influence of Rotterdam and the North Sea. If you pay close attention, you will notice this everywhere. A highlight is taking a walk along the Noorderpier or the Zandmotor at Ter heide.
host_about: Originally from Hoek van Holland and co-founder of the Cocondo concept. For the pilotbunker I will be your (online) host if you need any assistance!

Wibbine Kien, eigenaar van - en programmeur voor - deze geweldige plek heeft dit tiny house - de "pipowagen" - laten bouwen om mensen de mogelijkheid te bieden te genieten van het unieke platteland rondom Rotterdam. Het tiny house staat middenin een antieke boomgaard met appel-, peren- en walnotenbomen en is de perfecte plek om helemaal tot rust te komen.

Other things to note

neighborhood_overview: Overschie is een kleine, rustige deelgemeente in Rotterdam. Inwoners spreken over 'het dorp'. De directe omgeving van de boerderij is rustig, maar mocht u de drukte op willen zoeken: het dynamische centrum van Rotterdam met talloze musea, restaurants, en clubs ligt op 8,5 km afstand. name: Boutique hotel in Rotterdam · ★4.25 · 1 bedroom · 1 bed · 1 private bath
description:
The Cuckoo Clock is a powerful expression of some of the artist’s personal passions. Yes, this is a pretty sizable rendition of a classic cuckoo clock. However, the trademark Coenen details probably have little to do with the traditional timepiece he once bought in the Czech Republic, which inspired the work.

The space
Instead we see Marshall amplifiers and massive heavy metal guitars: a tribute to the maker’s favorite band Slayer. Never eager to please society’s esthetic common denominator, Coenen added plenty of skulls and two giant Viking swords to set the mood.

We encourage guests sleeping in the Cuckoo Clock to go a little cuckoo themselves and occasionally announce time in whatever way they please.

We encourage guests sleeping in the Cuckoo Clock to go a little cuckoo themselves and occasionally announce time in whatever way they please.

name: Boutique hotel in Rotterdam · ★3.50 · 1 bedroom · 1 bed · 1 private bath
description:
Welcome to the Candy House, where one classic story is transformed into a two-story building full of colorful delight. Over the top decorations in ceramic and sculptured wood lure in whoever gets lost in the urban forest that is Rotterdam. This room represents all the sweet temptations a modern day hedonists may desire. From cookie windows and chocolate stucco, to more adult treats such as ‘rave sweets’ and liquor bottles.

The space
It’s Hansel and Gretel on steroids, a chemical fairytale, or an average weekend for Dutch youngsters if you buy into stereotypes about our country some like to advertise. One thing is certain, no other hotel in the world has a room like this.

name: Condo in Rotterdam · ★5.0 · 2 bedrooms · 4 beds · 1 bath
description:
Welkom in ons fijne, ruime en lichte appartement van 95m2 in de Afrikaanderwijk, iets ten zuiden van de Erasmusbrug. Het is een fantastische wijk met op de woensdagen en zaterdagen een gezellige markt.

In deze centraal gelegen accommodatie ligt alles binnen handbereik. Pak een scooter, een tram, of ga lopen. Vanaf het appartement ben je snel in het centrum, maar ook bij de Kuip, Katendrecht of Kop van Zuid.

The space
Je komt binnen via de voordeur met camera bewaking en camera deurbel in de centrale hal. Dan kan je met de trap of lift naar de tweede verdieping. Via een ruime hal kom je in de grote woonkamer. Er is een eenvoudige keuken met een balkon.

De badkamer is basic, maar heeft een ruime inloopdouche. Verder is er een slaapkamer met een tweepersoonsbed en een kleinere slaapkamer met een stapelbed. Je kan hier ook een babybedje neerzetten.

Other things to note
Het is een levendige en drukke straat, dus wees daar

neighborhood_overview:
Het Nieuwe Westen has a special mix of living with metropolitan allure and typical pre-war buildings. The neighborhood is a real city district with beautiful canals, interesting shopping streets and spacious squares. This makes the Nieuwe Westen district diverse and very enjoyable! The Nieuwe Binnenweg and 1e Middelandstraat/Kruiskade are important streets that lead directly to the city center.

Several supermarkets, convenience stores, restaurants and cafes are located in the immediate vicinity. Need greenery or water? Take a walk along the Heemraadsingel or visit the Euromastpark or the Vroesenpark. For children there are several playgrounds in the Heemraadspark and you can reach Blijdorp Zoo in no time.
host_about:
Fun easy going person who loves to travel whenever possible. Like to eat out and try out new food. Experience the local culture and meeting new people.  Really into sports and adventures.

Most of the time I travel with my travel buddy who is my dear girlfriend :-)

description:
Two story, two bedroom apartment house with high quality design furniture throughout, perfect for a long term stay.

The location is by the beautiful Kralingse Plas, ideal for walks/runs in nature, and still close to the city center of Rotterdam.

name: Rental unit in Rotterdam · 1 bedroom · 1 bed · 1.5 shared baths
description:
Lovely young-professional apartment in Rotterdam. Walking distance to the city center, 5min from 3 different supermarkets, yet in a residential area. Perfect for a one-month workcation, or if you're still trying to find long-term accommodation.

There is a 40% monthly discount. I frequently travel for longer periods and rent out my place while I'm gone. I leave my things as-is, and you're free to use as you like - just pretend it's your own home ;)

The space
1st floor contains a spacious living room w/ TV and Nintendo Switch, a newly renovated fully-equipped kitchen, and a separate toilet. 2nd floor contains the 2 bedrooms with working set-up (extra monitors), a modern bathroom + toilet. I also recently renovated the balcony!

Guest access
You'll be walking distance to public transport, although there is paid parking right in front of the apartment, but biking is encouraged in the Netherlands :)

Other things to note<
host_about:
I am a corporate researcher working for a large consultancy. I enjoy going on workcations and rent out my own place at the same time.

I have travelled to over 60 countries and enjoy sharing stories and chasing experiences. My life motto is 'to live ten lives in one, gaining as many experiences as possible, to give back to the community that supported my personal growth'.

Our comfortable home is a perfect spot for a family to stay and explore Rotterdam and the neighbourhood.
The kitchen and living room are fully equipped and connected to the cozy and just renovated garden. There are 3 bedrooms and 2 bathrooms. Parking is free.
Supermarket, parks and cafes are all available and within walking distance, just 10 min walking. Public transport is just 5 min ahead.You can start a nice walk into a green area and visit a mill from the house.Children friendly play area

name: Home in Rotterdam · ★5.0 · 3 bedrooms · 3 beds · 3 baths
description:
Een ruime woning met tuin dichtbij het centrum. In een historisch schoolgebouw met hoge plafonds zit een heerlijke ruime woning.
De metro is 5 minuten lopen, Katendrecht 10 minuten lopen, de Maassilo 2 minuten lopen en 2x per week een bedrijvige markt om de hoek.
De stad is vlakbij, per fiets 15 minuten of met de metro 5 minuten.
Een ruime keuken, twee badkamers en 3 slaapkamers dus zeer geschikt voor een gezin of groep.
In de groene tuin is een eethoek en een bbq beschikbaar.

The space
Ruime woning in een monumentaal schoolpand.
Grote woonkamer met tv en wifi,
groene stadstuin met eethoek en loungehoek,
grote keuken met alle benodigde apparatuur,
3 slaapkamers en 2 badkamers.
Verder natuurlijk een wasmachine en droger.
Vlakbij metrostation Rijnhaven.
De stad is 5 minuten met de metro of 15 minuten met de fiets. Katendrecht is op loopafstand (5 minuten).

Guest access

name: Rental unit in Rotterdam · ★4.33 · 1 bedroom · 2 beds · 1 shared bath
description:
The room is located in the ❤️ of Rotterdam. A five minute walk from Rotterdam Central Station, city Centre and from bars & restaurants in Rotterdam. The very steep stair brings you to the apartment on the second floor. The apartment is shared with other (Airbnb) guests but everyone has his private room. We provide a package of sheets, towels and toilet paper for the duration of your stay. The apartment is situated on a busy street. Read the reviews! Fully booked? https://abnb.me/2lectKPhuAb

The space
The room is basic and proximally 12m2. We provide a bed and a wardrobe with space to store your clothes. There is a sofa which you can turn into a sleeping bed. You have to make up your own bed. You share the basic kitchen, toilet and basic shower with other guests. Since the complex and the accommodation are very noisy no parties are allowed and you should be aware that you can hear your neighbor walking on the wooden floor.

Guest access
Pu
neighborhood_overview: The “kade” as the street is called for people who know it, is a multicultural street with shops from people with different backgrounds. Next to your door there is a small cultural mall, from the outside it looks like a fashion store but inside you will be suprised.  Ask me for tips where to go eat and so on.
host_about: Hi we run the Airbnb and hope that you will enjoy your stay!

name: Condo in Rotterdam · 1 bedroom · 2 beds · 1.5 shared baths
description:
Onze karakteristieke woning is gelegen in één van de leukste en levendige buurten van Rotterdam: het nieuwe westen. Een heerlijk ruime woning, heeft beschikking over een grote tuin, centraal gelegen en dichtbij het stadscentrum. Het nieuwe westen is een diverse en groene buurt met veel gezellige horecagelegenheden.

The space
Het gaat om een ruime slaapkamer aan de voorkant van het huis. De kamer beschikt over een tweepersoonsbed (160x200). De slaapkamer bevindt zich op de eerste verdieping van het huis.

Guest access
Onze gasten komen binnen via onze voordeur waar wij ook gebruik van maken. Hiermee heb je direct toegang tot de woning (begane grond).

During your stay
Wij zijn gedeeltelijk thuis tijdens het verblijf van onze gasten. Wij respecteren uiteraard jullie privacy maar vinden het ook leuk om onze tips te delen (indien gewenst).

name: Rental unit in Rotterdam · ★5.0 · 1 bedroom · 1 bed · 1.5 shared baths
description:
Feel welcome in this tranquil home with a garden in an upcoming area of Rotterdam, near the landmark of historical Delfshaven (3 min by foot), with a green roof-park just across the street. Shops and public transport are a 5 minute walk, and a 10 minute bike-ride takes you right to the center of town, and for those who enjoy the river promenade, it is just an arm-stretch away from the doorstep!

The space
The big bedroom with a wooden floor has a double bed and an (optional) extra floor mattress for a 3th guest. The bedroom is on the garden side , there is a big working desk in the living-room to work from, the apartment has all facilities, fast internet, a washing machine, kitchen amenities, a coffee-machine, oven, and all you might need :)

There are two bedrooms (one for you, one for me), and I'm happy to help you with anything you might need, or any questions you have, to get around the city and the country, and to share some city gems! Depending

description:
Welcome to our spacious and open apartment with direct sunlight in each room.

Located on a quiet and green street in the beautiful neighborhood of Liskwartier, this is one of Rotterdam's original buildings with over 100 years of history. The heart of the place is the spacious living room including an open-plan kitchen and a dining area that can fit up to 12 people.

Perfect for working from home with two separate work stations and fast internet.

The space
This beautiful apartment combines Dutch tradition with a modern and cosy feel. It is located on the 2nd and 3rd floor of a 106 year old building.

The 2nd and 3rd level are connected via a staircase. On the 2nd level you will find a guest toilet, a hallway and the open-plan living room area. The area has a large HD TV (Netflix included), a Sonos sound system, reading corner, and over 15 different plants.

The spacious kitchen is fully equipped with large gas stove, au
neighborhood_overview:
This house is located in the popular Liskwartier, which is characterized by leafy avenues, canals and characteristic old buildings. It is a quiet place to live while the urban amenities are easy to reach. This quiet residential area borders the trendy Oude Noorden, with design shops and restaurants on the Zwaanshals and under the arches of the former Hofplein line. The Vroesenpark, the Kralingse Bos and the Plas are also located nearby.

Located within walking distance of shops, restaurants, public transport and within cycling distance of the center and Central Station. Quick access to highway A20 and A13.
Sufficient parking space in the immediate vicinity and in front of the door.
host_about:
I have lived 5 years in Cape Town, South Africa and have now settled in Europe again. Previously I have rented my apartments in Cape Town and Vienna and now my partner and I also want to welcome guest into our beautiful home in Rotterdam.

I love a good documentary, a great innovative idea or concept and exploring the vintage shops of the city.

Wij bieden ons appartement in het centrum van Rotterdam aan voor verhuur op Airbnb! Doordat we hier normaal zelf wonen, is het een volledig ingerichte ruimte, van alle gemakken voorzien.

De locatie is heel gunstig: het centraal station, stadscentrum, Markthal en Ahoy zijn allemaal goed bereikbaar met het openbaar vervoer (trams en bussen om de hoek). Aan het einde van de straat ligt het Heemraadssingelpark, waar veel leuke cafés zijn gevestigd.

The space
Het appartement ligt op de derde verdieping van een vier verdiepingen tellend appartementengebouw. Het heeft een ruime woonkamer met een volledig uitgeruste open keuken, een grote eettafel en een hoekbank. Daarnaast zijn er een badkamer, los toilet, slaapkamer, hal en balkon. De slaapkamer heeft een tweepersoonsbed en een bureau met monitor. 's Middags schijnt de zon op het balkon, waar je van kan genieten op een grote loungeset!

Guest access
Gasten hebben de toegang tot het appa
neighborhood_overview: Het appartement is gelegen in de wijk Het Nieuwe Westen en onderdeel van het stadsdeel Delfshaven. Deze wijk bevat een mooi park (Heemraadssingelpark), twee veelzijdige winkelstraten (Vierambachtsstraat en Nieuwe Binnenweg) en een aantal ruim opgezette pleinen (Heemraadsplein en Mathenesserplein). Er zijn veel supermarkten, restaurants en cafes in de wijk te vinden. Via de Nieuwe Binnenweg en de 1e Middellandstraat is het stadscentrum snel te bereiken.

name: Condo in Rotterdam · ★5.0 · 1 bedroom · 1 bed · 1.5 baths
description:
I love to offer you my cozy appartement in historic, multicultural area Delfshaven in Rotterdam. My house will be temporarily your house. So you don't have to share the house with me or other guests. I truly hope you will feel welcome.

Supermarkets, shops metro/bus/ tram station are at a 350-500 meter distance. Within 8 minutes by metro you are at the center of Rotterdam. It's super easy to go to different places in Rotterdam, but also to visit other places like Delft, The Hague, Amsterdam.

The space
Feel free to use whatever you need! What I can offer?

Living room: In the livingroom there is a big couch with tons of pillows. Make yourself comfortable and at home! There is no t.v. available, but maybe game night or a good conversation with a glass of wine? Do you play guitar? feel free to use it till 10 pm. Are you more a fanatic person who is into sports? I have an excersize mat and some ( light) weights available which you can find in m
neighborhood_overview:
Delfshaven is a melting pot of cultures with a rich history. A picturesque medieval harbour is surrounded by lively shopping streets, trend-setting architecture and creative breeding grounds. Experience the dynamics of the water, the ships and the bridges, discover charming neighbourhood parks, cosy terraces and meet 70,000 residents of 170 nationalities.

And talking about parks. Across my apartment is a small park. Perfect place to have a picnic or a BBQ during spring- and summerdays. Every Thursday and Saturday there is a local market where you can buy fresh vegetables, fruits, fish, nuts etc.

I also live next to a school. Maybe good to realize that around 8.30 am the kids will be brought to school and that they sounds very enthusiastic so see other kids again.
host_about:
Hi there!

Welcome at my page!:)
My name is Mirjam, I'm a Dutchie, in daily life I'm a social worker. In my spare time I love to visit new places, nature, singing, a sucker for good coffee,  going out for walks,  try to play guitar ( with the emphasis on 'try'), do my best to give some love to my plants, like to cook and ofcourse... traveling!

Since I was young I already liked traveling.  I remember my family and I were traveling by campervan. Such a joy we had. I continued traveling when I got older. I've been to countries within Europe, but also outside Europe, like: the US, Indonesia, South Africa, Brazil, Curacaõ, Laoh and Thailand.  I've stayed more than a year in Thailand where I've worked on voluntary base as a counselor. 

When I travel I would like to have that feeling of 'home'. That's why I  love to host and to give my guests that feeling of 'home' as well. 

That feeling of traveling and meeting new people, makes me come alive. 
So why not meeting new people, travelers, in my city Rotterdam?

I hope to get to know you a bit as well:)

neighborhood_overview:
Super close to central station 10 min walk away. The location called Oude Noord
'Het Oude Noorden' is the most rising neighbourhood of Rotterdam with many hip cafe & restaurants. You can find super nice cafes with Western & Eastern food and small little pubs & breweries. And it’s surrounded by beautiful green canals. It's a peaceful neighbourhood not too much night noise and not much traffic.
host_about:

We also travel the world via AirBnb and thanks to our good experiences we also decided to share our own place. 
You are more than welcome to our place.

The space
The house has 3 floors.

The living room has a step with a window so you can look through to the bedroom below.

On the 1st floor are 4 small, cozy bedrooms wit
neighborhood_overview:
LOCATION
You have a continuous holiday feeling in this comfortable house located on the Rotterdamse Schie. Overschie gives you the feeling of a village in terms of space and greenery, while you are still part of the metropolis of Rotterdam.
Discover the rich history of Overschie, visit Museum Oud Overschie and take a walk through the Overschiese village street and along the Schie on the Delfshavenseweg where our family home is located.

STORES
In Overschie you will not lack amenities, there are several shopping streets with local shops and various supermarkets, among others. Lidl, Plus and the Dirk. Rather go to the bustling heart of Rotterdam, take a bike and in fifteen minutes you can enjoy shopping here, have a drink on a terrace or immerse yourself in the Rotterdam nightlife.

MUSEUM
Museum Overschie is that hidden gem in the old village, the rich cultural-historical area of ​​Rotterdam. In this surprising and versatile museum you can experie
host_about:
Wij, Joey en Linda, wonen met veel plezier in ons prachtige huis aan de Schie. Het beste van beiden werelden zeggen we vaak tegen elkaar; op fietsafstand van onze geliefde stad Rotterdam en aan de andere kant de rust en ruimte van het dorp, wonen aan het water aan de rand van de natuur.

Zomers verblijven wij op onze Volkstuin op steenworp afstand van onze woning. Hier genieten we door te tuinieren, te klussen en te relaxen midden in het groen.

name: Condo in Rotterdam · ★5.0 · 2 bedrooms · 2 beds · 1.5 baths
description:
Welcome to our apartment near the center of Rotterdam.

The apartment is on the 3rd floor (no elevator) of a quiet building in a nice characteristic and multicultural neighborhood. The city center is within 7 min by tram or a nice 20 min stroll.

It’s a two bedroom apartment, suitable up to three adults. A kitchen with dishwasher, very comfortable beds and a (rain)shower.

On request and availability we provide parking for €17,50 a day.

Interested in shorter or longer stays, feel free to ask!

Other things to note
Please keep in mind that the apartment has no elevator. We are on the third floor, reached by 6 broad stairways that are rather easy to climb.

name: Loft in Rotterdam · 3 bedrooms · 3 beds · 1 bath
description:
In deze grote en unieke accommodatie voelt iedereen zich thuis. Midden in Rotterdam is alles snel bereikbaar. Katendrecht, Oude Haven, Markthal en Kop van Zuid op loopafstand.
Bij goed weer kan je lekker de stad in en genieten vanaf het dakterras. Bij minder weer is er een grote TV, een heerlijke sauna en een gezellige complete keuken.
Minimum aantal huurdagen is drie.

The space
De loft is 180 m2 groot en heeft een dakterras van 50m2. De entree zit op de derde verdieping van het Entrepotgebouw. Hier is de keuken en woonkamer. Beneden is de slaapkamer en de badkamer en een aparte slaapkamer met een vast bed en eventueel ruimte voor een extra luchtbed. Boven is een werkkamer en een slaapbank (2persoons) en het dakterras. Alles is compleet en netjes ingericht. Er zijn twee aparte toiletten.

Guest access

name: Condo in Rotterdam · ★4.93 · 1 bedroom · 1 bed · 1.5 baths
description:
10MIN WALK FROM CENTRAL.
We have 2 floor apartment and we are renting out our upstairs which is a complete studio.
Our flat is located 10 min walk away from Rotterdam central station in front of a peaceful canal.
The studio is 25 sqm & located upstairs and entrance is through the changing room. Upstairs toilet has it’s own kitchen at right handside & private toilet. There is king size double bed and TV (with chromecast) in the bedroom, and desk & chair and also wardrobe area.

The space
EVERYTHING YOU WOULD NEED ☺️
Upstairs studio floor is around 25-30 sqm. Everything you would need :)
In the entrance there is a private little kitchen and private toilet and a wardrobe area. Inside of the bedroom there is a super king size double bed for 180x200cm. There is TV on the wall with chromecast where you can stream whatever you wish and also desk & chair where you can study or work.
And there is also a private toilet next to the bedroom
neighborhood_overview:
Super close to central station 10 min walk away. The location called Oude Noord
'Het Oude Noorden' is the most rising neighbourhood of Rotterdam with many hip cafe & restaurants. You can find super nice cafes with Western & Eastern food and small little pubs & breweries. And it’s surrounded by beautiful green canals. It's a peaceful neighbourhood not too much night noise and not much traffic.
host_about:
We are a young couple living in Rotterdam both working in corporate. I am Turkish and my boyfriend is Dutch, we are hospitable & clean couple. We love sharing our place & meeting with new people. We also travel the world via AirBnb and thanks to our good experiences we also decided to share our own place. 
You are more than welcome to our place.

description:
Enjoy this cozy accommodation with garden, located just behind the dunes of Hoek van Holland. The caravan is suitable for people who like a simple holiday close to the forest, close to the dunes and the beach; less is luxury!

It is within walking distance of good surf spots, surf schools and nice beach bars such as Pele surf shack, beach bar de Pit and Elements. Parking is a 10-minute walk away. We can also rent a surfboard & wetsuit in consultation. A unique experience!

The space
This attractive caravan is located in a quiet part of the campsite, surrounded by trees, hedges and flowers. There is a double bedroom and a living room with kitchen, two work places and a sofa bed for a third guest. It has its own toilet and you can shower at the sanitary building a 3-minute walk away. Outside there is a veranda and a garden.

On request you can also rent a surfboard and wetsuit from us.

name: Boat in Rotterdam · ★5.0 · 2 bedrooms · 2 beds · 1.5 baths
description:
Contribute to Rotterdam’s biodiversity!

Enjoy your time on Netherland's only nature inspired sailboat, called "Appa".

The high biodiversity on board will immediately give a smile on your face! Harvest the vegetables on board to eat for dinner and relax on the grass roof.

100% of the airbnb income goes to the renovation & maintenance of the boat and the plants. Thanks a lot for your contribution to a green city!

Warm greetings,
Stan & team

The space
Appa has two 2person beds, one in the front and one in the back. To access both beds a little flexibility is needed.

In the middle Appa has a kitchen with everything on it to make all kinds of food.

The bathroom has a toilet and hot shower.
There is a dining-place for 2 persons and a dining-place for 4 persons

neighborhood_overview:
The neighborhood offers tranquil environment and has a moderate safety rating. However, it is advisable to remain vigilant against pickpocketing, especially in crowded outdoor areas and public transportation like the metro.

Historic Delfshaven . . . . . . . . . 1 minute🚶🏻‍♂️
Downtown of Delfshaven . . . 2 minute🚶🏻‍♂️
Downtown of Rotterdam . . . .7 min 🚇 or 30 min🚶🏻‍♂️

Nice pictures can be captured in the historic part of Delfshaven, which still has old remaining buildings that go back as far as the 13th century.

The main street (Schiedamseweg) has a lot to offer, supermarkets, night shops, low-range($) restaurants, "brown" cafes.

Rotterdam also offers Free Walking tours which I'd recommend if you’re interested to know more about Rotterdam, it’s history and it’s hidden gems. Offered in multiple languages and usually very quick availability.
host_about:
Hello there! I’m active as a host and guest. I love traveling because I am very interested and open in meeting new people and learning other cultures. I thought, why couldn’t I bring it all closely. So that’s when I decided to go Airbnb. Other spoken languages are Dutch and Spanish. Oh yeah, and I am gay.

My hobbies are playing guitar, listening to music, playing Xbox, watching Netflix, smoking Shisha, socializing and going out.

Welcome to our cozy home! It's a modernised 1930's apartment with a lot of character, art and quirky details. You will love cooking in our fully equipped wooden kitchen. While you cook its very tempting for others to join you at the 'bar' side of the kitchen island.

The space
On the first floor you find a large open plan kitchen with a bar and the living room with tv, record player, large diner table and a separate toilet. On the second floor there is another separate toilet, a bathroom with bath and shower, one spacious and light bedroom with a double bed (140 cm) with balcony facing morning sun, a small bed room with cod and another bedroom with a double bed (140 cm) and balcony.

The apartment has a total of 3 balconies with plenty of space to hang out (one with hammock), chill, have dinner, etc.
neighborhood_overview: We live in the heart of the cute neighbourhood Oud-Charlois, which is a stones-throw away from the large Zuiderpark, Zuidplein with a huge indoor swimming pool, a theatre and a mall and Ahoy for concerts. We are also close to the 'Maastunnel' which is accessible for both bikes, cars and pedestrians which connects our part of Rotterdam (South) to the centre of Rotterdam. The neighbourhood is friendly and residential. We love and appreciate (after living in noisy streets) how quiet it is here!

description:
Lovely young-professional apartment in Rotterdam. Walking distance to the city center, 5min from 3 different supermarkets, yet in a residential area. Perfect for a one-month workcation, or if you're still trying to find long-term accommodation.

There is a 40% monthly discount. I frequently travel for longer periods and rent out my place while I'm gone. I leave my things as-is, and you're free to use as you like - just pretend it's your own home ;)

I am a corporate researcher working for a large consultancy. I enjoy going on workcations and rent out my own place at the same time.

name: Condo in Rotterdam · ★4.88 · 3 bedrooms · 4 beds · 1.5 baths
description:
In de populaire wijk Blijdorp, op loopafstand van het centrum, diergaarde Blijdorp en het geliefde Vroesenpark, ligt deze smaakvol ingerichte woning die recent gerenoveerd is. Op de 1e etage van deze maisonettewoning bevindt zich de woonkamer, die grenst aan de open keuken met veel gewenste voorzieningen. Hier is ook de 1e slaapkamer incl. stapelbed voor 1 volwassenen of 2 kids. Boven zijn de badkamer en nogmaals twee slaapkamers, waarvan een grenst aan het mooie dakterras.

Registration number
05998133C3A2F61F8360
neighborhood_overview: Blijdorp is een van de mooiste buurten van Rottedam. Het centrum van Rotterdam is dichtbij, én ook veel andere voorzieningen zijn direct om de hoek: het prachtige zwembad "Van Manenbad", dierentuin "Diergaarde Blijdorp", tennispark Blijdorp, het Vroesenpark met het "Vroesenpaviljoen" waar lekker geluncht en ontbeten kan worden, ijssalon "Di Gelato" met de meest verrukelijke ijssmaken en nog een heleboel leuke cafés en restaurants met een divers aanbod. In de wijk kom je oud en jong tegen, van gezinnen tot studenten en starters tot gepensioneerden. In de lente en zomer komen de buurtbewoners aan de Statensingel of in het Vroesenpark bij elkaar om te BBQen of gezellig langs het water te zitten en te borrelen. Supermarkten, snackbars, ouderwetse en moderne kroegen, tweedehands winkels enzovoort...in Blijdorp heb je ze allemaal. Blijdorp is gewoon heel leuk en zeker een bezoek waard!

name: Rental unit in Rotterdam · ★4.0 · 1 bedroom · 2 beds · 1.5 baths
description:
Spacious apartment of 70 m2 situated southwest. The light 3 level apartment with modern kitchen, bathroom with jacuzzi and rainshower. The apartment is a spacious corner building with lots of windows. The roof-terrace is about 80m2 with 3 rain-showers, indoor sauna, outside jacuzzi and dinner and chill out area. The bedroom is about 20m2 with 180cm bed. The living-room has a sofa-bed of 140cm. Location is 5 min from Rotterdam airport and 4 km from trainstation Rotterdam Central. Parking is free

The space
The size of the total building is 300m2. The private apartment you would rent is situated on the 1st, 2nd and 3rd floor and you have 70m2 of privacy. The area is very green and you can have beautiful walks in the parks or at the river Schie. Shops and restaurants are at 5 minute walking distance. There is also an option to book the 100m2 dancestudio on the ground-floor for events. For more information, availability and pricing please contact the host.

name: Home in Poortugaal · ★4.75 · 3 bedrooms · 5 beds · 2 baths
description:
With a nice location and an elegant interior, this holiday home is very suitable for holidays with family or friends. It has a lovely garden with garden furniture where you can enjoy morning breakfast and coffee while kids play freely.

Take forest walks through the Valckesteynse Bos or visit the bustling center of Rotterdam, just 20 km from the house. At Bike Totaal Rhoon, 3.4 km away, you can rent bicycles to explore the area on 2 wheels. Daily necessities can be bought at the supermarket about 2 km away.

The holiday home is very charmingly furnished and equipped with a well-equipped kitchen. Prepare your favorite dishes and enjoy them together at the dining table in the living room. The bedrooms offer a peaceful sleep. A washing machine is available so you can travel light. There is a parking facility also available.

About Belvilla:

description:
6 person apartment in center of Rotterdam on a more than 100 years old cargo ship. This is unique!!! The location is very quiet at night, but still spot on. Next to the famous Erasmus bridge. Just 5 minutes walking to the center of town. This apartment is very nice for families and small groups who want something special. Big living room with fully equipped kitchen and dining table. Heat up the fire in the winter and enjoy this warm and cosy ship.

This boat has two sleepingrooms with each three beds. There is also a sofacouch in case you prefer to sleep alone. The big livingroom has a fully equipped kitchen and and a cosy fireplace. You can sit with max. 8 people at the diningtable. Ideal for families or big groups. Families with 2 kids or more can stay with a maximum of 8 people, but only on request.

name: Boat in Rotterdam · 8 bedrooms · 22 beds · 3 baths
description:
In hartje Rotterdam, in het scheepvaart kwartier, met uitzicht op Erasmusbrug, de Maas en de mooiste skyline van Nederland vind je dit unieke, gezellige zeilschip.
In de zomer is zij 'onder zeil' op zee, maar in de winter biedt zij plaats aan gezellige groepen in haar thuishaven.
De watertaxi heeft een opstapplaats direct naast de deur en winkels, de beste restaurants en het uitgaansleven zijn op loopafstand.
Wij hebben 22 slaapplaatsen aan boord dus voor groepen is deze accommodatie ideaal.

The space
Omdat de Luciana in een haven ligt die een open verbinding met de Maas (een getijdenrivier) heeft beweegt ze een beetje.
Doordat ze uitzicht op diezelfde Maas biedt zal het uitzicht voortdurend een beetje veranderen.

Guest access
Je mag buiten op dek en gangboorden lopen en zitten waar je wil; ieder plekje biedt een ander uitzicht.
Een klein deel van het schip is niet toegankelijk: hier verblijven van tijd tot tijd
neighborhood_overview:
Luciana ligt in de Veerhaven in het Scheepsvaartkwartier. Dit romantische stukje stad is een beschermd stadsgezicht met statige herenhuizen aan klassieke lanen die het rijke scheepvaartverleden van Rotterdam doen voortleven. Eén van de mooiste plekjes is de Veerhaven, waar historische zeilschepen zachtjes op het water deinen. Het is niet alleen een hele pittoreske buurt met veel. historie, ook wanneer je van een glas wijn en lekker eten houdt ben je hier op de juiste plek.
De buurt is gelegen in hartje Rotterdam vlakbij veel prachtige musea. Kunst en Cultuurliefhebbers kunnen in Rotterdam hun hart ophalen. Maar ook voor andere activiteiten zit u hier top. De Euromast ligt werkelijk om de hoek. En wil je liever winkelen, naar de beroemde Markthal bezoeken, of uitgaan? Ook dit is allemaal op loopafstand!
host_about:
Ik ben Hieke en woon samen met mijn man Xander in het Friese Oudehaske (nabij Heerenveen). Samen hebben we 6 kinderen die ondertussen bijna allemaal de deur al uit zijn. We hebben er nog twee thuis wonen. 

Sinds kort zijn wij de heel erg trotse eigenaar van het prachtige historische zeilschip 'Luciana' waarmee we heerlijke avonturen hopen te gaan beleven.

Haar thuishaven is Rotterdam en daar zal zij in de wintermaanden liggen. Wijzelf zullen daar ook geregeld te vinden zijn maar uw gastheer zal meestal Pieter zijn.

Pieter Boot woont met zijn gezin nabij de te verhuren zeilschepen 'Luciana', 'Catherina' en 'Marie Galante' in de Veerhaven op zijn woon/vergaderschip de 'Schoneveld'. 
Bij een verblijf op een schip gaat veiligheid voor alles en dus is Pieter dag en nacht mobiel bereikbaar. 
En zijn levensmotto is dat wat hij in werktijd mag doen zijn hobby is! 

Voor mij geldt dat ik dol ben op water, de natuur, dieren, rust en de ruimte. Ook hou ik van (buiten) sporten; ik ben in mijn element op het water maar ook in de sneeuw of op het ijs, op de mountainbike of hikend in de natuur met mijn hond. 
En uiteraard hou ik ook van gezelligheid!! Ik hoop u dan ook te ontmoeten in Rotterdam!

name: Home in Rotterdam · ★4.73 · 3 bedrooms · 5 beds · 1.5 baths
description:
Een ruim en licht huis uit de jaren 50. Onlangs helemaal gerenoveerd. Het is smaakvol ingericht, voorzien van alle gemakken. Met fraai uitzicht op een grote voor- en achtertuin. De woning ligt in een doodlopend rustig straatje, pal aan het Lage Bergse bos. En vlakbij de charmante dorpskern van Hillegersberg met mooie winkels en restaurants. Binnen 20 minuten ben je met de fiets in het centrum van Rotterdam.

The space
De woonkamer is licht en heeft een mooie gietijzeren houtkachel. De keuken is modern en van alle gemakken voorzien zoals een vaatwasser, inductie kookplaat, oven en grote koelkast. Verder is er een hal, toilet en een kleine berging.

Boven zijn er drie slaapkamers en een badkamer. Een slaapkamer heeft een tweepersoonsbed, de andere slaapkamer twee eenpersoonsbedden. De derde slaapkamer is wat kleiner en heeft een stoere houten hoogslaper met een balkonnetje. De badkamer is voorzien van een wc en bad. Verder is er een ingebouwde wasmachine
neighborhood_overview:
Het is fraai gelegen vlakbij de charmante dorpskern van Hillegersberg. Hillegersberg is één van de mooiste en groenste buitenwijken van Rotterdam, direct gelegen bij de Rotte, Bergse plassen en het Bergse bos. Ook zijn er mooie winkels en restaurants.
De tram is op loopafstand te bereiken. En binnen 20 minuten ben je met de fiets in het centrum van Rotterdam.
Parkeren kan voor de deur en is gratis.

name: Home in Rotterdam · ★5.0 · 3 bedrooms · 3 beds · 1.5 baths
description:
Welcome to our beautiful and spacious house, located in the heart of Rotterdam on a charming and cobbled street that is surrounded by historic houses dating back to the 1700s and 1800s. Recently renovated with love and attention to detail, our home offers the perfect combination of modern amenities and historic charm. Major attractions are easily reachable by foot, by tram (next door), or by bike.

The space
From the hallway, you'll enter the slightly higher living room with a beautiful oak herringbone parquet floor and cozy yet modern Scandinavian design elements that create a warm and homely atmosphere. The living room leads out onto a private garden through sliding doors, perfect for enjoying the fresh air and sunshine.

The open kitchen is the cozy center of the house, featuring top-of-the-line appliances such as a steam oven, a combi oven, an induction hob with integrated extraction, a Quooker, warm black design elements and Villeroy & Boch porcelai
neighborhood_overview: The Oude Noorden is full of surprises and with its urban hotspots hip, hipper, hippest! Streets such as Zwaanshals and Zaagmolenkade have a great range of fashion, food and design and thanks to the many catering establishments you can discover something new every evening. From special bistros, restaurants and coffee shops to your own beer brewery: there is something for everyone. Oude Noorden has several squares where events are regularly organized, such as the Rotterdam Harvest Market on Noordplein and sports and games facilities on Johan Idaplein. The Hofbogen, full of creative entrepreneurs, is also nearby. With a roof of 1.9 km long, the Luchtpark de Hofbogen is a unique experience for lounging in the open air. You don't have to look for green for long with the proximity of the Kralingse Bos and the banks of the Rotte. The house is close to supermarkets, schools and nurseries. Moreover, the city center is nearby (10 minutes by bike) and public transport (Rotterdam Noord station, tr
host_about:
Good day!✌️

I am a passionate traveler and Airbnb guest/superhost, having been in the industry for years. I understand the importance of a great experience for both myself and my hosts and strive to make my stays as comfortable, clean, and accurate as possible. Originally from the Netherlands, I have lived in several countries including Australia, the United Kingdom, South Africa, the United States, and Argentina, and now call Copenhagen, Denmark my home. 

When it comes to travel, I love to experience different cultures and local lifestyles, and I truly appreciate the conversations and interactions I get to have with hosts and other guests. I am not very needy, but I do expect the accommodation to be as described. In my free time, I enjoy photography, scuba diving, aviation and cultural visits. I'm also an efficient traveler, so I won't be spending all my time in the accommodation.

neighborhood_overview:
The house is located in the New West, which was designed in the early 20th century by Gerrit de Jongh. All city centre main tourist points, restaurants and bars are accessible within 5-10 minutes cycling. I can share with you my second bike or help you to rent your own.
A neighborhood is a mix of stately and wide streets with canals interspersed with less busy streets. The central position that the New West occupies is also a huge plus. You are right behind the parks and if you walk through them or use the small ferry, you will already be at the door of Diergaarde Blijdorp. The green character of the New West is also reflected in 'de Spoortuin'. Here local residents maintain a piece of wilderness with beautiful flowers and plants.
Around the corner from the apartment you will find various shops, restaurants, entertainment and cultural entertainment. The center is nearby and there is more than enough to experience in a metropolis.

Blijdorp is one of the best locations in Rotterdam.

The city centre is 15-17 min walk.

The train station Rotterdam Centraal is 10-12 min walk. From Rotterdam Centraal station, it’s a 26 min train to Schiphol and a 41 min train to Amsterdam Centraal Station.

Located in the Old North of Rotterdam, our house, which we care for and love, is spacious and yet cozy. The neighbourhood has restaurants, bars and cafes of its own and a lovely atmosphere. It is simple and easy to get to the city centre, while still sleeping in a quiet, peaceful surroundings.

The space
The house is a classic dutch house from the outside, and modernly renovated from the inside. It is a two stories house - a ground floor and a souterrain.

On the ground floor you will find the spacious living room, dining room, open kitchen, toilets and the terrace.

Going down the stairs (please note that these are dutch, steep stairs), you will go down to the souterrain, where you will find the master bedroom, the bathroom, second toilets, and a second bedroom - which you can use to sleep, work or watch TV in.

neighborhood_overview:
The house is located in the New West, which was designed in the early 20th century by Gerrit de Jongh. All city centre main tourist points, restaurants and bars are accessible within 5-10 minutes cycling. I can share with you my second bike or help you to rent your own.
A neighborhood is a mix of stately and wide streets with canals interspersed with less busy streets. The central position that the New West occupies is also a huge plus. You are right behind the parks and if you walk through them or use the small ferry, you will already be at the door of Diergaarde Blijdorp. The green character of the New West is also reflected in 'de Spoortuin'. Here local residents maintain a piece of wilderness with beautiful flowers and plants.
Around the corner from the apartment you will find various shops, restaurants, entertainment and cultural entertainment. The center is nearby and there is more than enough to experience in a metropolis.

name: Rental unit in Rotterdam · ★4.92 · 2 bedrooms · 2 beds · 1 bath
description:
Geniet van Rotterdam in deze ruime, rustgevende accommodatie.

In deze oude kunstenaarswijk vind je mijn maisonnette woning. Rotterdam is een prachtige stad en vanuit Oud-Charlois kun je met de fiets gemakkelijk de omgeving verkennen of fietsen naar de stad op zo’n 15 minuutjes afstand. In de buurt (op loopafstand) vind je mooie ateliers, een werkende molen, kinderboerderij en biologische lunch-tentjes. Ahoy zit op 8 minuten fietsen afstand.

The space
Op de 1e verdieping geniet je van een ruime woonkamer, eetkamer, open keuken en balkon. De woning is eigentijds en eclectisch ingericht en van alle gemakken voorzien. De tweede verdieping is voorzien van de slaapgelegenheden en badkamer. De master bedroom heeft een groot bed en de andere slaapkamer een twijfelaar (1,40m bed) en toegang tot het balkon en uitzicht op het parkje.

Guest access
Toegang tot alle ruimtes behalve de grote kledingkast in de grote slaapkamer. Gelieve geen geb
neighborhood_overview:
Het vroegere dorp Charlois vormt de sfeervolle historische kern van de wijk Oud-Charlois. De wijk wordt begrensd door de Nieuwe Maas in het noorden, de Dorpsweg in het oosten, de Kromme Zandweg in het zuiden en de Waalhaven in het westen.
De kracht van Oud-Charlois zit in de karaktervolle en groene omgeving én in de bevlogen bewoners. Tegenwoordig is de wijk thuishaven voor meer dan 150 kunstenaars en creatieve ondernemers.
Op loopafstand vind je een werkende molen, kinderboerderij, biologische lunch tentjes en ateliers van lokale kunstenaars.
Het appartement bevind zich op 15 minuten fietsen of 20-25 min met het openbaar vervoer van het stadscentrum.
host_about:
Hi,
Ik ben Celine, 31. Woon en werk in Rotterdam, Nederland. 
Ik werk in de kunst / cultuur sector en ben bezig met mijn Master Sociologie.

Deze heerlijke woning bied je de mogelijkheid om te wonen aan de rand van het bos en beschikt over maar liefst 2 balkons, waardoor je de gehele dag kan genieten van de zon. De monumentale status en de sfeervolle jaren '30 details gecombineerd met de gemoderniseerde elementen zorgen voor optimaal woongenot.

Een sfeervol, karakteristiek en lichte loft op een rustige plek en dichtbij het centrum. Op ieder plekje in dit huis voel je je thuis. Of dat nu aan de bar in de keuken is, aan de grote eettafel of op het dakterras in het zonnetje.

Crooswijk is een authentieke, echte Rotterdamse buurt, aan de rand van het centrum. Binnen 5 minuten lopen ben je in het leuke Rotterdam Noord en binnen 10 minuten in het centrum. Er is een supermarkt op loopafstand.

host_about:
Hi,

I am Joost, I live in Rotterdam and I love to travel and explore the world for work as for pleasure. That's why I can sometimes rent out my cosy apartment in the centre of Rotterdam. Throughout my travelling career I have always used Rotterdam as my base. This is the city where I grew up, studied and most of my family & friends live whom I meet up with for dinner & drinks in the weekend. I hope you will enjoy Rotterdam as much I do. The city has a great vibe with lots of contemporary architectonical buildings and cool bars. In the street of my apartment are many bars and restaurants to be found. I hope you will enjoy yourself. 

Cheers,
Joost

The apartment located west from the city of Rotterdam, although still in the city, this peaceful location is quiet and ideal for tranquil stay with all amenities nearby.

The space

description:
In dit centraal gelegen en stijlvolle stadsappartement ligt alles voor je gezin binnen handbereik. Rotterdam Centrum is op fietsafstand, maar bus 33 stopt dichtbij die je in 6 minuten naar Rotterdam Airport of binnen 15 minuten naar Rotterdam Centraal Station brengt. Rotterdam Zoo (Diergaarde Blijdorp) is 10 minuten lopen. Voor de deur kan je gratis(!) parkeren. We zitten vlak aan de A13, dus je bent per auto ook zo in Delft (20 minuten) Den Haag (35 minuten) of Amsterdam (1 uur).

The space
Het appartement is voorzien van het hoogste energielabel A, compleet met hoogwaardige details en voorzieningen waaronder een ligbad, regendouche, overal vloerverwarming, volledig uitgeruste met eiken beklede keuken met natuurstenen werkblad en heetwaterkraan, en uw eigen zonnige tuin met enorm houten terras (inclusief elektrisch bediend zonnescherm).

Een perfect toevluchtsoord voor een stel en/of een gezin, vlakbij alle stadse voorzieningen!

neighborhood_overview: Overschie is een centraal gelegen, maar rustige wijk. Vlakbij gelegen vind je een ruim park met een speeltuin voor kinderen. Overschie heeft een eigen dorpskern met voorzieningen, maar Rotterdam Centrum is 10-15 minuten fietsen of per bus.

We are two women living in the city center of Rotterdam and we have a great guest room in our house, where you are more than welcome to stay. The main sights are at walking distance and everything else is easily reachable by bike or public transport.
You will share the kitchen, living room, toilet and bathroom with us, but we promise to be nice flatmates ;-)

During your stay
We are very flexible in the way we interact. I you want more privacy, we will definitely give you space. Otherwise, we are more than happy to tell you about our lovely city and recommend nice places. Sometimes we are busy with our lives and not at home a lot, and sometimes we are home more often.

Rotterdam centrum ligt op 10 km afstand en in 20 min. fietst u door Midden -Delfland naar Delft. Rotterdam-The Haque airport is 5 minuten rijden. Kortom een ideale uitvalbasis om de omgeving te verkennen.

The space
De slaapzolder heeft een verlaagd plafond en is bereikbaar middels een smalle trap, desgewenst maken wij de luxe slaapbank beneden voor u gereed.
Ons verblijf is rookvrij.

host_about: As a resident of the Van Vollenhovenkwartier, you can enjoy the grandeur of the monumental Het Scheepvaartkwartier district every day. A neighborhood known for its nearly 100 national monuments and as one of the richest neighborhoods in the Netherlands. In a few steps from your home you will find top restaurants and museums, you can have a drink in the beautiful historic Veerhaven or relax with friends in the Park. The other Rotterdam pearls are also at your feet. Whether it concerns the Markthal, Museum Quarter, Rotterdam Central or the Wilhelminapier. All hotspots are close by and also easy to reach by public transport and water taxi. Furthermore, the district is car-free and there is no through traffic.

U deelt de sanitaire voorzieningen met eventuele andere gasten.

Ook is er een algemene ruimte waar u lekker een boekje kan lezen een kaartje leggen.

name: Bed and breakfast in Rotterdam · ★4.67 · 1 bedroom · 1 bed · 2.5 shared baths
description:
The Diesel is a bed and breakfast in Rotterdam near Zuidplein Mall and Ahoy stadium in a tranquil neighborhood. It is a gezellig and comfortable space, perfect for families or groups of friends looking to explore the city. Throughout the bed and breakfast, you'll find plenty of thoughtful touches, light, and free Wi-Fi. Located near Zuidplein Mall, you'll be just a short train ride away from some of Rotterdam's best attractions, restaurants, and shops in the center and Erasmus University.

The space
As you enter the bed and breakfast, you'll be greeted by a spacious living room with comfortable sofas and chairs, perfect for relaxing after a long day of sightseeing.There are three rooms available fro your stay ( one is always occupied), one on the first floor and two on the second floor which share two full and one half bathroom. A full kitchen, laundry facilities and a spacious backyard are common areas for our guests.

Registration number
05
neighborhood_overview: Vreewijk is known as the garden village, a green oasis of tranquility in a dynamic city. The house is centrally located near roads to the A15, A29 and A16 and public transport such as buses and tram lines. Within walking distance, around the Hart van Zuid, you will find all the amenities you could wish for; Zuidplein shopping center, metro and bus station, Ahoy, swimming pool, art building with theater and Zuiderpark. The center of Rotterdam can be reached within 10 minutes. The Erasmus University is reachable with a bus that goes from a stop near the property all they way to the University.

Door-to-door you can reach Ahoy within 25 minutes by metro with a direct connection.

Ruime studio van bijna 40m2 met tweepersoons bed, eigen badkamer, toilet en kitchenette met basis kookfaciliteiten.

host_about:
Hi, we are Carmen and Marcus! 
Oh how we love our city Rotterdam. It is the only city in the Netherlands with a metropool feel. However, this city also has beautiful old areas.
We love art and design. Our house is filled with colourful art and design furniture. Not one wall is painted white! 
And we love food... Good food! I made a sport out of it to find the very best restaurants everywhere we go. Check out my Restaurant Guide for Rotterdam!

Wanting to go for a walk and en
host_about:
Hi!
Welcome to my page. My name is Jolie. I'm a clinical psychologist who moved to Rotterdam 7 years ago. I'm the first owner of my loft and have designed the interior myself with great care. I enjoy living here very much. After some nice experiences with Airbnb as a guest, I decided it would be selfish to keep my spare bedroom all to myself, especially since it has such a great view of the Rotterdam skyline. I live with my dachshund Laika, but she doesn't talk back very much. That's another reason why I've decided to make my guest bedroom available on Airbnb. In the evening I am mostly home and always open to a nice conversation, or to just hang out. But please don't feel obliged, as I know very well how nice it can be to retreat in a nice private room when travelling.  
I look forward to meeting you!
Jolie
