description:
The Diesel is a bed and breakfast in Rotterdam near Zuidplein Mall and Ahoy stadium in a tranquil neighborhood. It is a gezellig and comfortable space, perfect for families or groups of friends looking to explore the city. Throughout the bed and breakfast, you'll find plenty of thoughtful touches, light, and free Wi-Fi. Located near Zuidplein Mall, you'll be just a short train ride away from some of Rotterdam's best attractions, restaurants, and shops in the center and Erasmus University.

The space

A full kitchen, laundry facilities and a spacious backyard are common areas for our guests.

name: Home in Rotterdam · 1 bedroom · 1 bed · 1.5 baths
description:
Welcome to our beautiful and spacious house, located in the heart of Rotterdam on a charming and cobbled street that is surrounded by historic houses dating back to the 1700s and 1800s. Recently renovated with love and attention to detail, our home offers the perfect combination of modern amenities and historic charm. Major attractions are easily reachable by foot, by tram (next door), or by bike.

The space
rom the hallway, you'll enter the slightly higher living room with a beautiful oak herringbone parquet floor and cozy yet modern Scandinavian design elements that create a warm and homely atmosphere. The living room leads out onto a private garden through sliding doors, perfect for enjoying the fresh air and sunshine.

The open kitchen is the cozy center of the house, featuring top-of-the-line appliances such as a steam oven, a combi oven, an induction hob with integrated extraction, a Quooker, warm black design elements and Villeroy & Boch porcelain
host_about:
Good day!✌️

I am a passionate traveler and Airbnb guest/superhost, having been in the industry for years. I understand the importance of a great experience for both myself and my hosts and strive to make my stays as comfortable, clean, and accurate as possible. Originally from the Netherlands, I have lived in several countries including Australia, the United Kingdom, South Africa, the United States, and Argentina, and now call Copenhagen, Denmark my home. 

When it comes to travel, I love to experience different cultures and local lifestyles, and I truly appreciate the conversations and interactions I get to have with hosts and other guests. I am not very needy, but I do expect the accommodation to be as described. In my free time, I enjoy photography, scuba diving, aviation and cultural visits. I'm also an efficient traveler, so I won't be spending all my time in the accommodation.

name: Rental unit in Rotterdam · 1 bedroom · 2 beds · 1 bath
description:
In this centrally located accommodation everything is within reach for you and your family or friends. Our home is cozy, practical and no nonsense.

The space
Our apartment is situated on the second floor and accessible through a large staircase. Upon entering the apartment you find yourself in the hallway with access to two bedrooms, the toilet, bathroom and living room.

The living room is very spacious, with large windows through which you get a glimpse of the skyline of Rotterdam. As the apartment is situated on a corner facing east and south, it is very bright and sunny. The living room leads to a small but pretty terrace with a sandpit for children, an easy chair, some fresh herbs and a little table with two chairs for those who like to have a drink and eat outside.

From the living room you have access to the kitchen that is super well equipped: oven, gas stove, two sinks, kitchen table for 4 people, large fridge, 2 freezers, and cupbo
neighborhood_overview: We adore the neighborhood we live in. It has a cosy and communal vibe, but at the same time breathes the cosmopolitanism and vibrancy of Rotterdam. On Saturdays there is a lovely organic farmer's market at Noordplein (5 minutes walk). The river 'de Rotte' is a 2 minute walk and leads you to some beautiful green spots in the city. At Zwart Janstraat (2 min walk) you find everything you need in terms of groceries, little supermarket, fresh bread, nuts, lovely Moroccan breakfasts and more. At Zwaanshals (1 min walk) you find some of the most interesting and creative stores in Rotterdam, as well as various lovely second hand clothes shops. The house is close to various cafés like Tom's coffee, Hopper, Bonza and all-day breakfast at Wolly. Restaurants are also well-represented in the neighborhood ranging from the hip and delicious middle-Eastern Mecca to Spanish tapas at Destino, Italian delicacies at Mangiare, top (and relatively cheap) pizzas from Salerno.
host_about: Belgian/Dutch couple with Zambian/Portuguese roots. Temwa is a sociologist and house father for our two small children. Temwa is a surf/skate enthousiast and loves 60s and 70s rock 'n roll. As a host he is friendly, welcoming and delicate. His partner Melissa is an anthropologist and works as assistant professor at University.

name: Home in Rotterdam · ★5.0 · 3 bedrooms · 4 beds · 1.5 baths
description:
Welcome to our stunning Airbnb apartment in the vibrant city centre of Rotterdam! From our prime location, you'll find yourself just a stone's throw away from one of the liveliest streets in Rotterdam named Witte de Withstraat. Our spacious 150-square-meter mansion, including free private parking and a rooftop balcony, is the perfect base for you to explore everything that this dynamic city has to offer. 

The space
As a family that loves to travel, we're thrilled to share our home with fellow adventurers when we're away. Step inside and experience a modern oasis with lots of light coming through the windows. With its lively interiors and contemporary facilities, our apartment offers an unforgettable stay for up to six adults across four bedrooms. 

To start your day, you can enjoy our rooftop balcony with a morning coffee and in the evening, you can unwind with a glass of wine. The terrace is the ideal spot for soaking up the vibrant energy of the city

name: Home in Hoogvliet Rotterdam · ★5.0 · 3 bedrooms · 3 beds · 1 bath
description:
A peaceful and relaxed time is assured in this lovely home, while also being in the vicinity of the bustling city of Rotterdam. Perfect for couples and/or families!

The space
On the ground floor you will find the arrival hall, a spacious living room, a fully equipped kitchen, a toilet, and a wonderfully large south-west facing garden with sitting areas and sun beds where you can enjoy the sun at any time of the day!

On the first floor, there's the bathroom (including rain shower and bathtub), a 2-person bedroom with comfy box-spring bed and a children's room.

The second floor contains a laundry area and another large 2-person bedroom.

The house has a lovely, serene energy: I often hear that people feel fully recharged after staying here!
host_about: Hi! Ik ben Jennifer en woon met mijn zoontje Mayson in mijn fijne stekje vlakbij Rotterdam. Mijn twintiger jaren bracht ik voornamelijk in het buitenland door: ik heb in Bangladesh en Uganda gewoond en gewerkt, en daardoor veel gereisd in Azië en Afrika. De reislustigheid is er nog steeds, maar ik kan ook inmiddels ook ontzettend genieten van mijn thuisbasis en het ontdekken van mooie plekjes binnen Nederland!

description:
Adjacent to a balcony with birdsong, this sunny, spacious room provides calming comfort in the vicinity of all the liveliness Rotterdam has to offer. It is situated on the fourth floor of an apartment complex at the beginning of the town's longest shopping street, only a ten-minute walk from the central station.
There is no elevator, just a stairway. In the apartment lives a cat.

At the desk, there are two chairs.
Behind a curtain, there is space for luggage.

When I'm at home, I'm always open to a chat. I don't use mobile internet.

description:
In 2023 nieuw gebouwde en compleet ingerichte studio met luxe slaapbank, complete keuken met vaatwasser en badkamer (douche). De perfecte uitvalbasis aan de Eendrachtsstraat in het witte de withkwartier met alles erop en eraan incl. Nespresso/thee. Basisproducten keuken aanwezig. Parkeerplaats mogelijk tegen €15 per dag. Flexibele incheck vanaf 15.00 uur en late uitcheck tot 13.00 uur standaard.

The space
Studio voorzien van alle benodigdheden om Rotterdam te ontdekken. Ideale rustige ligging in het centrum, maar op loopafstand van hippe Witte de Withstraat, musea en Erasmusbrug.

Other things to note
Downtown in Witte de Withkwartier. Op loopafstand van metrostation Leuvehaven, en Eendrachtsplein, Musea, Het Park en Erasmusbrug. Witte de Withstraat is eind van de straat, maar geen overlast van de herrie!

name: Condo in Rotterdam · ★New · 1 bedroom · 1 bed · 1.5 baths
description:
Welcome to this beautiful apartment on the enchanting Noordereiland in Rotterdam! Enjoy an unforgettable stay with a breathtaking view of the famous Erasmus Bridge and the historic monument De Hef. Whether you're a tourist exploring the city or a professional traveling to Rotterdam for business, our apartment offers the perfect base for a comfortable and luxurious stay.

The space
The apartment is a stylish and modern retreat, designed with your (and our) comfort in mind. With a space of 110 square meters, it provides ample room for up to 2 guests (with the possibility of adding a cot or a baby camping bed). The interior is carefully curated, combining contemporary elegance with coziness, so you will feel right at home.

The living room is an oasis of tranquility and luxury, with large French doors opening to the balcony, offering panoramic views of the city and the iconic Erasmus Bridge and De Hef. Relax on the comfortable sofa, enjoy entertainment on t
neighborhood_overview:
Noordereiland is one of the most sought-after neighborhoods in Rotterdam, with a unique location in the Nieuwe Maas. You'll be within walking distance of the vibrant city center, while still being able to enjoy a calm and serene environment. Take a leisurely stroll along the river banks, admire the beautiful historic architecture, and indulge in the local cafes, restaurants, and shops that the neighborhood has to offer.

Discover the rich history of Rotterdam by visiting the iconic Erasmus Bridge, an architectural masterpiece that dominates the city skyline. Walk across the bridge and admire the breathtaking view of the city and the river. For those interested in Rotterdam's industrial heritage, you'll be perfectly situated with a view from the balcony of De Hef, an old railway bridge that now serves as a monument.

neighborhood_overview:
In het noordoostelijkste puntje van Rotterdam, aan de Zevenhuizerplas, ligt de ruim opgezette nieuwbouwwijk Nesselande. De palmbomen en het brede strand aan de Siciliëboulevard geven je het gevoel dat je in een mondaine badplaats in Zuid-Europa bent. Niets is minder waar, je bent in de gemeente Rotterdam.

Het is strand in Nesselande is een goed alternatief voor de drukbezochte badplaatsen in de zomer. Het verschil met een zeestrand is dat er geen duinen zijn, maar moderne hoogbouw. Aan de Siciliëboulevard en het Maltaplein vind je niet alleen eetgelegenheden en ijssalons, maar ook supermarkten en drogisterijen. Handig voor als je de zonnebrandcrème vergeten bent.

In de Zevenhuizerplas is een duidelijke scheiding tussen het gebied voor zwemmers en watersporters. Daardoor kan er goed en veilig worden gewindsurft, gezeild, gedoken en geroeid. Buiten de zomer is er ook genoeg te doen. Iedere zondag zijn de winkels geopend. Ook is Nesselande een mooi startpunt voor een

The space

Indulge in contemporary luxuries, including a private sauna in the bathroom. The two spacious bedrooms also provide scenic vistas of Rotterdam's Willemsbrug. Enjoy a serene and rejuvenating atmosphere complete with complimentary WiFi and a smart TV.

Opzoomerstraat is a very beautiful old street of rotterdam. Its a street build in 1900 and extremely well maintained. There are loads of nice breakfast and lunch bars around even as amazing restaurants to have your dinner. Its about 6 minutes bike to central station but there is trams and metros all around in walking distance.

neighborhood_overview:
Right in front of the apartment there is a little terrace we build so you could have your morning coffee outside, if you choose not to sit on the big balcony.


The sealing is high, almost 3 meters which gives a nice atmosphere in the apartment.

Heemraadssingel is just around the corner, which is one of the most beautiful streets of rotterdam, it has a nice park in between where you could walk or chill and have a drink or picknick.

All the streets around ar filled with nice uplifted places for coffee, breakfast, lunch or dinner, this is really one of the most upcoming areas in Rotterdam.


In this place you will feel home straight away it has been completely renovated a few years ago and will give you the feeling of a loft in the city, with still lots of green and trees around.

The apartment is equipped with all comforts. It has a double bed, led TV with Netflix, high quality kitchen, closet, washing machine with drye

name: Rental unit in Rotterdam · ★New · 1 bedroom · 1 bed · 1 bath
description:
Stylish 3-room apartment with a view of the windmill. Open the front door and immerse yourself directly in a unique part of Rotterdam, before easily making your way to the modern city center by metro or shared scooter. Within walking distance, you'll find cozy coffee shops, a brewery, various restaurants, and a pool café.

This allows you to explore both sides of Rotterdam: from the impressive modern architecture in the city center to the charming old warehouses in Delfshaven.

The space
During your stay, you'll have access to a spacious bedroom, a fully equipped kitchen, and a cozy dining and living room. If you need to get some work done during your stay, you can retreat to the extra room where a workspace awaits you.

The bathroom is equipped with a shower, including a waterfall faucet. And if you happen to stain your vacation outfit, no worries, the washing machine, drying rack, and iron are at your disposal.

Registration numb
neighborhood_overview:
From this unique Airbnb location, you can step directly into the enchanting old harbor, where you can enjoy a picturesque walk along historic (residential) boats, a working windmill, and an authentic sluice gate. When hunger strikes, you have the option to savor pancakes at the windmill or indulge in the various cozy cafes in the area. From a traditional Rotterdam café like 'De Ooievaar' to an authentic Lebanese restaurant called 'Le Souq.' You can also pay a visit to a real brewery, 'De Pelgrim,' or play a game of pool at the 'Poolcafé.' In this picturesque street, there's something for everyone!

Furthermore, the proximity to public transportation and the availability of shared scooters and bikes provide you with the opportunity to easily travel to the bustling city center. This way, you can explore both sides of Rotterdam: from the impressive modern architecture in the center to the charming old warehouses in Delfshaven.

Ot
neighborhood_overview:
Rotterdam West-center offers various to do:
-with the old neighbourhood Delsfhaven (the only part of Rotterdam still authentic before the bombing of WWII), where you can enjoy coffee and restaurants, yoga, or rent easily a boat for a tour of the river (I recommend a nice sunny apero-boat on the river^^)
-the more alternative and underground area close to Marconiplein for artistic experience, bars, (keilekafe, Brutus, Weelde).
-Nieuwe Binnenweg with many shops, coffees, restaurants and local bars for a hipster experience

name: Cabin in Hoek van Holland · ★New · 3 bedrooms · 3 beds · 1 bath
description:
Ontdek het ultieme uitje in ons 'houten familiehuisje' in Hoek van Holland! Op een steenworp van het strand (net achter de duinen) ligt dit gezinsvriendelijke en idyllische huisje voor 6 personen. Binnen wacht een ruime woonkamer met 3 slaapkamers en alle essentiële voorzieningen. Buiten nodigt de ruime tuin uit tot relaxen, compleet met loungeset en grote eettafel. Met 2 fietsen, strandparasols en vliegers inbegrepen, is alles klaar voor jouw perfecte ontsnapping. Boek nu en beleef het zelf!

The space
Ons houten strandhuisje is rustig gelegen op het gezellige vakantiepark. De lichte tinten en houten accenten zorgen voor een echte beach vibe. Dit is een plek waar vrolijkheid en comfort hand in hand gaan.

Binnen vind je
